sourceString: The polyproteins are further processed to generate 16 non-structural proteins, designated nsp1~16.
targetString: پولیپروټینونه د 16 غیر جوړښتي پروټینونو تولید لپاره نور پروسس کیږي، ډیزاین شوي nsp1 ~ 16
en-mt: Polyproteins are further processed to produce 16 non-structural proteins، designed nsp1~16

sourceString: The remaining portion of the genome contains ORFs for the structural proteins, including spike (S), envelope (E), membrane (M) and nucleoprotein (N).
targetString: د جینوم پاتې برخه د جوړښتي پروټینونو لپاره ORFs لري، پشمول د سپیک (S)، لفافې (E)، جھلی (M) او نیوکلیوپروټین (N)
en-mt: The rest of the genome contains ORFs for structural proteins، including spike (S)، envelopes (E)، membrane (M) and nucleoprotein (N)

sourceString: A number of lineage-specific accessory proteins are also encoded by different lineages of CoVs.
targetString: د یو سلسلې پورې اړوند لاسرسي پروټینونه د CoVs مختلف شمیرو لخوا کوډ شوي دي.
en-mt: The access proteins associated with a chain are encoded by different numbers of CoVs.

sourceString: Based on the difference in protein sequences, CoVs are classified into four genera (alpha-CoV, beta-CoV, gamma-CoV and delta-CoV), among which the beta-CoV genera contains most HCoVs and is subdivided into four lineages (A, B, C and D).
targetString: د پروټین ترتیبونو کې د توپیر پراساس، CoVs په څلورو جنیرا (الفا-CoV ، بیټا-CoV ، ګاما-CoV او ډیلټا CoV) کې طبقه بندي شوي، په کوم کې د بیټا CoV جینرا ډیری HCoV لري او په څلورو سلسلو ویشل شوي (A ، B ، C او D).
en-mt: Based on differences in protein sequences، CoVs are classified into four genes (Alpha-CoV، Beta-CoV، Gamma-CoV and Delta CoV)، in which beta-CoV genera has multiple HCoV and is divided into four chains (A، B، C and D).

sourceString: Phylogenetic evidence has shown that bats and rodents serve as the gene source of most alpha-CoVs and beta-CoVs, while birds are the main reservoir of gamma-CoVs and delta-CoVs.
targetString: پولي جينيټک شواهدو ښودلې چې شوپرکان او موږکان د ډیری الفا-CoVs او بیټا CoVs جین سرچینې په توګه کار کوي، پداسې حال کې چې الوتونکي د ګاما - CoVs او ډیلټا - CoVs اصلي زیرمې دي.
en-mt: Poly genetic evidence has shown that shauperkans and mice act as many alpha-CoVs and beta-CoVs gene sources، while birds are the main reservoirs of gamma-CoVs and Delta-CoVs.

sourceString: For thousands of years, CoVs have constantly crossed species barriers and some have emerged as important human pathogens.
targetString: د زرګونو کلونو لپاره، CoVs په دوامداره توګه د ډول ډول خنډونو څخه اوړي او ځینې یې د انسان د مهمو ناروغیو په توګه راپورته شوي.
en-mt: For thousands of years، CoVs have been constantly evolving from a variety of obstacles and some of them have emerged as major human diseases.

sourceString: To date, seven human CoVs (HCoVs) are known.
targetString: تر دې دمه، اوه انساني (CoVs (HCoVs پیژندل شوي.
en-mt: So far، seven Human CoVs (HCoVs) have been identified.

sourceString: Among them HCoV-229E and HCoV-NL63 are alpha-CoVs.
targetString: د دوی په منځ کې HCoV-229E او HCoV-NL63 د الفا CoVs دي.
en-mt: Among them are HCoV-229E and HCoV-NL63 alpha CoVs.

sourceString: The other five beta-CoVs include HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (SARS-CoV), Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) and SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: په نورو پنځو بیټا CoVs کې HCoV-OC43 ، HCoV-HKU1، د شدید تنفسي سنډروم کرونا ویرس (SARS-CoV)، د مینځني ختیځ تنفسي سینډروم کورونویرس (MERS-CoV) او SARS-CoV-2 شامل دي.
en-mt: The other five beta CoVs include HCoV-OC43، HCoV-HKU1، severe respiratory syndrome coronavirus (SARS-CoV)، Middle Eastern respiratory syndrome (MERS-CoV) and SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63 usually cause mild symptoms, like common cold and/or diarrhea.
targetString: -OC43 HCoV-HKU1 او HCoV-NL63 معمولا د معمولي نښې لامل کیږي، لکه عام زکام او / یا اسهال۔
en-mt: -OC43 HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63 usually cause common symptoms، such as common colds and/or diarrhea.

sourceString: In contrast, SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and the newly-identified SARS-CoV-2 are highly pathogenic, causing severe lower respiratory tract infection in relatively more patients with a higher chance to develop acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and extrapulmonary manifestations.
targetString: په مقابل کې، SARS-CoV MERS-CoV او نوی پیژندل شوی SARS-CoV-2 خورا ډیر رنځونکي دي، چې د نسبتا ډیر ناروغانو کې د ټیټ تنفسي سیسټم انتان لامل کیږي چې د لوړ تنفسي سیسټم ناروغۍ رامینځته کولو لپاره لوړ چانس لري.
en-mt: In contrast، SARS-CoV MERS-CoV and the newly-identified SARS-CoV-2 are very pathogens، causing low respiratory tract infections in relatively many patients with a higher chance of developing high respiratory system disease.

sourceString: The first HCoV-229E strain, B814, was isolated from the nasal discharge of patients with common cold in mid-1960s.
targetString: د HCoV-229E لومړی ناروغ، B814، د 1960 کلونو په مینځ کې د عامې سړې ناروغۍ د ناخالص خارج څخه جلا شوی و.
en-mt: The first patient of HCoV-229E، B814، was isolated from the gross exclusion of common cold disease in the mid-1960s.

sourceString: Since then, more knowledge was accumulated through extensive studies on HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43, both of which cause self-limiting symptoms.
targetString: له هغه وخته، ډیر معلومات په HCoV-229E او HCoV-OC43 کې د پراخې مطالعې له لارې راټول شوي، چې دا دواړه د ځان محدودولو نښو لامل کیږي.
en-mt: Since then، more data has been collected through extensive studies on HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43، both of which lead to self-limiting symptoms.

sourceString: Indeed, the concept had been widely accepted that infection with HCoVs is generally harmless until the outbreak of SARS.
targetString: په حقیقت کې، مفهوم په پراخه کچه منل شوی و چې د HCoVs سره مبتلا کیده عموما بې ضرر دی ترهغه چې د سارس رامینځته کیدو پورې۔
en-mt: In fact، the concept was widely accepted that being infected with HCoVs is generally harmless until sars is developed.

sourceString: The SARS outbreak occurred in 2003 is one of the most devastating in current history, infecting over 8,000 people with a crude case fatality of approximately 10%.
targetString: د SARS ناروغي په 2003 کې رامینځته شوې په اوسني تاریخ کې ترټولو ویجاړونکی پیښه ده، او د 8،000 څخه ډیر خلک یې د نږدې 10٪ تلفاتو قضیې سره اخته کړي.
en-mt: The SARS epidemic، developed in 2003، is the most devastating event in current history، and has infected more than 8،000 people with nearly 10% of fatalities.

sourceString: Ten years later, the Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) outbreak resulted in a persistent epidemic in the Arabian Peninsula with sporadic spreading to the rest of the world.
targetString: لس کاله وروسته، د مینځني ختیځ تنفسي سنډروم (MERS) ناروغۍ په عربي ټاپووزمه کې د دوامداره عفونت لامل شوه او پاتې نړۍ ته به خال خال خپریده.
en-mt: Ten years later، Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) caused persistent infection in the Arabian Peninsula and spread to the rest of the world.

sourceString: The 2019 novel HCoV (2019-nCoV), which has subsequently been renamed SARS-CoV-2, is the causative agent of the ongoing epidemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), which has claimed more than 3,120 lives and infected more than 91,000 people as of March 3, 2020.
targetString: د 2019 ناول (HCoV (2019-nCoV، چې بیا وروسته د SARS-CoV-2 په نوم بدل شوی، د کرونا ویرس ناروغۍ د روانې ناروغۍ 2019 (COVID-19) لامل دی، چې له 3,120 تنو څخه یې زیات ژوندونه اخيستي او د چ مارچ 3, 2020 پورې يې 91،000 خلک اخته کړې۔
en-mt: The 2019 novel HCoV (2019-nCoV)، then renamed SARS-CoV-2، is the cause of the ongoing coronavirus pandemic 2019 (COVID-19)، claiming more than 3،120 lives and infecting 91،000 people as of March 3، 2020.

sourceString: The alarm has been ringing and the world has to prepare for the coming pandemic of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: د خطر زنګ غږيږي او نړۍ باید د SARS-CoV-2 راتلونکی وبا ته چمتو شي.
en-mt: The threat is sounding and the world must prepare for the next SARS-CoV-2 pandemic.

sourceString: All seven HCoVs have a zoonotic origin from bats, mice or domestic animals.
targetString: ټولې اوه HCoVs له شوپرک، موږګ یا کورنیو څارویو څخه زونوټیک اصل لري.
en-mt: All seven HCoVs have zoonotic origin from zoonotic animals، mice or domestic animals.

sourceString: Multiple lines of evidence support an evolutionary origin of all HCoVs from bats, where viruses are well adapted and non-pathogenic but show great genetic diversity.
targetString: د شواهدو کرښې د شوپرکانو څخه د ټولو HCoVs ارتقاطي اصل ملاتړ کوي، چیرې چې ویروسونه په ښه توګه تطبیق شوي او غیر ناروغي شتون لري مګر عالي جنیتیکي تنوع ښیې
en-mt: The evidence lines support the evolution principle of all HCoVs from shockers، where viruses are well adapted and non-pathogenic but show great genetic diversity.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic has presented enormous medical, scientific, social and moral challenges to China and the world.
targetString: د COVID-19 ناروغي چین او نړۍ ته خورا لوی طبي، ساینسي، ټولنیز او اخلاقي ننګونې وړاندې کړې.
en-mt: The COVID-19 pandemic has presented enormous medical، scientific، social and ethical challenges to China and the world.

sourceString: Tracing the zoonotic origins of HCoVs provides a framework to understand the natural history, driving force and restriction factors of species jumping.
targetString: د HCoVs د زونونو اصلي سرچینو تعقیب د طبیعي تاریخ د درک کولو لپاره یو چوکاټ، د چلولو ځواک او د نوعیتونو کود کولو محدودیت عوامل چمتو کوي.
en-mt: Tracking the main sources of HCoVs' zones provides a framework for understanding natural history، driving force and limiting factors of jumping species.

sourceString: This might also guide or facilitate the search for the reservoir, intermediate and amplifying animal host(s) of SARS-CoV-2, with important implications in the prevention of future spillovers.
targetString: دا ممکن د SARS-CoV-2 د زیرمو، منځمهاله او پراخه شوي څاروی کوربه (ګانو) لپاره د لارښود یا لټون اسانه کړي، چې د راتلونکي سپیلورونو مخنیوي کې مهم نښې لري.
en-mt: This may make it easier to guide or search for sars-CoV-2 reservoir، intermediate and expanded animal host (s)، which have important symptoms in preventing future spikes.

sourceString: In this review we present an overview of the zoonotic origins, interspecies transmission and pathogenesis of HCoVs.
targetString: پدې کتنه کې موږ د زونونوټیک اصل، د تقاطع لیږد او د HCoVs ناروغۍ اختصاص وړاندې کوو۔
en-mt: In this review we present the zonotic origin، intersectional transmission and infection of HCoVs.

sourceString: Particularly, we highlight and discuss the common theme that parental viruses of HCoVs are typically non-pathogenic in their natural reservoir hosts but become pathogenic after interspecies transmission to a new host.
targetString: په ځانګړې توګه، موږ عام موضوع په ګوته کوو او بحث یې کوو چې د HCoVs والدین ویروسونه په ځانګړي ډول د دوی طبیعي زیرمو کوربه کې غیر رنځونکي دي مګر نوي کوربه ته د تقاطع لیږد وروسته ناروغي کیږي۔
en-mt: In particular، we address the common theme and discuss that HCoVs parent viruses are particularly non-pathogenic in their natural reservoir host but become diseased after the intersection transfer to the new host.

sourceString: We also review the trend of HCoV evolution in which the increase in transmissibility often comes with the decrease in pathogenicity.
targetString: موږ د HCoV د ارتقاء حالت ته هم کتنه کوو په کوم کې چې د لیږد وړتیا زیاتوالی اکثرا د ناروغۍ کمیدو سره راځي.
en-mt: We also look at the evolution of HCoV in which increased transmission ability often comes with the decline of the disease.

sourceString: The outcome of the ongoing SARS-CoV-2 outbreak is also discussed in this context.
targetString: په دې برخه کې د SARS-CoV-2 روانې پایلې هم تر بحث لاندې نیول شوې دي.
en-mt: The results of SARS-CoV-2 are also discussed.

sourceString: Animal CoVs have been known since late 1930s.
targetString: د څارویو CoVs د 1930 کلونو راهیسې پیژندل شوي.
en-mt: Animal CoVs have been known since the 1930s.

sourceString: Before the first isolation of HCoV-229E strain B814 from the nasal discharge of patients who had contracted common cold, different CoVs had been isolated in various infected animals, including turkey, mouse, cow, pig, cat and dog.
targetString: مخکې لدې چې د HCoV-229E لمړني انزوا B814 د ناروغانو د پوزی څخه تنفس شي چې عادي سړی ناروغي درلوده، مختلف CoVs په بیلابیلو ناروغو څارویو کې جلا شوي وو، پشمول د فیل مرغ، موږک، غوا، خنځیر، پیشو او سپي.
en-mt: Before the initial isolation of HCoV-229E B814 was inhaled from the nose of patients with normal man disease، different COVs were isolated in a variety of pathogenic animals، including elephants، mice، cows، pigs، cats and dogs.

sourceString: In the past decades, seven HCoVs have been identified.
targetString: په تیرو لسیزو کې، اوه HCoV پیژندل شوي.
en-mt: In the past decade، seven HCoVs have been identified.

sourceString: A brief summary of the history of HCoV discovery in chronological order (Table ​1) would be informative and instructive.
targetString: په کرونولوژیک ترتیب کې د HCoV کشف تاریخ لنډ معلومات (جدول 1) به معلوماتي او لارښوونکي وي۔
en-mt: Short information on the history of HCoV detection in chronological order (Table 1) will be informative and instructable.

sourceString: The first HCoV-229E strain was isolated from the respiratory tract of patients with upper respiratory tract infection in the year of 1966, and was subsequently adapted to grow in WI-38 lung cell lines.
targetString: لومړی HCoV-229E فشار د 1966 کال په جریان کې د پورتنۍ تنفسي ناروغۍ ناروغانو د تنفسي جریان څخه جلا شوی و، او وروسته د WI-38 سږو حجرو کرښو کې وده کولو لپاره تطبیق شوی و.
en-mt: The first HCoV-229E strain was isolated from the respiratory tract of upper respiratory tract patients in 1966، and was later adapted to grow in wi-38 lung cell lines.

sourceString: Patients infected with HCoV-229E presented with common cold symptoms, including headache, sneezing, malaise and sore-throat, with fever and cough seen in 10~20% cases.
targetString: په HCoV-229E باندې اخته ناروغان د عام ساړه نښې نښانې لري، په شمول د سر درد، برنجیدل، ستوني درد، تبه او ټوخی چې په 10 ~ 20 سلنه قضیو کې لیدل شوي.
en-mt: Patients infected with HCoV-229E have common cold symptoms، including headaches، vomiting، throat pain، fever and cough that have been seen in 10 to 20 percent of cases.

sourceString: Later in 1967, HCoV-OC43 was isolated from organ culture and subsequent serial passage in brains of suckling mice.
targetString: وروسته په 1967 کې، HCoV-OC43 د اعضاو کلچر او ورپسې د سږو د موږکانو په مغزو کې د سریال تیریدو څخه جلا شو.
en-mt: Later in 1967، HCoV-OC43 was isolated from the organ culture and subsequently serial passage in the brains of lung mice.

sourceString: The clinical features of HCoV-OC43 infection appear to be similar to those caused by HCoV-229E, which are symptomatically indistinguishable from infection with other respiratory tract pathogens such as influenza A viruses and rhinoviruses.
targetString: د HCoV-OC43 مبتلا کیدلو کلینیکي ځانګړتیاوې د HCoV-229E له امله رامینځته شوي سره ورته ښکاري، کوم چې په نورو برخو کې د تنفسي ناروغۍ مثلث لکه انفلونزا A ویروس او رينوويروس سره د مکروبونو څخه په جلا ډول نه جلا کیدونکي دي.
en-mt: The clinical characteristics of hCoV-OC43 infections appear to be similar to those caused by HCoV-229E، which is inseparable from germs in other areas of the respiratory disease triangle such as influenza A virus and rhinovirus.

sourceString: Both HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43 are distributed globally, and they tend to be predominantly transmitted during the season of winter in temperate climate.
targetString: دواړه HCoV-229E او HCoV-OC43 په نړیواله کچه توزیع شوي، او دا د تودوخې په اقلیم کې د ژمي موسم په جریان کې لیږدول کیږي.
en-mt: Both HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43 are distributed globally، and it is transmitted during the winter season in temperate climates.

sourceString: Generally, the incubation time of these two viruses is less than one week, followed by an approximately 2-week illness.
targetString: په عموم کې، د دې دوو ویروسونو انقیوض وخت له یوې اونۍ څخه لږ وي، او د نږدې 2 اوونۍ ناروغۍ اوږدیږی/غځیږي.
en-mt: In general، the duration of these two viruses is less than one week، and the disease lasts for approximately 2 weeks.

sourceString: According to a human volunteer study, healthy individuals infected with HCoV-229E developed mild common cold.
targetString: د بشري رضاکارانه مطالعې په وینا، صحي اشخاص چې د HCoV-229E سره اخته شوي و، معمولي عام ساړه رامینځته کوي.
en-mt: According to a human volunteer study، healthy individuals who were infected with HCoV-229E developed a common cold.

sourceString: Only a few immunocompromised patients exhibited severe lower respiratory tract infection.
targetString: یوازې یو څو معافیتي ناروغانو د تنفسي سیسټم شدید ټیټ انفلونزا ښودلې۔
en-mt: Only a few immunodeficiency patients showed severely low respiratory system influenza.

sourceString: SARS, also known as “atypical pneumonia”, was the first well documented HCoV-caused pandemic in human history and the etiological agent is SARS-CoV, the third HCoV discovered.
targetString: SARS، چې د "اتپیکل نیومونیا" په نوم هم پیژندل کیږي، د انسان په تاریخ کې د HCoV لخوا رامینځته شوی لومړی پراخه وبايي ناروغي پیژندل شوې او ایټیولوژیک اجنټ SARS-CoV دی، دریم HCoV کشف شوی.
en-mt: SARS، also known as "atypical pneumonia،" is the first widespread hepatitis outbreak caused by HCoV in human history and is an etymological agent of SARS-CoV، the third HCoV detected.

sourceString: The first case of SARS can be traced back to late 2002 in Guangdong Province of China.
targetString: د SARS لومړۍ قضیه د چین په ګوانګډونګ ولایت کې د 2002 په وروستیو کې موندل شوی و.
en-mt: The first case of SARS was found in China's Guangdong province in late 2002.

sourceString: The SARS epidemic resulted in 8,096 reported cases with 774 deaths, spreading across many countries and continents.
targetString: د SARS ناروغي په پایله کې د 8،096 قضیو راپور ورکړل شوي چې د 774 مړینې سره مخ دي، چې په ډیری هیوادونو او براعظمونو کې خپریږي.
en-mt: The SARS epidemic resulted in 8،096 reported cases، with 774 deaths، spread across many countries and continents.

sourceString: Apart from the super-spreaders, it was estimated that each case could give rise to approximately two secondary cases, with an incubation period of 4 to 7 days and the peak of viral load appearing on the 10th day of illness.
targetString: د عالي خپریدونکو سربیره، اټکل شوی و چې هره قضیه نږدې 4 ثانوي قضیې ته وده ورکوي، د استیضاح موده له 4 څخه تر 7 ورځو پورې او د ویروس وزن پورته کول د ناروغۍ په لسمه ورځ څرګندیږي.
en-mt: In addition to the high prevalence، it was estimated that each case would grow to approximately 4 secondary cases، with an impeachment period of 4 to 7 days and the weight lifting of the virus appearing on the tenth day of the disease.

sourceString: Patients infected with SARS-CoV initially present with myalgia, headache, fever, malaise and chills, followed by dyspnea, cough and respiratory distress as late symptoms.
targetString: په SARS - CoV اخته ناروغان په لومړي سر کې د مایلګیا، سر درد، تبه، رنځ او ناروغي سره مینځ ته راځي، ورپسې ډیسپینیا، ټوخی او تنفسي تکلیف د ځنډ نښې نښانې دي.
en-mt: Sars-CoV-infected patients are initially exposed to mildia، headache، fever، suffering and disease، followed by dysponia، cough and respiratory distress symptoms.

sourceString: Lymphopenia, deranged liver function tests, and elevated creatine kinase are common laboratory abnormalities of SARS.
targetString: لیموفپینیا، د ځیګر/ینې فعالیت آزموینی، او لوړ شوي کریټین کناز د SARS عام لابراتوار غیر معمولي دي.
en-mt: Lymphophinnia, liver/blood function testing, and elevated critin conase are common laboratory sars abnormalities.

sourceString: Diffuse alveolar damage, epithelial cell proliferation and an increase of macrophages are also observed in SARS patients.
targetString: د الوولار زیان را کمول، د اپیتیلیل حجرې وده کول او د میکروفاج ډیروالی د سارس ناروغانو کې هم ليدل کیږي.
en-mt: Reducing acellular damage، the growth of epithelial cells and the increase in microphages is also seen in SARS patients.

sourceString: Approximately 20-30% of patients subsequently require intensive care and mechanical ventilation.
targetString: نږدې ٪20-30 ناروغان وروسته بیا ژورې پاملرنې او میخانیکي هوا ته اړتیا لري.
en-mt: Approximately 20-30% of patients then need intensive care and mechanical ventilation.

sourceString: In addition to lower respiratory tract, multiple organs including gastrointestinal tract, liver and kidney can also be infected in these severe cases, usually accompanied with a cytokine storm, which might be lethal particularly in immunocompromised patients.
targetString: د ټیت تنفس سربیره، ګڼ شمیر اعضاؤ په شمول د معدې دستګاه، ځيګر/ینه او پښتورګي هم په دې سختو پیښو کې اخته کیدی شي، معمولا د سایټکوین طوفان سره، کوم چې ممکن وژونکي وي په ځانګړي ډول د کمزوري معافیت په ناروغانو کې۔
en-mt: In addition to thalation، many organs including the stomach، liver and kidney can also be affected in these severe cases، usually with a cytokine storm، which may be fatal especially in patients with weakened immune system.

sourceString: The virus was first isolated from the open lung biopsy of a relative of the index patient who travelled to Hong Kong from Guangzhou.
targetString: ویروس لومړی د انډیکس ناروغ د خپلوانو د خلاص سږو بایوپسي څخه ګوښه شوی و چې له ګوانګزو څخه يې هانګ کانګ ته سفر کړی و.
en-mt: The virus was first dismissed from a biopsy of an inditex patient who had travelled from Guangzhou to Hong Kong.

sourceString: Since then, tremendous efforts have been dedicated to HCoV research.
targetString: له هغې وروسته، پراخې هڅې د HCoV تحقیق ته وقف شوي.
en-mt: Since then، extensive efforts have been devoted to hCoV research.

sourceString: HCoV-NL63 was isolated from a 7-month-old child from the Netherlands during late 2004.
targetString: HCoV-NL63 د 2004 په وروستیو کې له هالنډ څخه د 7 میاشتني ماشوم څخه جلا شوی و.
en-mt: HCoV-NL63 was separated from a 7-month-old child from the Netherlands in late 2004.

sourceString: It was initially found to be prevalent in young children, the elderly and immunocompromised patients with respiratory illnesses.
targetString: دا په پیل کې په تنکي ماشومانو، لویانو اومعافیت لرونکو ناروغانو کې چې د تنفسي ناروغیو سره مخ دي وموندل شوه۔
en-mt: It was initially found in young children، adults and patients with respiratory diseases.

sourceString: Presentation of coryza, conjunctivitis, fever, and bronchiolitis is common in the disease caused by HCoV-NL63.
targetString: د کوریازا، کنزکټوییټس، تبه، او د سږو مکروب شتون د HCoV-NL63 لخوا رامینځته شوي ناروغۍ کې عام دی.
en-mt: The presence of co-coronavirus، co-infection، fever، and pulmonary tuberculosis are common in the disease caused by HCoV-NL63.

sourceString: Another independent study described the isolation of the same virus from a nasal specimen from an 8-month-old boy suffering from pneumonia in the Netherlands.
targetString: یوې بلې خپلواکې مطالعې په هالنډ کې د 8 میاشتني هلک په سینه بغل اخته د اساسی ویروس د انزوا بیلګه بیان کړه.
en-mt: Another independent study described an isolated example of the underlying virus infected with pneumonia in an 8-month-old boy in the Netherlands.

sourceString: Although it was identified in Netherlands, it is actually distributed globally.
targetString: که څه هم دا په نیدرلینډ کې پیژندل شوی، دا واقعیا په نړیواله کچه توزیع شوي دي.
en-mt: Although it is known in the Netherlands، it is actually distributed worldwide.

sourceString: It has been estimated that HCoV-NL63 accounts for approximately 4.7% of common respiratory diseases, and its peak incidence occurs during early summer, spring and winter.
targetString: داسې اټکل شوی چې HCoV-NL63 د تنفسي عادي ناروغیو نږدې ٪4.7 برخه لري، او د دې لوړ واقعات د ګرمۍ په ابتدا، پسرلي او ژمي کې پیښیږي.
en-mt: It is estimated that HCoV-NL63 is responsible for approximately 4.7% of normal respiratory diseases، and these high incidences occur at the beginning of the heat، spring and winter.

sourceString: HCoV-NL63 is associated with obstructive laryngitis, also known as croup.
targetString: HCoV-NL63 د مخنیوي لاریینګیتس سره تړاو لري، چې د کروپ په نامه هم پیژندل کیږي.
en-mt: HCoV-NL63 is associated with inhibitory laryngitis، also known as croup.

sourceString: In the same year, HCoV-HKU1 was isolated from a 71-year-old man who had been hospitalized with pneumonia and bronchiolitis in Hong Kong.
targetString: په ورته کال کې، HCoV-HKU1 د 71 کلن سړي څخه ګوښه شوي و چې په هانګ کانګ کې د نمونیا او سږو ناروغې سره په روغتون کې بستر شوی و.
en-mt: In the same year، HCOV-HKU1 was dismissed from a 71-year-old man who was hospitalized with pneumonia and pneumonia in Hong Kong.

sourceString: Besides community-acquired pneumonia and bronchiolitis, HCoV-HKU1 was reported to be associated with acute asthmatic exacerbation.
targetString: د ټولنې ترلاسه شوي نمونیا او برونچیولیټس سربیره، د HCoV-HKU1 راپور ورکړل شوی چې د حاد اسماټیک ناروغۍ سره یې تړاو درلود.
en-mt: In addition to community-acquired pneumonia and bronchiality، HCoV-HKU1 was reported to be associated with acute asmatic disease.

sourceString: Similar to HCoV-NL63, HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 was found worldwide, causing mild respiratory diseases.
targetString: HCoV-NL63 HCoV-229E او HCoV-OC43 ته ورته، HCoV-HKU1 په نړۍ کې وموندل شو، چې د لږ تنفسي ناروغیو لامل شو.
en-mt: Similar to HCoV-NL63 HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43، HCoV-HKU1 was found worldwide، leading to fewer respiratory diseases.

sourceString: All these four community-acquired HCoVs have been well adapted to humans and are generally less likely to mutate to cause highly pathogenic diseases, though accidents did occur for unknown reasons as in the rare case of a more virulent subtype of HCoV-NL63, which has recently been reported to cause severe lower respiratory tract infection in China.
targetString: دا ټول څلور ټولنېز ترلاسه شوي HCoV په انسانانو کې ښه عادي شوي او په عمومي توګه لږ امکان لري چې د ډیر رنځونکي ناروغیو لامل شي، پداسې حال کې چې پیښې د نامعلومو وجوهاتو له امله رامینځته شوي لکه څنګه چې د HCoV-NL63 ډیر ویروسي فرعي ډولونو پیښو کې رامینځته کیږي. پدې وروستیو کې راپور ورکړل شوی چې په چین کې د تنفسي ساه لنډې ناروغۍ لامل کیږي.
en-mt: All of these four so-called HCoVs obtained are well-normalized in humans and are generally less likely to cause more pathogens، while the events are caused by unknown causes such as the occurrence of more viral subtypes of HCoV-NL63. It has recently been reported that short respiratory illnesses in China.

sourceString: Generally, when these HCoVs acquire the abilities to transmit efficiently and to maintain themselves continuously within humans, they also become less virulent or pathogenic.
targetString: عموما، کله چې دا HCoVs وړتیاوې ترلاسه کړي ترڅو موثره لیږد وکړي او ځان په انسانانو کې په دوامداره توګه وساتي، دوي هم لږ خطرناک یا ناروغه کوونکي کیږي.
en-mt: Generally، when these HCoVs have acquired the capabilities to efficiently transport and sustain themselves in humans، they also become less dangerous or sickening.

sourceString: MERS-CoV was first isolated in 2012 from the lung of a 60-year-old patient who developed acute pneumonia and renal failure in Saudi Arabia.
targetString: MERS - CoV په لومړي ځل په 2012 کال کې د یوه-60 کلن ناروغ له سږو څخه ګوښه شوی و چې په سعودي عربستان کې حاد نمونیا او رینل ناکامي رامینځته کړې.
en-mt: MERS-CoV was first isolated from the lungs of a 60-year-old patient in 2012 who caused acute pneumonia and renal failure in Saudi Arabia.

sourceString: Whereas most of the laboratory-confirmed cases originate from the Middle East, imported cases with occasional secondary spreads to close contacts have been reported in various European countries and Tunisia.
targetString: پداسې حال کې چې د لابراتوار تایید شوي ډیری قضیې د مینځني ختیځ څخه سرچینه اخلي، د وارداتو قضیې کله ناکله دوهم پاې ته نږدې اړیکو ته راپور شوي په بیلابیلو اروپایي هیوادونو او تونس کې راپور شوي دي۔
en-mt: While most laboratory-confirmed cases originate from the Middle East، cases of imports sometimes close to the second end have been reported in various European countries and Tunisia.

sourceString: Another secondary outbreak occurred in South Korea in 2015 with 186 confirmed cases.
targetString: بله ثانوي ناروغي په سویلي کوریا کې په کال 2015 کې د 186 تایید شویو قضیو سره رامینځته شوه.
en-mt: Another secondary infection occurred in South Korea in 2015 with 186 confirmed cases.

sourceString: Clinical manifestations of MERS resemble those of SARS, characterized by progressive acute pneumonia.
targetString: د MERS کلینیکي څرګندونې د SARS سره ورته دي، چی د پرمختللي حاد نمونیا لخوا مشخص شوی.
en-mt: The clinical manifestations of MERS are similar to that of SARS، characterized by advanced acute pneumonia.

sourceString: Unlike SARS, many patients with MERS also developed acute renal failure, which is thus far unique for MERS among HCoV-caused diseases.
targetString: د SARS برعکس، د MERS سره ډیری ناروغانو هم شدید رینال ناکامي رامینځته کړې، کوم چې د HCoV لخوا رامینځته شوي ناروغیو کې د Mers لپاره خورا ځانګړې دی.
en-mt: Unlike SARS، many patients with MERS have also developed severe renal failure، which is very specific to Mers in hCoV-caused diseases.

sourceString: More than 30% of patients present with gastrointestinal symptoms, such as diarrhea and vomiting.
targetString: د٪30 څخه ډیر ناروغان د معدې علایم، لکه اسهال او التهاب سره شتون لري.
en-mt: More than 30% of patients have stomach symptoms، such as diarrhea and inflammation.

sourceString: As of February 14, 2020, over 2500 laboratory confirmed cases were reported with a high case fatality of 34.4%, making MERS-CoV one of the most devastating viruses known to humans.
targetString: د فبروري تر 14، 2020 پورې، له 2500 څخه ډیر لابراتوار تایید شوي قضیې د ٪34.4 د لوړې قضیې راپور شوي، چې Mers-CoV یې انسانانو ته پیژندل شوی خورا وژونکی ویروس جوړ کړي.
en-mt: As of February 14، 2020، more than 2،500 laboratory-confirmed cases of 34.4% had been reported، making Mers-CoV the most deadly virus known to humans.

sourceString: During middle to late December 2019, clusters of pneumonia patients retrospectively known to be associated with SARS-CoV-2 infection were detected in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.
targetString: د دسمبر 2019 له نیمایی څخه تر آخیری پورې، د نیومونیا ناروغانو کلسترونه چې په SARS - CoV - 2 ناروغۍ پورې تړاو لري پیژندل شوي، د چین د هوبي ولایت، ووهان کې وموندل شول.
en-mt: From mid-December 2019 to Late 2019, clusters of pneumonia patients associated with the SARS-CoV-2 disease were identified, found in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.

sourceString: World Health Organization declared the ongoing outbreak of lower respiratory tract infection caused by SARS-CoV-2 a Public Health Emergency of International Concern and also named the disease COVID-19.
targetString: د نړیوال روغتیا سازمان د SARS-CoV-2 لخوا رامینځته شوي د تنفس ټیټ ناروغه کیدل روانې پیښې د نړیوالې اندیښنې عامه روغتیا اضطراري حالت اعلان کړ او د دې ناروغۍ نوم یې COVID-19 هم کېښود۔
en-mt: The ongoing outbreak of low respiratory illness caused by SARS-CoV-2 has declared a public health emergency of international concern and has also named the disease COVID-19.

sourceString: As of March 3, 2020, 90,053 cases have been confirmed worldwide, with a crude case fatality of 3.4%.
targetString: د مارچ 3، 2020 پورې، 90،053 قضیې په ټوله نړۍ کې تایید شوي، سره له %3.4 خامو/نا تائید شویو د مړینی قضیی۔
en-mt: As of March 3، 2020، 90،053 cases have been confirmed worldwide، with 3.4% confirmed cases of death.

sourceString: Notably, the case fatality in Hubei, China is 4.2%, whereas the one outside of it is 1.2%.
targetString: د پام وړ، په هوبي کې د مړینی قضیې، چین ٪4.2 دی، پداسې حال کې چې له هغې څخه بهر دا ٪1.2 دی.
en-mt: Notedly، in the case of death in Hubei، China is 4.2%، while out of there it is 1.2%.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 causes severe respiratory infection like SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, presented as fever, cough and dyspnea.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 د CoV او MERS-CoV په څیر جدي تنفسي ناروغۍ لامل کیږي، چې تبه، ټوخی او ډیسپینیا په توګه وړاندې کیږي.
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 causes serious respiratory diseases such as CoV and MERS-CoV، presented as fever، cough and dyspnia.

sourceString: Diarrhea is also seen in some patients.
targetString: په بعضی ناروغانو کی اسهالات هم لیدل شوي.
en-mt: There are also diarrheas in some patients.

sourceString: Pneumonia is one of the most severe symptoms and can progress rapidly to acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: نمونیا یو له تر ټولو سختې نښې دي او د شدید تنفسي رنځ سنډروم ته وده ورکولی شي.
en-mt: Pneumonia is one of the most severe symptoms and can lead to severe respiratory syndrome.

sourceString: Although SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 are very similar due to high nucleotide sequence homology of 82%, they cluster into different branches in the phylogenetic tree.
targetString: که څه هم SARS-CoV او SARS-CoV-2 د ٪82 د لوړ نیوکلیوټایډ ترتیب هومولوژی له امله خورا ورتوالی لري، دوی د فایلاژیټیک ونې په بیلابیلو څانګو کې کلستر کیږي.
en-mt: Although SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 are highly versatile due to the 82% high nucleotide sequence homology، they are clustered in different branches of the physitic tree.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is apparently less pathogenic but more transmissible compared to SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ظاهرا د لږ سرطان ناروغي ده مګر د SARS-CoV او MERS-CoV په پرتله ډیر د لیږد وړ ده.
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 is apparently a less cancer-causing disease but more transmissible than SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Asymptomatic subjects infected with SARS-CoV-2 have been reported and might contribute to its rapid spreading around the world.
targetString: د SARS-CoV-2 باندې اخته اسیمپوټومیټیک موضوعات راپور شوي او ممکن په ټوله نړۍ کې د هغې ګړندي خپریدو کې مرسته وکړي.
en-mt: Asympotomitic issues associated with SARS-CoV-2 have been reported and may contribute to its rapid spread worldwide.

sourceString: Comparing and contrasting SARS-CoV-2 with the other six HCoVs reveal similarities and differences of great interest.
targetString: د نورو شپږو HCoVs سره د SARS-CoV-2 پرتله کول او توپیر د ډیری ګټي توپیرونه ښیې۔
en-mt: The comparison and contrast of SARS-CoV-2 with the other six HCoVs shows many beneficial differences.

sourceString: First, the incubation period and the duration of the course of HCoV disease are very similar.
targetString: لومړی، د انکيوبيشن او د HCoV ناروغۍ موده خورا ورته دي.
en-mt: First، the duration of incubation and hCoV infection is very similar.

sourceString: In this regard, SARS-CoV-2 follows the general trend of the other six HCoVs.
targetString: پدې برخه کې، SARS-CoV-2 د نورو شپږو HCoVs عمومي حالت تعقیبوي.
en-mt: In this regard، SARS-CoV-2 follows the general condition of the other six HCoVs.

sourceString: Second, the severity of symptoms of COVID-19 lies between SARS-CoV and the four community-acquired HCoVs (i.e. HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63).
targetString: دوهم، د COVID-19 د نښو شدت د SARS-CoV او د څلورو ټولنیز ترلاسه شوي HCoVs (د بیلګې په توګه HCoV-229E HCoV-OC43 HCoV-HKU1 او HCoV-NL63) ترمینځ شتون لري.
en-mt: Second، the severity of COVID-19 symptoms is present between SARS-CoV and four socially acquired HCoVs (e.g. HCoV-229E HCoV-OC43 HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63).

sourceString: On one hand, SARS-CoV-2 infection exhibits features that are more commonly seen during infection with community-acquired HCoVs, including the presentation of non-specific, mild or even no symptoms.
targetString: له یوې خوا، د SARS-CoV-2 انتانات هغه شکلونه ښیې چې د ټولنې لخوا اخیستل شوي HCoVs سره د اخته کیدو په ترڅ کې ډیرعام لیدل کیږي، پشمول د غیر مشخص، معتدل یا حتی د نښې نښانو غېر موجودیت وړاندې کول .
en-mt: On the one hand، SARS-CoV-2 infections show the forms that are most commonly seen during exposure to community-acquired HCoVs، including non-specific، moderate، or even present an absence of symptoms.

sourceString: On the other hand, a small subset of severe cases of COVID-19 can also be seen as in the case of SARS-CoV infection, although the ratio is a bit lower.
targetString: له بلې خوا، د COVID-19 د شدید قضیو کوچنۍ سبسیټ هم د SARS-CoV انتان په حالت کې لیدل کیدی شي، که څه هم تناسب یی یو څه ټیټ دی.
en-mt: On the other hand، a small subset of severe COVID-19 cases can also be seen in the case of SARS-CoV infection، although the proportion is slightly lower.

sourceString: Third, the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 also shows interesting patterns characteristic of both community-acquired HCoVs and SARS-CoV.
targetString: دریم، د SARS-CoV-2 لیږد هم په زړه پوری لارې ښیې چې د ټولنې لخوا ترلاسه شوي HCoVs او SARS-CoV دواړه ځانګړتیاوې ښیې.
en-mt: Third، sars-CoV-2 transmission also shows interesting ways to characterize both community-acquired HCoVs and SARS-CoV.

sourceString: On one hand, the transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2 is at least as high as that of community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: له یوې خوا، د SARS-CoV-2 د لیږد وړتیا لږ تر لږه د ټولنې لخوا ترلاسه شوي HCoV په پرتله خورا لوړه ده.
en-mt: On the one hand، the transmission capacity of SARS-CoV-2 is significantly higher than the HCoV obtained by the community.

sourceString: On the other hand, it remains to be verified whether the transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2 decreases after passages in humans as in the cases of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.
targetString: له بلې خوا، دا باید تایید شي چې ایا د SARS-CoV-2 لیږد وړتیا په انسانانو کې د تیریدو وروسته راټیټیږي لکه څنګه چې د SARS-CoV او MERS-CoV قضیو کې لیدل شوي.
en-mt: On the other hand، it must be confirmed whether the transmission capacity of SARS-CoV-2 decreases after passing in humans as seen in SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV cases.

sourceString: Finally, same as the other HCoVs, SARS-CoV-2 can be detected in fecal samples.
targetString: په پای کې، د نورو HCoVs په څیر، SARS-CoV-2 بايد د فیکل نمونو کې کشف شي۔
en-mt: Finally، like other HCoVs، SARS-CoV-2 must be detected in pecs samples.

sourceString: Whether fecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2 plays an important role as in the case of SARS-CoV at least under some circumstance remains to be clarified by future studies.
targetString: که څه هم د SARS-CoV-2 تخمداني زباني لیږد مهم رول لوبوي لکه څنګه چې د SARS-CoV په حالت کې لږ تر لږه په ځینو حاالتو کې د راتلونکي مطالعاتو لخوا روښانه شي.
en-mt: However، the ovarian transmission of SARS-CoV-2 plays an important role as to be clarified by future studies at least in some situations.

sourceString: It is also of particularly great interest to see whether SARS-CoV-2 might exhibit seasonality as in the cases of community-acquired HCoVs.
targetString: دا په ځانګړي توګه د ډیرې علاقې وړ دی چې وګوري ایا د SARS-CoV-2 ممکن موسمي توضیح کړي لکه څنګه چې د ټولنې لخوا ترلاسه شوي HCoVs قضیو کې دي.
en-mt: It is particularly of great interest to see if SARS-CoV-2 may explain seasonally as is in cases of community-acquired HCoVs.

sourceString: Nevertheless, the features of SARS-CoV-2 including its transmissibility, pathogenicity and sustainable spreading after passages in humans will be influential on the ultimate fate of the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19.
targetString: په هرصورت، د SARS-CoV-2 شکل د دې لیږدونې، ناروغۍ او دوام لرونکي خپریدو په شمول په انسانانو کې تیریدو وروسته به د روان COVID-19 وروستي برخلیک د پاره اغیزمن وي.
en-mt: However، the form of SARS-CoV-2 will be effective for the eventual fate of the ongoing COVID-19، including its transmission، disease and continued spread.

sourceString: All four community-acquired HCoVs causing mild symptoms have been well adapted to humans.
targetString: څلور واړه د ټولنې ترلاسه شوي HCoVs چې د معتدلې نښې رامینځته کوي په انسانانو کی ښه تطبیق شوي.
en-mt: All four community-acquired HCoVs that produce mild symptoms have been well adapted in humans.

sourceString: From another perspective, it might also be true that humans have been well adapted to these four HCoVs.
targetString: د بل لید څخه، دا ممکن ریښتیا هم وي چې انسانان د دې څلورو HCoVs سره ښه تطابق ښودلی.
en-mt: From another perspective، it may also be true that humans have shown good adaptability to these four HCoVs.

sourceString: In other words, both could be the survivors of ancient HCoV pandemics.
targetString: په بل عبارت، دواړه ممکن د پخوانۍ HCoV وبا څخه ژوندي پاتې وي۔
en-mt: In other words، both may have survived the previous HCoV pandemic.

sourceString: HCoVs that cause severe diseases in humans and humans who developed severe HCoV diseases have been eliminated.

sourceString: For this to happen, HCoVs have to replicate in humans to sufficient extent to allow the accumulation of adaptive mutations that counteract host restriction factors.

sourceString: In this sense, the longer the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak persists and the more people that it infects, the greater chance that it will fully adapt to humans.

sourceString: If it adapts well, its transmission in humans would be difficult to stop by quarantine or other infection control measures.

sourceString: For many years, the four community-acquired CoVs circulate in human populations, triggering common cold in immunocompetent subjects.

sourceString: In contrast, highly pathogenic SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV have not adapted to humans well and their transmission within humans cannot be sustained.

sourceString: They need to maintain and propagate in their zoonotic reservoirs and seek the chance to spillover to susceptible human targets, possibly via one or more intermediate and amplifying hosts.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 has features that are similar to both SARS-CoV/MERS-CoV and the four community-acquired HCoVs.

sourceString: It is highly transmissible like community-acquired HCoVs, at least for the time being.

sourceString: However, it is more pathogenic than community-acquired HCoVs and less pathogenic than SARS-CoV or MERS-CoV.

sourceString: It remains to be seen whether it will adapt fully to humans and circulate within humans without a reservoir or intermediate animal host.
targetString: دا به ولیدل شي چې ایا دا به په بشپړ ډول انسانانو ته تطبیق کړي او د زیرمو یا مینځمهاله څاروي کوربه پرته په انسانانو کې گردش وکړي.

sourceString: Before discussing the animal origins of HCoVs, it will serve us well to discuss the definitions and characteristics of evolutionary, natural, reservoir, intermediate and amplifying hosts of HCoVs.
targetString: د HCoVs د څارویو اصلي سرچینو په اړه بحث کولو دمخه، دا به موږ ته ښه خدمت وکړي چې د HCoVs ارتقا، طبیعي زیرمو، منځمهاله او پراخه کولو کوربه تعریف او ځانګړتیاو باندې بحث وکړو
en-mt: Before discussing the origin origins of HCoVs، it will serve us well to discuss the definition and characteristics of HCoVs evolution، natural deposits، intermediate and expanding host.

sourceString: An animal serves as the evolutionary host of an HCoV if it harbours a closely related ancestor sharing high homology at the level of nucleotide sequence.
targetString: یو څاروی د HCoV د ارتقاء کوربه په توګه دنده ترسره کوي که چیرې دا د نږدې پلرونو سره تړاو ولري چې د نیوکلیوټایډ تسلسل په کچه لوړه هومولوژي شریکوي.
en-mt: An animal functions as an evolutionary host of HCoV if it is associated with closely related ancestors that share high-level homology at the nucleotide sequence.

sourceString: The ancestral virus is usually well adapted and non-pathogenic in this host.
targetString: د زاړه ویروس اکثرا پدې کوربه کې ښه بلد شوی او غیر ناروغي دی.

sourceString: Likewise, a reservoir host harbours HCoV continuously and for long term.
targetString: په ورته ډول، د زیرمو کوربه HCoV په دوامداره توګه او د اوږدې مودې لپاره ساتي۔

sourceString: In both cases, the hosts are naturally infected and are the natural hosts of HCoV or its parental virus.

sourceString: In contrast, if the HCoV is newly introduced to an intermediate host right before or around its introduction to humans, it is not well adapted to the new host and is often pathogenic.
targetString: په مقابل کې، که چیرې HCoV نوي سره مینځنۍ کوربه ته د دې معرفي کیدو دمخه یا شاوخوا انسانانو ته معرفي شي، نو دا نوي کوربه سره ښه نه تطبیق کیږي او اکثرا ناروغي ده.
en-mt: In contrast، if hCoV is introduced to or around humans before it is introduced to the new host، it does not apply well to the new host and is often a disease.

sourceString: This intermediate host can serve as the zoonotic source of human infection and play the role of an amplifying host by allowing the virus to replicate transiently and then transmitting it to humans to amplify the scale of human infection.
targetString: دا منځمهاله کوربه کولی شي د انسان انفیکشن زونوټیک سرچینې په توګه کار وکړي او د ویروس له لارې انتقالي رول ولوبوی او بیا یې انسان ته د انسان د انفیکشن اندازه پراخه کولو سره لیږدولو سره د کوربه توب رول ولوبوي.

sourceString: An HCoV can undergo a dead-end infection if it cannot sustain its transmission within the intermediate host.

sourceString: On the contrary, HCoVs can also adapt to the intermediate host and even establish long-term endemicity.

sourceString: In this case, the intermediate host becomes a natural reservoir host.

sourceString: Epidemiological data revealed retrospectively that the index case of SARS had a contact history with game animals.

sourceString: Subsequent seroprevalence investigations indicated that animal traders had a higher prevalence of anti-SARS-CoV IgG compared with that of the general population.

sourceString: Masked palm civets (Paguma larvata) and a racoon dog in live animal markets were first identified to carry SARS-CoV-like viruses that are almost identical to SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Thus far, WIV1 represents the most closely related ancestor of SARS-CoV in bats, sharing 95% nucleotide sequence homology.

sourceString: Albeit the high homology between these two viruses, it is generally believed that WIV1 is not the immediate parental virus of SARS-CoV and bats are not the immediate reservoir host of SARS-CoV.

sourceString: On the other hand, studies in Middle East have shown that dromedary camels are seropositive for MERS-CoV-specific neutralizing antibodies, same as camels of Middle East origin in multiple African countries.
targetString: له بل پلوه، په مینځني ختیځ کې مطالعاتو ښودلې ده چې عربي اوښانو د MERS-CoV ځانګړي خنثی کونکي انټي باډیز لپاره مثبت پایلې لرلې دي، هماغسې لکه ډیری افریقایی هیوادونو کې د آره د مینځني ختیځ اوښانو په څیر.
en-mt: On the other hand، studies in the Middle East have shown that Arab camels have had positive results for the specific neutralizing antibodies of MERS-CoV، just as in many African countries as in the Middle East camels.

sourceString: Live MERS-CoV identical to the virus found in humans was isolated from the nasal swabs of dromedary camels, further indicating that camels serve as the bona fide reservoir host of MERS-CoV.
targetString: کټ مټ په انسانانو کې موندل شوي ویروس سره یوشان ژوندی MERS-CoV د عربي اوښانو د پزې مایعاتو نه جلا کړی شوی، چې له مخې یې لانور جوتیږي چې اوښان د MERS-CoV اصلي ساتونکي کوربه دي.
en-mt: Exactly identical to the virus found in humans، MERS-CoV is isolated from the arabian camel's pus fluids، according to which the camels are the main protective host of MERS-CoV.

sourceString: It is also noteworthy that generally mild symptoms but massive virus shedding were observed in camels experimentally infected with MERS-CoV.
targetString: دا خبره هم د یادونې وړ ده چې د تجربې لپاره په MERS-CoV اخته کړی شوي اوښانو کې عمومآ خفیف علایم لیدل شوي مګر د ویروس شیندل پکې ډیر پراخه و.
en-mt: It's also worth noting that for the experiment، there were usually mild symptoms in camels infected with MERS-CoV، but the spread of the virus was more widespread.

sourceString: Notably, infected camels shed viruses not only through respiratory route but also through fecal-oral route, which is also the main route for virus shedding from bats.
targetString: د یادونې وړ ده چې اخته اوښان نه یوازې د تنفسي لارې ویرسونه شیندي بلکه همدارنګه د مدفوع – خولې له لارې یې هم شیندي، کومه چې د ماښام ښاپیرکیو د ویروس شیندلو اصلي لاره هم ده.
en-mt: It should be noted that infected camels can not only spread the virus through the respiratory tract but also through feces-mouth، which is also the main way to spread the virus.

sourceString: However, questions still remain since many confirmed cases of MERS have no contact history with camels prior to symptom onset, plausibly ascribed to human-to-human transmission or unknown transmission routes involving unrecognized animal species that harbour MERS-CoV.
targetString: په هرصورت، پوښتنې لاهم پرځای پاتې دي ځکه چې د MERS ډیری تایید شوي پیښې د علایمو د پیل نه مخکې د اوښانو سره د هیڅ ډول اړیکې تاریخچه نلري، ظاهرآ انسان نه انسان ته لیږد یا د لیږد ناپیژندل شوي لارو ته نسبت ورکول کیږي چې ناپیژندل شوي ژوي پکې شامل دي کوم چې MERS-CoV لري.
en-mt: However, questions remain in place because most confirmed events of MERS have no history of any contact with camels prior to the onset of symptoms, apparently attributed to human-to-human transmission or to unrelated ways of transmission involving unidentified animals which contain MERS-CoV.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 shares 96.2% nucleotide homology with a bat CoV RaTG13 isolated from Rhinolophus affinis bats.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 د رینولوفس افینیس ماښام ښاپیریکیو څخه جلا شوي د ماښام ښاپیرکي CoV RaTG13 سره 96.2% نوکلئوټیډ ورته والی لري.
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 isolated from renophosphoses evening fairies has a 96.2% nucleotide similarity to the evening fairy CoV RaTG13.

sourceString: As in the cases of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, the sequence divergence between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is too great to assign parental relationship.
targetString: SARS-CoV او MERS-CoV پیښو کې، د SARS-CoV-2 او RaTG13 ترمینځ لړۍ اختلاف یا لیرې والی د زیږونکي اړیکې ټاکلو لپاره خورا ډیر دی.
en-mt: In SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV cases، the range of discrepancies or distances between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is too great to determine the reproductive relationship.

sourceString: That is to say, bats might not be the immediate reservoir host(s) of SARS-CoV-2 unless almost identical bat CoVs are found in future.
targetString: پدې معني چې د ماښام ښاپیرکي شاید د SARS-CoV-2 بلا فاصله ساتونکي کوربه نه وي غیرلدې که چیرې راتلونکي کې نږدې کټ مټ همداشان د ماښام ښاپیرکي کرونا ویروس وموندل شي.
en-mt: This means that the evening fairy probably won't host sars-CoV-2's immediate guard unless it's nearly exactly the same as the evening's fairy-tale coronavirus is found in the future.

sourceString: Presumably, the intermediate animal hosts of SARS-CoV-2 should be among the wildlife species sold and killed at the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, with which many of the initial cases of COVID-19 were associated, indicative of a probable animal-to-human transmission event.
targetString: په احتمالي توګه، د SARS-CoV-2 مینځنی کوربه ژوي باید د هنان سمندري خوړو عمده پلور بازار کې پیرل شوي او وژل شوي وحشي ژویو ترمینځ کوم یي، کوم ځای پورې چې د COVID-19 ډیری لومړنۍ پیښې تړلې وې، چې د ژوي نه انسان ته د لیږد احتمالي پیښې نښه ده.
en-mt: Potentially، the middle host species of SARS-CoV-2 should be among the most common and dead wild animals in the Hannan seafood wholesale market، where most of the early COVID-19 cases were linked، a potential cause of transmission from animal to human.

sourceString: Several recent studies based on metagenomic sequencing have suggested that a group of endangered small mammals known as pangolins (Manis javanica) could also harbour ancestral beta-CoVs related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: د میتاجینومیک لړۍ پربنسټ یو شمیر وروستیو مطالعاتو دا نظر ورکړی چې له خطر سره مخ کوچني حیوانات چې د مېږی خور (مانیس یاوانیکا) په نوم پېژندل کیږي کېدای شي موروثي beta-CoVs هم ولري چې له SARS-CoV-2 سره تړاو لري.
en-mt: A number of recent studies based on the metagenetic series have found that small-risk animals known as the mother of the insect (Manis Yavanica) may also have inherited beta-CoVs associated with SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: These novel pangolin CoV genomes share 85-92% nucleotide sequence homology with SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: د نوي پینګولین CoV دغه جینومونه له SARS-CoV-2 سره د هومولوجي له 85-92% د نیوکلیوتاید ګډه لړۍ لري.

sourceString: However, they are equally closely related to RaTG13 with about 90% identity at the level of nucleotide sequence.
targetString: خو، هغوی په ورته توګه له RaTG13 سره ډیر نږدې تړاو لري چې د نیوکلیوتاید لړۍ په کچه نږدې 90 % ورته والی لري.

sourceString: They cluster into two sub-lineages of SARS-CoV-2-like viruses in the phylogenetic tree, one of which share a more similar receptor binding domain (RBD) with SARS-CoV-2, with 97.4% amino acid sequence identity.
targetString: هغوی د پهیلوجینتیک په شجره کې د SARS-CoV-2 په څیر وایرسونه په دوو فرعي – کورنیو په ډلو کې راټولیږي، لدغو څخه یو یې له SARS-CoV-2 سره ډیر ورته ګډه د اخیستونکي ګډولو ساحه (RBD) لري، چې 97.4 % د امینو اسید لړۍ ورته والی دی.
en-mt: They gather viruses like SARS-CoV-2 in the ailogenitic genealogy into two sub-family groups، one of which has a more common receptor-sharing area (RBD) with SARS-CoV-2، which is 97.4% similar to the amino acid sequence.

sourceString: In stark contrast, the RBDs of SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 are more divergent, albeit a higher degree of sequence homology genome-wide.
targetString: په ډیره توپير لرونکې توګه، د SARS-CoV-2 او د RaTG13، RBD ډیر توپیر لرونکي دي، که څه هم د جینوم-پراخ هومولوجي لړۍ اندازه لري.
en-mt: In very different ways، the number of SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13، RBD is very different، although it has a genome-wide homologous range of measurements.

sourceString: An earlier study on diseased pangolins also reported the detection of viral contigs from lung samples, which turn out to be similarly related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: د ناروغۍ لرونکو مېږی خورانو په هکله یوې پخوانی مطالعې له سږي څخه د بیلګو د ویروسي ناروغۍ موندلو رپوټ هم ورکړی، چې په ورته توګه له SARS-CoV-2 سره تړاو لري.
en-mt: A previous study of infectious infections also reported the detection of viral infections from the lungs، similarly linked to SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: This study adopted different assembly methods and manual curation to generate a partial genome sequence comprising about 86.3% of the full-length viral genome.
targetString: په دغه مطالعې کې د یوځای کولو له توپیر لرونکو لارو او په لاسي توګه له جوړولو ګټه اخیستل شوې ترڅو تریوې کچې د جینوم لړۍ تولید شي چې ترکیب یې د ویروسي جینوم نږدې 86.3 % بشپړ-اوږدوالی لري.
en-mt: The study used different methods of combining and manually to produce a sequence of genomes whose composition is approximately 86.3% of the full length of the viral genome.

sourceString: We cannot exclude the possibility that pangolin is one of the intermediate animal hosts of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: موږ نشو کولای دا شونتیا هم له پامه وغورځوو چې مېږی خور د SARS-CoV-2 منځګړیو کوربه ژویو څخه یو دی.

sourceString: However, currently there is no evidence in support of a direct pangolin origin of SARS-CoV-2 due to the sequence divergence between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs.
targetString: خو، په اوس وخت کې د SARS-CoV-2 او د میږی خور SARS-CoV-2 چې له beta-CoVs سره تړاو لري ترمنځ د توپیر لرونکي لړۍ له کبله، د میږی خور او SARS-CoV-2 ترمنځ د اصلیت مستقیم ملاتړ کوونکي شواهد نشته.

sourceString: In addition, the distance between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is even shorter than that between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs.
targetString: پردې برسېره، د SARS-CoV-2 او RaTG13 ترمنځ واټن د SARS-CoV-2 او د میږی خور SARS-CoV-2 چې له beta-CoVs سره تړاو لري په پرتله واټن نور هم لنډ دی.
en-mt: Furthermore، the distance between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is even shorter than sars-CoV-2 and the sister sars-CoV-2 associated with beta-CoVs.

sourceString: The evolutionary pathway of SARS-CoV-2 in bats, pangolins and other mammals remains to be established.
targetString: په څکالو، میږی خورانو او نورو حیواناتو کې د SARS-CoV-2 د ودې لار تراوسه نه ده موندل شوې.

sourceString: Whereas the highest sequence homology has been found in the RBDs between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin, SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs, SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 share the highest genome-wide sequence homology.

en-mt: While a high range of homology has been found in RBDs between SARS-CoV-2 and ant-siblings، SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs، the high-level genome-wide range between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 has a common homologous range.

sourceString: It is highly speculative that the high degree of similarity between the RBDs of pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs and SARS-CoV-2 is driven by selectivity-mediated convergent evolution.
targetString: دا ډیره اټکلي خبره ده چې د میږی خور د SARS-CoV-2 اړوند beta-CoVs او د SARS-CoV-2 د RBD ګانو ترمنځ د لوړې کچې ورته والی د غوره والي منځګړتوب یوځای کېدلو ودې له کبله دی.
en-mt: It is highly speculated that the sister of the ant is due to the development of the optimal mediating integration between SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs and the SARS-CoV-2 RBDs.

sourceString: A counter-proposal is in favour of a recombination between a pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoV and RaTG13 in the third wild animal species.
targetString: یو بل وړاندیز بیا د دریمو ځنګلي حیواناتو په ډولونو کې د میږی خور SARS-CoV-2 اړوند beta-CoV او د RaTG13 ترمنځ د بیرته تولید پلوي کوي.
en-mt: Another proposal then advocates a re-production between SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoV and RaTG13 in the third wild animal species.

sourceString: As a driving force in evolution, recombination is widespread among beta-CoVs.
targetString: د ودې ځواک یوه پرمخ وړونکي په توګه، د beta-CoVs په منځ کې بېرته تولید ډیر پراخ دي.
en-mt: As a driver of growth power، the re-production of beta-CoVs is more widespread.

sourceString: The jury is still out on the immediate zoonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: د SARS-CoV-2 د حیواني اصلیت په هکله قضاوت تراوسه لرې دی.

sourceString: Besides the highly pathogenic HCoVs, the zoonotic origin of HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-HKU1 have also been studied.
targetString: د دې ترڅنګ د لوړې کچې ناروغ کوونکي HCoVs، HCoV-229E، HCoV-OC43، HCoV-NL63 او HCoV-HKU1 حیواني اصلیت هم مطالعه شوی دی.
en-mt: In addition to this، the origin of highly infectious HCoVs، HCoV-229E، HCoV-OC43، HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-HKU1 have also been studied.

sourceString: Phylogenetic evidence indicated that both HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-229E might have originated from bat CoVs, while the parental viruses of HCoV-OC43 and HCoV-HKU1 have been found in rodents.
targetString: فایلوجېنېټک شواهد دا ښيي چې دواړه HCoV-NL63 او HCoV-229E کېدای شي له څکالي CoVs څخه پیدا شوي وي، پداسې حال کې چې د HCoV-OC43 او HCoV-HKU1 موروثي وېروثونه د موږکانو په کورنۍ کې پیدا شوي دي.
en-mt: Filevious evidence indicates that both HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-229E may have been born from coVs، while hCoV-OC43 and HCoV-HKU1 inherited inherited from mice.

sourceString: It has been reported that a bat CoV termed ARCoV.2 (Appalachian Ridge CoV) detected in North American tricolored bat displayed close relationship with HCoV-NL63.
targetString: رپوټ ورکړی شوی دی چې د ARCoV.2 (Appalachian Ridge CoV) په نوم د څکالي CoV چې د شمالي امریکا د دریو رنګونو په څکالي کې موندل شوی له HCoV-NL63 سره یې نږدې اړیکي ښودلي.
en-mt: It has been reported that arCoV.2 (Appalachian Ridge CoV) found in three colours of North America has been shown to be closely related to HCoV-NL63.

sourceString: On the other hand, HCoV-229E was genetically related to another bat CoV, termed Hipposideros/GhanaKwam/19/2008, which was detected in Ghana, while camelids have also been suspected as its intermediate host.
targetString: له بل پلوه، HCoV-229E له جینیتکي پلوه له بل څکالي CoV سره تړاو لري، چې نوم یې Hipposideros/GhanaKwam/19/2008 دی، چې په ګانا کې موندل شوی، پداسې حال کې چې د اوښانو په کورنۍ یې د منځګړي کوربه په توګه هم شک شتون لري.
en-mt: On the other hand، HCoV-229E is genetically related to another cov، called Hipposideros/GhanaKwam/19/2008، found in Ghana، while the camel family is also suspected of being a mediator host.

sourceString: For clarity, the current knowledge on animal origins of known HCoVs is summarized in Figure ​1 and Table 2.

sourceString: Phylogenetic analysis has provided evidence for interspecies transmission events of HCoVs in the history.
targetString: له تاریخي پلوه د حیواناتو ترمنځ د HCoVs د لیږد پیښو شواهدو لپاره پهیلوجینتیک تحلیلونو شواهد وړاندي کړي دي.
en-mt: Historically، there has been a lot of evidence for the transmission of HCoVs among animals.

sourceString: When HCoV-OC43 crossed species to infect humans from domestic livestock around 1890, a pandemic of respiratory infection was recorded.
targetString: کله چې شاوخوا په 1890 کې له کورنیو حیواناتو HCoV-OC43 انسانانو ته راغی، د تنفسي اخته کېدلو ساري ناروغۍ ثبت شوې.
en-mt: When HCoV-OC43 came into humans from domestic animals around 1890، a respiratory infection was recorded.

sourceString: The interspecies transmission history of HCoV-229E is less clear.
targetString: د حیواناتو ترمنځ د HCoV-229E د لیږد تاریخ لږ وضاحت لري.

sourceString: Bat alpha-CoVs closely related to HCoV-229E have been found.
targetString: د څکالي alpha-CoVs چې له HCoV-229E سره نږدې تړاو لري موندل شوی دی.
en-mt: Alpha-CoVs that are closely related to HCoV-229E have been found.

sourceString: Between them there is an alpaca alpha-CoV.
targetString: د دغو ترمنځ د الپاکا alpha-CoV شتون لري.

sourceString: Several lines of evidence support the transmission of virus from bats to humans directly.
targetString: یو شمیر بیلابیل شواهد د څکالو او انسانانو ترمنځ د وېروسونو د لیږد شواهدو ملاتړ کوي.
en-mt: A number of different evidence supports the transmission of viruses between bats and humans.

sourceString: First, humans but not alpacas might have contact with bats in a shared ecological niche.
targetString: لومړی، کېدای شي په چاپيریالي ساحه کې انسانان نه الپاکا له څکالو سره اړیکي درلودلې.
en-mt: First، it is possible that humans in the environment had no contact with alpaca.

sourceString: Instead, humans have close contact with alpacas.
targetString: خو، انسانان له الپاکا سره نږدې اړیکي لري.
en-mt: Humans are closely related to alpaca.

sourceString: Second, HCoV-229E-related bat alpha-CoVs are diverse and non-pathogenic in bats, whereas alpaca alpha-CoV caused an outbreak of respiratory disease in infected animals.
targetString: دویم، د څکالي alpha-CoVs اړوند د HCoV-229E بیلابیل دي او په څکالو کې نارغۍ منځ ته نه راوړي، پداسې حال کې چې د الپاکا alpha-CoV په اخته شويو حیواناتو کې د تنفسي ناروغۍ د منځ ته راتلو سبب شوي.
en-mt: Second، the hCoV-229E related alpha-CoVs are different and do not cause respiratory infection in the animals infected with alpaca alpha-CoV.

sourceString: Finally, alpaca alpha-CoV has not been found in feral animals.
targetString: په پایله کې، د الپاکا alpha-CoV په ځنګلي حیواناتو کې موندل شوی ندی.
en-mt: As a result، alpaca alpha-CoV has not been found in wild animals.

sourceString: Thus, the possibility cannot be excluded that alpacas obtain the HCoV-229E-related alpha-CoV from humans.
targetString: ځکه نو، دا شونتیا له پامه نشې غورځیدلای چې الپاکا د HCoV-229E اړوند alpha-CoV له انسانانو اخلي.
en-mt: Therefore، it is not possible to overlook the possibility that alpaca takes alpha-CoV-229E from humans.

sourceString: In fact, bats are the direct source of human pathogenic viruses including rabies virus, Ebola virus, Nipah virus and Hendra virus.
targetString: په حقیقت کې، څکالي د انسان د ناروغه کولو وېروسونو مستقیمه سرچینه ده پشمول د لېونې سپي وېروس، د ایبولا وېروس، د نیپها وېروس اود هېندرا وېروس.
en-mt: In fact، tobacco is a direct source of human-causing viruses including the rabies virus، Ebola virus، nipha virus and hendravirus.

sourceString: It is therefore not too surprising that bats might transmit HCoV-229E to humans directly.
targetString: ځکه نو دا ډیره حیرانوونکې خبره نده چې کېدای شي څکالي په مستقیمه توګه HCoV-229E انسانانو ته انتقال کړي.
en-mt: Therefore، it is not surprising that the tobacco can transmit HCoV-229E directly to humans.

sourceString: Alternatively, whereas bat alpha-CoVs serve as the gene pool of HCoV-229E, alpacas and dromedary camels might serve as intermediate hosts that transmit viruses to humans, exactly as in the case of MERS-CoV.
targetString: له بل پلوه، پداسې حال کې چې د څکالي alpha-CoVs د HCoV-229E د وراثت د سرچینې په توګه کار کوي، الپاکا ګانې او د یوه بوک اوښان کېدای شي منځکړي کوربه وي چې انسانانو ته وېروسونه انتقالوي، لکه څرنګه چې یې د MERS-CoV قضیه ښيي.
en-mt: On the other hand، while alcoholic alpha-CoVs act as a source of hCoV-229E inheritance، alpacas and a boak camel may be intermediate hosts that transmit viruses to humans، as shown in the case of MERS-CoV.

sourceString: MERS-CoV serves as an excellent example of interspecies transmission from bats to dromedary camels and from dromedary camels to humans.
targetString: د MERS-CoV له څکالي د یوه بوک اوښانو او د یوه بوک له اوښانو انسانانو ته د حیواناتو ترمنځ د خپرولو یوه ښه بیلګه ده.
en-mt: MERS-CoV is a good example of the spread of a bock camel and a camel from a camel to animals.

sourceString: The evolutionary origin of MERS-CoV from bats is known at its initial identification and has also been strengthened by subsequent findings.
targetString: له څکالو د MERS-CoV د ودې اصلیت په لومړي پړاو کې پېژندل شوی او په وروستیو موندنو کې یې ملاتړ شوی دی.
en-mt: The origins of MERS-CoV growth have been identified in the early stages and have been supported in recent findings.

sourceString: It is obvious that bats provide a rich pool of virus species for interspecies exchange of genetic fragments and interspecies transmission.
targetString: دا روښانه ده چې د وراثت ټوټو او حیواناتو ترمنځ د خپرولو لپاره څکالي د حیواناتو ترمنځ د وېروسونو یوه شتمنه سرچینه ده.
en-mt: It is clear that the virus is a rich source of virus between animals and animals.

sourceString: Longevity, densely packed colonies, close social interaction and strong ability to fly are all favourable conditions for bats to be an ideal 'virus spreader'.
targetString: اوږد عمر، ډیره ګڼه ګوڼه، نږدې ټولنیزې اړیکي او د الوتنې ځواکمن توان ټول هغه ملاتړ کوونکي حالتونه دي چې څکالي د وېروس مناسب خپرونکي اوسي.
en-mt: Long life، overcrowding، close social connections and strong ability to fly are all supporting situations where the virus is a good spread.

sourceString: On the other hand, MERS-CoV has been introduced to dromedary camels for decades.
targetString: له بل پلوه، MERS-CoV د لسیزو په ترڅ کې د یوه بوک اوښانو ته لیږدل شوی دی.
en-mt: On the other hand، MERS-CoV has been transported to a bock camel over the course of decades.

sourceString: It is well adapted to these camels that have turned from an intermediate host to a stable and natural reservoir host.
targetString: دا له دغو حیواناتو سره ښه عادت شوی چې له یوه منځګړي کوربه څخه په یوه باثباته او طبیعي سرچینه بدل شوی.
en-mt: It is well accustomed to these animals being transformed from a medium host into a stable and natural resource.

sourceString: MERS-CoV causes very mild disease and maintains a relatively low mutation rate in these animals.
targetString: د MERS-CoV د ډیري کمې کچې ناروغۍ سبب ګرځي او تر ډیري کچې په دغو حیواناتو کې د بدلون ټیټه کچه ساتي.
en-mt: MERS-CoV causes very low levels of disease and maintains a low level of change in these animals.

sourceString: Its sporadic transmission to humans is an accident and humans remain a dead-end host of MERS-CoV as its transmission cannot be sustained.
targetString: انسانانو ته د دې غیرمنظم لیږد یوه پېښه ده او انسانان د MERS-CoV د پای کوربه دي ځکه چې خپرول یې دوام نشي کولای.
en-mt: This irregular transmission to humans is an event، and humans are the end host of MERS-CoV because its release cannot continue.

sourceString: In contrast to the role of camels in the transmission of MERS-CoV, the role of pangolins, if there is any, in the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 is different.
targetString: د MERS-CoV په لیږد کې د اوښانو وڼدې خلاف، د میږي خور ونډه که کومه وي، د SARS-CoV-2 په خپرولو کې بل ډول ده.
en-mt: Unlike camels in the MERS-CoV transmission، the contribution of the ant's sister to the spread of SARS-CoV-2 is different.

sourceString: Particularly, pangolin beta-CoVs are highly pathogenic in pangolins.
targetString: په ځانګړې توګه، د میږي خور beta-CoVs په میږی خورانو کې په لوړه کچه ناروغه کوونکې دي.
en-mt: In particular، beta-CoVs are highly infectious in the ants.

sourceString: They might be a dead-end host for SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs, similar to civets in the case of SARS-CoV.
targetString: د پیشوګانو کورنیو ته د SARS-CoV په قضیه کې، هغوی کېدای شي د SARS-CoV-2 اړوند د beta-CoVs د پای یو کوربه وي.
en-mt: In the case of SARS-CoV، cats may be a host of beta-CoVs related to SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Several possibilities for interspecies transmission of SARS-CoV-2 from animals to humans have to be ruled in or ruled out in future studies.
targetString: په راتلونکو مطالعو کې له حیواناتو څخه انساناتو ته د SARS-CoV-2 د حیواناتو لپاره د خپرولو بیلابیل شونتیاوې باید ومنل شي یا ونه منل شي.
en-mt: In future studies، various possibility of the spread of SARS-CoV-2 for animals from animals to humans should be acknowledged or not.

sourceString: First, bats could be the reservoir host of a SARS-CoV-2-related virus almost identical to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: لومړی، کېدای شي څکالي د SARS-CoV-2 اړوند وېروس د SARS-CoV-2 ته نږدې د ورته کوربه سرچینه وي.
en-mt: First، the virus may be the source of the SARS-CoV-2-related virus near SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Humans might share the ecological niche with bats through butchering or coal mining.
targetString: کېدای شي انسانان د قصابي یا سکرو کان کېندنو له لارو له څکالو سره ورته چاپیریالي شریکه ساحه ولري.
en-mt: Humans may have a similar environment to a butcher's or a coal mine.

sourceString: Second, pangolins could be one of intermediate amplifying host to which a SARS-CoV-2-related virus had been newly introduced.
targetString: دویم، کېدای شي میږی خوران یو ډیرونکی منځمهاله کوربه وي چې هغوی ته د SARS-CoV-2 اړوند وېروس پدې وروستیو کې لیږدول شوی دی.
en-mt: Second، the ant may be a very intermediate host to which they have recently been transmitted the SARS-CoV-2-related virus.

sourceString: Humans contract the virus through butchering and consumption of game meat.
targetString: انسانان پدغه وېروس د قصابی او د ښکار غوښې خوړلو له لارو اخته کیږي.
en-mt: Humans are infected by butchering and eating meat.

sourceString: It is possible that many mammals including domestic animals are susceptible to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: کېدای شي ډیری ژوي پشمول د کورنیو ژويو د SARS-CoV-2 پر وړاندې کمزوري وي.
en-mt: Many animals، including domestic animals، may be vulnerable to SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: A survey of domestic and wild animals for antibodies is warranted.
targetString: د انتي باډي ګانو لپاره د کورنیو او ځنګلي حیواناتو یوه سروې اړینه ده.
en-mt: A survey of domestic and wild animals is necessary for antibodies.

sourceString: Third, as mentioned above, recombination and adaptation of SARS-CoV-2 might have occurred in a third species that has contact with both bats and pangolins.
targetString: دریم، لکه څرنګه چې پورته ویل شوي، کېدای شي د SARS-CoV-2 د بیرته ترکیب او عادت کولو په دریمو حیواناتو کې منځ ته راغلي وي چې له دواړو څکالو او میږي خورانو سره اړیکي لري.
en-mt: The third، as stated above، may have occurred in the third animal of SARS-CoV-2 re-synthesis and habitation associated with both alcoholics and ants.

sourceString: The search for the animal origins of SARS-CoV-2 is still on.
targetString: د SARS-CoV-2 د حیواني اصلیت لټون اوسم هم روان دی.
en-mt: The search for the origin of SARS-CoV-2 is still ongoing.

sourceString: Apart from different types of the animal hosts, three major factors on the viral side are also important in facilitating CoVs to cross species barriers.
targetString: د کوربه حیواناتو له بیلابیلو ډولونو پرته، حیواناتو ته د CoVs لیږد آسانتیا لپاره له وېروسي پلوه درې مهم لاملونه هم مهم دي.
en-mt: Apart from the various types of host animals، there are also three important factors for facilitating the transmission of CoVs to animals.

sourceString: First of all, their relatively high mutation rates in RNA replication.
targetString: تر ټولو لومړی، د RNA بېرته تولید کې تر ډیره د هغوی د لوړ بدلون کچه.
en-mt: First of all، the RNA re-production is mostly their high rate of change.

sourceString: In comparison to other single-stranded RNA viruses, the estimated mutation rates of CoVs could be regarded as “moderate” to “high” with an average substitution rate being ~10-4 substitution per year per site 2, depending on the phase of CoV adaptation to novel hosts.
targetString: د نورو RNA د یوه تار وېروسونو په پرتله، کېدای شي د CoVs د اټکلیز بدلون کچه له "منځني" تر "لوړې" کچې وي، او د بدلون منځنی کچه یې ~10-4 په هرکال کې په هرې 2 ساحې کې، او دا د نوي کوربه د CoV په پړاو پورې اړه لري.
en-mt: Compared to a string of RNA viruses، the estimated conversion rate of CoVs can range from "medium" to "high"، and the average rate of change is ~10-4 per 2 areas per year، depending on the phase of coV of the new host.

sourceString: CoVs have a proof-reading exoribonuclease, deletion of which results in exceedingly high mutability and attenuation or even inviability.
targetString: CoVs د ایکزوريبونیوکلیس تصحیح کول لري، چې د لرې کولو پایله یې د لوړې کچې بدلون او کموالی یا نه دوام دی.
en-mt: CoVs have an azozoybonolysis correction، resulting in high levels of change and decreased or not continuing.

sourceString: Interestingly, the nucleotide analogue Remdesivir is known to suppress CoV replication through inhibition of this exoribonuclease and the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase.
targetString: د پام وړ خبره داده چې د نیوکلیوتاید انالوګ ریمدسویر پېژندل شوی چې د دغه ایکزوريبونیوکلیس او د RNA-اړوند RNA پالیمیرز له لارې د CoV بیا تولید مخنیوی کوي.
en-mt: It is noteworthy that the nucleotide analogue remedesvir is known to inhibit coV reproduction through this eszorbonuclease and RNA-related polymerases.

sourceString: Remdesivir is one of most promising anti-SARS-CoV-2 agents to be tested in clinical trials.
targetString: ریمدسویر د SARS-CoV-2 عاملونو ضد ډیر هڅوونکی دی ترڅو په کلنیکي توګه وآزمویل شي.
en-mt: Remedesvir is a very encouraging anti-SARS-CoV-2 agent to be tested clinically.

sourceString: Nevertheless, mutation rates of CoVs are about a million times higher than those of their hosts.
targetString: خو، د هغوی د کوربه په پرتله د CoVs د بدلون کچه نږدې یو مليون برابره زیاته ده.
en-mt: However، the conversion rate of CoVs is nearly one million times greater than their host.

sourceString: In addition, mutation rate is often high when CoVs are not well adapted to the host.
targetString: پردې برسېره، د بدلون کچه هغه وخت زیاته وي کله چې CoVs له کوربه سره ښه عادت نه وي.
en-mt: In addition، the rate of change is higher when CoVs are not well accustomed to the host.

sourceString: Compared to SARS-CoV with a high mutation rate, the mutation rate of SARS-CoV-2 is apparently lower, suggestive of a higher level of adaptation to humans.
targetString: د SARS-CoV په پرتله د لوړې کچې بدلون، لیدل کیږي چې د SARS-CoV-2 بدلون کچه ټیټه ده، چې له انسانانو سره د لوړې کچې عادت په مانا ده.
en-mt: The higher level of change compared to SARS-CoV is observed to be low، meaning high levels of habitation with humans.

sourceString: Presumably, it has already been adapted to another host close to humans.
targetString: کېدای شي دا له وړاندي انسانانو ته ورته نږدې کوربه سره عادت شوی وي.
en-mt: It may be used to the same host as the host.

sourceString: In addition to SARS-CoV-2, this also applies to MERS-CoV, which is well adapted to dromedary camels.
targetString: په SARS-CoV-2 برسېره، دا د MERS-CoV لپاره هم اړوند دی، چې د یوه بوک له اوښانو سره ښه عادت شوی دی.
en-mt: In addition to SARS-CoV-2، it is also related to MERS-CoV، which has become well accustomed to camels from a boko haram.

sourceString: Theoretically, it is unlikely that genetic drift would render vaccines and antivirals against SARS-CoV-2 ineffective quickly.
targetString: له نظري پلوه، دا ناشونې ده چې جینیتک بدلون به د SARS-CoV-2 پر وړاندې واکسینونه او د وېروس ضد ډیر ژر بې اغیزه ثابت کړي.
en-mt: Theoretically، it is impossible that genetic change will prove effective against SARS-CoV-2 vaccines and anti-virus very soon.

sourceString: Second, the large RNA genome in CoVs exerts extra plasticity in genome modification for mutations and recombination, thereby increasing the probability for interspecies co-evolution, which is advantageous for the emergence of novel CoVs when the conditions become appropriate.
targetString: دویم، په CoVs کې لوی د RNA جینوم د بدلون او بیرته ترکیب لّاره د جینوم په بدلون کې زیات نرم والی کاروي، ځکه نو د حیواناتو ترمنځ د ګډې – ودې شونتیا زیاتوي، کله چې حالت مناسب شي د نوي CoVs منځ راتلو لپاره ګټور دی.
en-mt: Second، large RNA genome changes and re-synthesis in CoVs use greater flexibility in changing the genome، thus increasing the possibility of inter-animal co-development، which، when appropriate، is beneficial for the emergence of new CoVs.

sourceString: This is supported by the copious unique open reading frames and protein functions encoded towards the 3′ end of the genome.
targetString: د دې ملاتړ د جینوم په پای کې د 3′ کود شوي پرانیستي لوستلو چوکاټونه او د پروتینونو زیات ځانګړی فعالیت کوي.
en-mt: This supports up to 3′ open read frames and more specific functions of proteins at the end of the genome.

sourceString: Third, CoVs randomly and frequently switch templates during RNA replication through a unique “copy-choice” mechanism.
targetString: دریم، CoVs د یوه ځانګړي" نسخې غوراوي" میکانیزم له لارې د RNA بيرته تولید په ترڅ کې غیرمنظم او بیاځلې ټیمپلیټونه بدلوي.
en-mt: Third، CoVs change irregular and repeated templates during RNA recovery through a specific "version option" mechanism.

sourceString: In a host that serves as the mixing vessel, strand switching occurs frequently during CoV RNA transcription.
targetString: په یوه کوربه کې د چې د ګډې د لوښې په توګه خدمت کوي، د CoV د RNA ثبت په ترڅ کې د تار بدلون په مکرره توګه منځ ته راځي.
en-mt: In a host that serves as a joint character، the wire changes frequently during coV RNA recording.

sourceString: Highly homologous full-length and subgenomic RNAs could recombine to generate new CoVs.
targetString: د لوړې کچې ورته د بشپړ-اوږدوالي او فرعي جینومیک RNA گانې کېدای شي بیرته سره یوځای شي ترڅو نوي CoV ګانې تولید کړي.
en-mt: Similar high-level full-length and sub-genomic RNA can be re-integrated to produce new CoV.

sourceString: Phylogenetic evidence of natural recombination has been found in both HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-OC43, as well as animal CoVs such as bat SL-CoV and batCoV-HKU9.
targetString: د طبیعي بیرته ترکیب پهیلوجینتیک شواهد په دواړو HCoV-HKU1 او HCoV-OC43 کې، او هم د حیواناتو په CoV ګانو لکه د څکالي SL-CoV او د څکالي CoV-HKU9 کې موندل شوي دي.
en-mt: Evidence of natural recovery has been found in both HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-OC43، as well as in animal CoVs such as sl-CoV and cov-hku9.

sourceString: Virus-host interaction in relation to transmission
targetString: د لیږد اړوند د وېروس-کوربه اړیکي
en-mt: Transmission-related virus-host relationship

sourceString: Besides three viral factors stated above, viral interaction with host receptor is another key factor influential on interspecies transmission.
targetString: د وېروسي دریو عاملونو ترڅنګ چې پورته یاد شوي، د حیواناتو ترمنځ لیږد د کوربه اخیستونکي سره وېروسې اړیکه یو بل مهم عامل دی.
en-mt: In addition to the three viral factors mentioned above، transmission between animals and the host is another important factor.

sourceString: Herein, recombination of SARS-CoV is taken as a typical example, which also showed evidence of positive selection during interspecies transmission events.
targetString: ځکه نو، د SARS-CoV بېرته ترکیب د یوې عامې بیلګې په توګه اخیستل شوی، چې د حیواناتو ترمنځ د لیږد پېښو په ترڅ کې د مثبت غوراوي شواهد يې هم ښودلي.
en-mt: Therefore، the re-synthesis of SARS-CoV has been taken as a common example، showing evidence of positive selection in cases of transmission between animals.

sourceString: Based on the comparative analysis between isolates of human and civet SARS-CoVs, SARS-CoV is thought to undergo rapid adaptation in different hosts, particularly with mutations at the RBD of the S protein.
targetString: د انسان او پیشو د SARS-CoVs او SARS-CoV ترمنځ د پرتله کېدونکو تحلیلونو پربنسټ فکر کیږي چې په بیلابیلو کوربو کې، په ځانګړې توګه د S پروتین د RBD بدلونونو کې تر چټک عادت کولو تیریږي.
