en-mt: Based on comparable analyses between human and cat SARS-CoVs and SARS-CoV، it is thought that in different corbos، especially in the RBD changes in S protein، it is thought to be going through rapid habitation.

sourceString: Generally, the RBD in the S protein of a CoV interacts with the cellular receptor and is intensely selected by the host antibody response.
targetString: عموماً، د یوه CoV د S پروتین RBD د حجروي اخیستونکي سره اړیکه نیسي او د کوربه د انتیباډي د ځواب لخوا په ځواکمنه توګه غوره کیږي.
en-mt: Typically، the RBD of a CoV S protein communicates with the cell receptor and is strongly preferred by the response of the host's antibody.

sourceString: In SARS-CoV, the RBD is in the 318th to 510th amino acids on the S1 fragment, which binds to the human ACE2 as well as its coreceptors for viral entry.
targetString: په SARS-CoV کې، د S1 په ټوټې کې RBD له 318مې څخه تر 510مې امینو اسیدونو کې ده چې د انسان له ACE2 او د وېروسي دننه کېدلو لپاره له ملګرو اخیستونکو سره نښلي.
en-mt: In SARS-CoV، RBD in the S1 fragment is in the 318th to 510th amino acids that attach to human ACE2 and to companion recipients for viral entry.

sourceString: The RBD of SARS-CoV is capable of recognizing the ACE2 receptors of various animals, including bat, civet, mouse and raccoon dog, allowing interspecies transmission of the virus.
targetString: د SARS-CoV، RBD کولای شي د بیلابیلو حیواناتو، پشمول د څکالي، پیشو، موږک او رکون سپي د ACE2 اخیستونکي وپیژني، چې د حیواناتو ترمنځ د وېروس خپرېدلو ته اجازه ورکوي.
en-mt: The SARS-CoV، RBD can identify ace2 receptors for various animals، including dogs، cats، mice and reptiles، allowing the spread of the virus among animals.

sourceString: In fact, only 6 amino acid residues were observed to be different from human and civet viral isolates in the RBD and 4 of them locate in the receptor-binding motif for interaction with the ACE2 receptor.
targetString: په حقیقت کې، لیدل شوي چې په RBD کې یوازې 6 امینو اسید پاته شونې له انسان او ځنګلي پیشو څخه توپیر درلود او 4 یې د ACE2 اخیستونکي سره د اړیکو لپاره د اخیستونکي-نښلولو طرحې کې موقعیت لري.
en-mt: In fact، it has been observed that only 6 amino acid residues in RBD were different from that of human and wild cats، and 4 were located in a receptor-binding scheme to communicate with ace2 receptor.

sourceString: Civet SARS-CoV has K479N and S487T mutations in its RBD, which might increase the affinity of the interaction of spike protein with human ACE2 receptor.
targetString: د پیشو SARS-CoV په خپل RBD کې K479N او S487T بدلونونه لري، چې کېدای شي د انسان د ACE2 له اخیستونکي سره د سپایک پروتین اړیکي لیوالتیا زیاتوي.
en-mt: The cat SARS-CoV has changes in K479N and S487T in its RBD، which may increase the spike protein relationship with the human ACE2 receptor.

sourceString: In other words, these two amino acid substitutions might be critical to viral adaption to humans.
targetString: په بل عبارت، د دې دواړه امینو اسیدونو بدلونونه کېدای شي له انسانانو سره د وېروسې عادت کولو لپاره مهم وي.
en-mt: In other words، changes in both of these amino acids may be important for humans to become accustomed to the virus.

sourceString: It is noteworthy that SARS-CoV-2 shares the same cellular receptor with SARS-CoV.
targetString: د ویلو وړ ده چې د SARS-CoV-2 له SARS-CoV سره ورته ګډ حجروي اخیستونکي لري.
en-mt: It is said that SARS-CoV-2 has a common cell receptor similar to SARS-CoV.

sourceString: A 30% difference between SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV in the S1 unit of the S protein implicates that the binding affinity of its S protein with human ACE2 might have altered.
targetString: د S پروتین د S1 واحد کې د SARS-CoV-2 او SARS-CoV ترمنځ 30% توپیر دا ښيي چې د انسان د ACE2 سره د S پروتین د نښلیدلو لیوالتیا یې کېدای شي بدلون کړی وي.
en-mt: The 30% difference between SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV in the S1 unit of S protein indicates that the desire to attach s protein to ACE2 may have changed.

sourceString: Indeed, a cryo-EM study indicates a 10- to 20-fold higher affinity of this binding than that between human ACE2 and SARS-CoV S protein.
targetString: په رښتیا، د cryo-EM یوې مطالعې ښودلي چې له 10 تر 20 د نښلیدلو لیوالتیا لوړه کچه، ترهغې چې د انسان د ACE2 او د SARS-CoV S پروتین ترمنځ ده.
en-mt: Indeed، a study of cryo-EM showed a high rate of 10 to 20 attachment cravings، as long as there is a correlation between human ACE2 and SARS-CoV S protein.

sourceString: It will also be of interest to determine whether any other coreceptor might be required for SARS-CoV-2 transmission.
targetString: دا به هم د لیوالتیا وړ خبره وي تر څو دا مالومه کړو چې آیا د ملګرو اخیستونکي کوم یو یې کېدای شي د SARS-CoV-2 خپریدلو لپاره اړین وي.
en-mt: It will also be interesting to find out if any of the recipients of the partner may be necessary for the spread of SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Intriguingly, HCoV-NL63 also binds to ACE2 but with a different part of S.
targetString: حیرانوونکې خبره ده چې HCoV-NL63 هم له ACE2 سره نښلي خو د S له یوي بلي برخې سره.
en-mt: It's surprising that HCoV-NL63 also connects with ACE2، but with a different part of the S.

sourceString: There exist many other HCoV receptors, such as aminopeptidase N for HCoV-229E, and 9-O-acetylated sialic acid for HCoV-OC43.
targetString: د HCoV ډیری اخیستونکي شتون لري، لکه د HCoV-229E لپاره د امينو پيپټائيډز N، او د HCoV-OC43 لپاره د 9-O-ايسيټائليټيډ سيالک اسید.
en-mt: There are many HCoV receptors، such as amino peptides N for HCoV-229E، and 9-O-acetyloid sial acid for HCoV-OC43.

sourceString: They might also account for successful adaptation of these CoVs in humans after interspecies transmission from their animal hosts.
targetString: له خپل حیواني کوربه څخه د حیواناتو ترمنځ له خپرېدلو وروسته هغوی کېدای شي د دغو CoVs د بریالي عادت کولو لپاره هم په پام کې ونیول شي.
en-mt: After spreading among animals from their animal host، they may also be considered for the successful habitation of these CoVs.

sourceString: In addition to cellular receptors, the outcome of interspecies transmission of HCoVs is also governed by other host dependency and restriction factors.
targetString: د حجروي اخیستونکو برسېره، د حیواناتو ترمنځ د HCoVs خپریدلو پایله د بل کوربه اړتیا او محدودیت عاملونو لخوا هم اداره کیږي.
en-mt: In addition to cellular receptors، the result of the spread of HCoVs among animals is also managed by another host's need and restriction factors.

sourceString: The divergence of these host proteins between humans and natural reservoir hosts of HCoVs such as bats, dromedary camels and rodents might constitute a barrier to interspecies transmission.
targetString: د HCoVs لکه د څکالو، د یوه بوک اوښانو، موږکانو د انسانانو او طبیعي سرچینو کوربو ترمنځ د دغو کوربه پروتینونو توپیر کېدای شي د حیواناتو ترمنځ د خپریدلو یوه خنډ په توګه وي.
en-mt: The differences between hCoVs such as bats، bocan camels، rats، humans and natural-sourced corbo may be a barrier to the spread of these host proteins among animals.

sourceString: HCoVs have to usurp host dependency factors and subvert host restriction factors for a successful interspecies transmission.
targetString: د حیواناتو ترمنځ د بریالي خپریدلو لپاره HCoVs باید د کوربه اړتیا له عاملونو تیر شي او د کوربه محدودیت لاملونه له منځه یوسي.
en-mt: In order to successfully spread between animals، HCoVs must overcome the factors of host need and eliminate the causes of host restriction.

sourceString: In this regard, molecular determinants in this important area of virus-host interaction remain to be identified and characterized.
targetString: ځکه نو، د وېروس-کوربه اړیکي په دغه مهمه ساحه کې مالیکولي عاملونه اوس هم باید وپېژندل شي او تشریح شي.
en-mt: Therefore، the molecular factors in this important area of the virus-host relationship still need to be identified and explained.

sourceString: An unbiased genome-wide screening of host dependency and restriction factors for SARS-CoV-2 using the state-of-the-art technology of CRISPR might be fruitful.
targetString: کېدای شي د CRISPR عصري ټیکنالوجۍ څخه کار اخیستنه د SARS-CoV-2 د کوربه اړتیا او خنډ عاملونو لپاره د جینوم-پراخې بې پرې معاینې لپاره ګټور وي.
en-mt: The use of modern CRISPR technology may be useful for genome-wide neutral testing of SARS-CoV-2 host requirements and barrier factors.

sourceString: Emergence of novel HCoVs: back to ground zero
targetString: د نوي HCoVs منځ ته راتلل: بېرته اصلي ځای ته
en-mt: The emergence of new HCoVs: back to the original

sourceString: The diversity of bat CoVs provides ample opportunities for the emergence of novel HCoVs.
targetString: د څکالي د CoVs ډیر ډولونه د نوي HCoVs منځ ته راتلو لپاره ډیري موقعې برابروي.
en-mt: Many types of CoVs provide many opportunities for the emergence of new HCoVs.

sourceString: In this sense, bat CoVs serve as the gene pool of HCoVs.
targetString: ځکه نو، د څکالي HCoVs د HCoVs جین زیرمې سرچینه ده.
en-mt: Therefore، the hCoVs are the source of hCoVs gene storage.

sourceString: In addition, rapid mutation and genetic recombination also drive HCoV evolution and serve as two important steps in this process.
targetString: پردې برسیره، چټک بدلون او جینیتیک بېرته ترکیب هم د HCoV ودې کې ونډه لري او پدغه لړۍ کې د دوو مهمو ګامونو په توګه کار کوي.
en-mt: In addition، rapid change and genetic re-synthesis also contribute to the growth of HCoV and serve as two key steps in this series.

sourceString: For example, the acquisition or loss of novel protein-coding genes has the potential to drastically modify viral phenotypes.
targetString: د بیلګې په توګه، د نوي پروتین-کود کولو جینونو لاسته راوړل یا له لاسه ورکول دا توان لري ترڅو په شدیده توګه وېروسي پهینوټایپ بدل کړي.
en-mt: For example، the acquisition or loss of new protein-coding genes has the potential to drastically alter the viral oninotype.

sourceString: Among SARS-CoV accessory proteins, ORF8 has been thought to be important in adaptation to humans, as SARS-CoV-related bat viruses were isolated but found to encode divergent ORF8 proteins.
targetString: د SARS-CoV ملګرو پروتینونو په منځ کې، فکر کیږي چې ORF8 له انسان سره په عادت کولو کې مهم دی، لکه څرنګه چې د SARS-CoV اړوند د څکالي وېروثونه منزوي شوي خو موندل شوي چې د ORF8 بیلابیل پروتینونه اینکود کوي.
en-mt: Among the SARS-CoV-associated proteins، ORF8 is thought to be important in the habit of humans، as THE SARS-CoV-related proteins have been isolated but have been found to contain different ORF8 proteins.

sourceString: A 29-nucleotide deletion characteristic of SARS-CoVs has been found in strains isolated at the beginning of the human epidemic.
targetString: د یو 29-نیوکلیوتاید لري کول چي د SARS-CoVs ځانګړتیا ده د انساني ساري ناروغیو د پیل بیل شوي وېروسونو کې موندل شي.
en-mt: The removal of a 29-nucleotide characteristic of SARS-CoVs can be found in human infectious disease outbreaks.

sourceString: This deletion splits ORF8 into ORF8a and ORF8b and is thought to be an adaptive mutation that promotes the switch of hosts.
targetString: دا لرې کول ORF8 په ORF8a او ORF8b کې سره جلا کوي او فکر کیږي چې د کوربه د بدلولو هڅولو کې یو عادتي بدلون دی.
en-mt: This removal separates ORF8 in ORF8a and ORF8b and is thought to be a habitual change in inducing the conversion of the host.

sourceString: Besides, SARS-CoV has a possible recombination history with lineages of alpha- and gamma-CoVs, where a large number of smaller recombinant regions were identified in the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase.
targetString: د دې ترڅنګ، د SARS-CoV د یو ممکنه بېرته ترکیب تاریخچه لري چې کورنۍ یې د الفا او ګيما-CoVs دي، چېرته چې د RNA اړ د RNA پالیمرز د بېرته یوځای کېدلو وړې ساحې موندل شوي.
en-mt: In addition، SARS-CoV has a history of a possible re-synthesis of alpha and gamma-CoVs، where small areas of RNA-forcing RNA polymerase re-integration have been found.

sourceString: Recombination locations were also identified in the nsp9, most of nsp10, and parts of nsp14.
targetString: د بېرته ترکیب موقعیتونه هم په nsp9، ډیریو nsp10، او د nsp14 برخو کې هم پېژندل شوي.
en-mt: The re-composition positions are also known in nsp9، most nsp10، and nsp14 parts.

sourceString: Likewise, it has been shown that the epidemic MERS-CoV experienced recombination events between different lineages, which occurred in dromedary camels in Saudi Arabia.
targetString: په ورته توګه، دا ښودل شوې چې د MERS-CoV ساري ناروغي د بیلابیلو کورنیو په منځ کې د بېرته ترکیب تجربه کړې، چې د سعودي عربستان د یوه بوک په اوښان کې منځ ته راغلي.
en-mt: Similarly، it has been shown that MERS-CoV infectious disease experienced a re-synthesis among different families، which occurred in the camels of a Boko Haram in Saudi Arabia.

sourceString: Besides SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, recombination events have also been observed in other HCoVs, in which the HCoVs recombine with other animal CoVs in their non-structural genes.
targetString: د دې ترڅنګ د SARS-CoV او MERS-CoV د بېرته ترکیب پیښې په نورو HCoVs کې هم لیدل شوي دي، په دغو کې HCoVs د حیوان له بل CoVs سره د هغوی د غیر-طبیعي جوړښت جینونو کې بېرته ګډیږي.
en-mt: In addition to sars-CoV and MERS-CoV back-synthesis events have also been observed in other HCoVs، in which HCoVs of the animal fuse back into their non-naturally structured genes.

sourceString: It should also be cautioned that artificial selection can contribute to unintended changes in viral genomes, most likely resulting from relieving viruses from selection pressures exerted, such as by the host immune system.
targetString: دا هم باید په پام کې ونیول شي چې مصنوعي غوراوی کېدای شي د وېروسي جینومز په بدلون کې بې موخې برخه واخلي، تر ډیري کچې پایله یې له غوره شوي راوړل شوي فشارونو څخه، لکه د کوربه مصؤنیت سیستم لخوا د وېروسونو خلاصون وي.
en-mt: It should also be noted that artificial preferences may contribute to a non-objective part of viral genome change، mostly resulting in the release of viruses from selected strains، such as the release of viruses by the host immune system.

sourceString: An example of these effects is the loss of a full-length ORF4 in the HCoV-229E prototype strain, owing to a two-nucleotide deletion.
targetString: د دغو اغیزونو یوه بیلګه په HCoV-229E کې د یوه بشپړ اوږدوالي د ORF4 له لاسه ورکول وي، چې د دوو نیوکلیوتاید لرې کولو له کبله ده.
en-mt: One example of these effects is the loss of ORF4 due to the removal of two nucleotides in HCoV-229E.

sourceString: While intact ORF4 could be observed in bat and camel viruses related to HCoV-229E, the alpaca alpha-CoV displays a single nucleotide insertion, resulting in a frameshift.
targetString: پداسې حال کې چې بشپړ ORF4 کېدای شي د څکالي او اوښ په وېروسونو کې چې HCoV-229E پورې اړوند دي ولیدل شي، د الپاکا الفا-CoV دنښلیدلو یو انفرادي نیوکلیوتاید ښيي، چې پایله یې بدلون وي.
en-mt: While full ORF4 can be observed in the virus that is hCoV-229E، alpaca alpha-CoV-infused shows an individual nucleotide، resulting in mutations.

sourceString: Last but not least, the evolution of novel HCoVs is also driven by the selection pressure in their reservoir hosts.
targetString: په پایله کې، د نوي HCoVs وده هم د خپلو کوربو په زیرمو کې هم د غوراوي فشار لخوا پرمخ وړل کیږي.
en-mt: As a result، the growth of new HCoVs is also driven by the pressure of choice in their home deposits.

sourceString: Asymptomatic or only mild symptoms were detected when bats were infected with CoVs, indicating the mutual adaptation between CoVs and bats.
targetString: له نښې پرته ناروغي یا یووازې د کمې نښې ناروغي موندل شوي کله چې څکالي په CoVs اخته شوي، دا د CoVs او څکالو ترمنځ ګډ عادت کول ښيي.
en-mt: Asymptomatic disease or single-symptom disease has been found when smokers have been infected with CoVs، indicating a common habitation between CoVs and smokers.

sourceString: It appeared that bats are well adapted to CoVs anatomically and physiologically.
targetString: داسې ښکاري چې څکالي په اتوماتیکه او فیزیولوجیکي توګه له CoVs سره ښه عادت شوي.
en-mt: It seems that the drink has become well accustomed to CoVs automatically and physiologically.

sourceString: For example, defects in the activation of pro-inflammatory response in bats efficiently reduce the pathology triggered by CoVs.
targetString: د بیلګې په توګه، په څکالو کې د پاړسوبي غبرګون فعالیت کې عوارض په فعاله توګه د CoVs لخوا د پتالوجي فعالیدل کموي.
en-mt: For example، complications in the passive response activity in the drinkers are actively reducing the activation of petiles by CoVs.

sourceString: Besides, the natural killer cell activity in bats is suppressed due to upregulation of inhibitory natural killer cell receptor NKG2/CD94 and low expression level of major histocompatibility complex class I molecules.
targetString: د دې ترڅنګ، په څکالو کې د طبیعي وژنې حجرې فعالیت د طبیعي وژونکي حجرې اخسیستونکي NKG2/CD94 او د ټیټې کچې اصلي برابری I درجي مالیکولونو د مخنیوي پورته فعالیت له کبله یي مخنیوی کیږي.
en-mt: Furthermore، the activity of natural killer cells in the drinkers is inhibited by the high-inhibitory activity of the natural killer cell-killer NKG2/CD94 and low-level main-equivalent I-grade molecules.

sourceString: Moreover, the high level of reactive oxygen species (ROS) generated from high metabolic activity of bats could both suppress CoV replication and affects proofreading by exoribonuclease, thus providing the selection pressure for the generation of virus strains highly pathogenic when introduced into a new host.
targetString: پردې برسېره، د لوړې کچې غبرګون آکسیجن ډولونو (ROS) چې د څکالو د لوړ میتابولیک فعالیت له کبله تولیدیږي کېدای شي دواړه د CoV بېرته تولید او د ایکسوریبونیکلیس لخوا د تصحیح اغیزونو مخنیوی وکړي، ځکه نو کله چې ډیر ناروغه کوونکی وېروس یوه نوي کوربه ته لیږدول کیږي د تولید لپاره د غورواوي فشار برابروي.
en-mt: In addition، high-reactive oxygen species (ROS) produced due to high metabolic activity of the drinkers may both reproduce CoV and prevent the effects of aging by xuribonics، so when more pathogenic viruses are transported to a new host، they provide a compressing pressure for production.

sourceString: More pathogenic CoV strains might also evolve by recombination, leading to the acquisition of novel proteins or protein features for host adaptation.
targetString: ډیر ناروغه کوونکي CoV وېروسونه کېدای شي د بېرته ترکیب سره بدلون وکړي، او له کوربه سره د عادت کولو لپاره نوي پروتینونو یا د پروتین بڼې اخلي.
en-mt: More infectious CoV viruses may change with a re-synthesis، and take new proteins or protein forms to get used to the host.

sourceString: Thus, it is not by chance that three novel HCoVs have emerged in the past two decades.
targetString: ځکه نو، دا په چانس سره نده چې په تیرو دوو لسیزو کې درې نوي HCoVs منځ ته راغلي دي.
en-mt: So، it's unlikely that there have been three new HCoVs in the last two decades.

sourceString: CoVs are non-pathogenic or cause mild symptoms in their reservoir hosts such as bats and camels.
targetString: CoVs د خپلو کوربه په زېرمو کې لکه د څکالو او اوښانو کې غیر ناروغه کوونکي دي یا د کمې ناروغی سبب ګرځي.
en-mt: CoVs are non-pathogens in their host stores، such as camels and camels، or cause fewer illnesses.

sourceString: They replicate robustly without eliciting a strong host immune response.
targetString: هغوی په چټکی سره بېرته تولید کوي پرته لدې چې د کوربه مصؤنیت سیستم ځواکمن غبرګون وښيي.
en-mt: They quickly reproduce without a strong response from the host's immune system.

sourceString: Herein lie the secrets of why asymptomatic carriers are seen and what causes the severe cases in human infection.
targetString: ځکه نو دلته یو راز شتون لري چې ولې بې نښې ناروغان لیدل کیږي او د انسان په اخته کېدو کې د سختو قضیو سبب څه ګرځي.
en-mt: Therefore، there is a mystery as to why the symptoms of non-symptoms are observed and what causes severe cases of infected people.

sourceString: The severe symptoms are mainly due to the hyperactivation of immune response and the cytokine storm wherein the stronger the immune response, the more severe the lung damage.
targetString: سختې علامې په اصل کې د مصؤنیت غبرګون د لوړ فعالیت او د سایتوکاین ستورم له کبله دي، یانې هرڅومره چې د مصؤنیت غبرګون ځواکمن وي، د سږو تاوان هم زیات وي.
en-mt: Severe symptoms are primarily due to the high activity of the immune response and the cytokine star، the stronger the immune response، the greater the damage to the lungs.

sourceString: In contrast, in asymptomatic carriers, the immune response has been de-coupled from CoV replication.
targetString: په بل عبارت، په بې نښې ناروغانو کې د مصؤنیت غبرګون د CoV له بیا تولید څخه جلا شوی دی.
en-mt: In other words، the immune response in patients without symptoms is isolated from cov reproduction.

sourceString: The same strategy of delinking the immune response might have beneficial effects in anti-SARS-CoV-2 therapy.
targetString: د مصؤنیت غبرګون د جلا کولو ورته سټراتیژي کېدای شي د SARS-CoV-2 ضد درملنه کې ګټور اغیزونه ولري.
en-mt: Similar strategies to isolate the immune response may have beneficial effects on the treatment of SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: The interferon response is particularly strong in bats.
targetString: په څکالو کې د اینترفیران غبرګون په ځانګړې توګه ځواکمن دی.
en-mt: The reaction of the interphernable in the bottles is particularly strong.

sourceString: Thus, administration of type I interferon at least in the early phase of SARS-CoV-2 infection in humans should be beneficial.
targetString: ځکه نو، په SARS-CoV-2 د انسانانو اخته کېدلو په لومړني پړاو کې د I ډول اینترفیران ورکول باید ګټور وي.
en-mt: Therefore، giving interfarane i type I in early human infection with SARS-CoV-2 should be beneficial.

sourceString: In addition, NLRP3 inflammasome activation in bats is defective.
targetString: پردې برسېره، په څکالو کې د NLRP3 اینفلاماسوم فعالول عوارض لري.
en-mt: In addition، there are complications of nlrp3 inflamsum activation in the pot.

sourceString: By this reasoning, inhibition of NLRP3 inflammasome with MCC950 might be useful in the treatment of COVID-19.
targetString: پدغه استدلال سره، له MCC950 سره د NLRP3 اینفلاماسوم مخنیوی کېدای شي د COVID-19 په درملنه کې ګټور وي.
en-mt: With this argument، the prevention of NLRP3 influenza with MCC950 may be helpful in the treatment of COVID-19.

sourceString: The emergence of SARS-CoV-2 follows the general theme by which SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV arose.
targetString: د SARS-CoV-2 منځ ته راتلل هغه عمومي نظر تعقیبوي چې SARS-CoV او MERS-CoV منځ ته راغلل.
en-mt: The emergence of SARS-CoV-2 follows the general view that SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV originated.

sourceString: Whereas a bat beta-CoV sharing 95% nucleotide homology with SARS-CoV has been found, there also exists a bat-CoV sharing 96% nucleotide homology with SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: پداسې حال کې چې موندل شوي چې د یوه څکالي beta-CoV له SARS-CoV سره 95% نیوکلیوتاید ورته والی شریکوي، د یو څکالي bat-CoV هم شتون لري چې له SARS-CoV-2 سره 96% نیوکلیوتاید جوړښت شریکوي.
en-mt: While beta-CoV has been found to share 95% nucleotide similarity to SARS-CoV، there is also a single bat-CoV that shares a 96% nucleotide structure with SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Whereas civets and other animals in the markets have been found to harbour viruses identical to SARS-CoV, immediate intermediate hosts for SARS-CoV-2 have not been identified.
targetString: پداسې حال کې چې په مارکیټونو کې پیشوګانې او نور حیوانات موندل شوي چې SARS-CoV ته ورته وېروسونه لري، د SARS-CoV-2 لپاره نږدې منځګړی کوربه پېژندل شوی ندی.
en-mt: While cats and other animals have been found in markets to have viruses similar to SARS-CoV، the near-intermediate host for SARS-CoV-2 is not known.

sourceString: Pangolin beta-CoVs strikingly homologous to SARS-CoV-2 have been found, indicating that pangolins might serve as one of intermediate hosts or pangolin beta-CoVs could contribute gene fragments to the final version of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: موندل شوي چې د میږی خور beta-CoVs ډیر د SARS-CoV-2 ته ورته دی، دا ښيي چې میږی خوران کېدای شي د منځګړي کوربه ګانو په توګه وي یا د میږی خور beta-CoVs کېدای شي د SARS-CoV-2 د پایلې بیلګې کې د جین ټوټو سره برخه واخلي.
en-mt: It has been found that ant-sister beta-CoVs are more similar to SARS-CoV-2، indicating that the ant feed may be as intermediary hosts or ant-sister beta-CoVs may be participating with gene fragments in the resulting example of SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Although questions remain, there is no evidence that SARS-CoV-2 is man-made either deliberately or accidentally.
targetString: که څه هم پوښتنې پاتې دي، داسې شواهد شتون نلري چې SARS-CoV-2 د انسان لخوا قصداً یا سهواً جوړ شوی وي.
en-mt: Although questions remain, there is no evidence that SARS-CoV-2 was intentionally or inadvertently created by humans.

sourceString: CoVs have returned to the limelight due to the recent outbreak of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: CoVs یو ځل بیا د SARS-CoV-2 د وروستي منځ ته راتلو له کبله بېرته عام شوی.
en-mt: CoVs have been re-common again due to the recent emergence of SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: The study of CoVs in bats and other animals has drastically changed our perception of the importance of zoonotic origins and animal reservoirs of HCoVs in human transmission.
targetString: په څکالو او نورو حیواناتو کې د CoVs مطالعې انسان ته د HCoVs د لیږد او په حیواناتو کې د زیرمو او د حیواني مبدا د اهمیت په هکله یې زموږ پوهاوی ډیر بدل کړی دی.
en-mt: The study of CoVs in dogs and other animals has greatly changed our understanding of the transmission of HCoVs to humans and the importance of deposits and animal origins in animals.

sourceString: Pervasive evidence has shown that SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 have a bat origin and are transmitted to humans via intermediate hosts.
targetString: عمومي شواهدو ښودلي دي چې د SARS-CoV، MERS-CoV او SARS-CoV-2 اصلي مبدا څکالی دی او د منځګړو کوربو له لارې انساناتو ته خپریږي.
en-mt: General evidence has shown that SARS-CoV، MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 are the main source of infections and are spread to humans through intermediate coronaviruses.

sourceString: Given that SARS-CoV infection originates from the contact between humans and civets in the markets, closing wet markets and killing civets therein could have effectively ended the SARS epidemic.
targetString: دې ته په کتو چې SARS-CoV وېروس مبدا په مارکیټونو کې د انسانانو او پیشوګانو ترمنځ له اړیکو ده، د لندو مارکیټونو تړل او د پیشوګانو وژل کېدای شول د SARS ساري ناروغي په اغېزه ناکه توګه له منځه وړلې وای.
en-mt: Given that SARS-CoV virus originated from the relationship between humans and cats in markets، the closure of land markets and the deaths of cats could have effectively eliminated sars-related disease.

sourceString: By the same reasoning, pangolins should be removed from wet markets to prevent zoonotic transmission, in view of the discovery of multiple lineages of pangolin beta-CoVs closely related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: د ورته استدلال پربنسټ، میږی خوران باید له لندو مارکیټونو لري شي ترڅو د حیواني خپرولو مخنیوی وشي، ځکه چې د میږي خور beta-CoVs د SARS-CoV-2 سره له نږدې تړاو لري او یو شمیر تړاونه یې موندل شوي.
en-mt: Based on the same argument، ant feed should be removed from wetlands to prevent animal spread، as ant-sister beta-CoVs are closely related to SARS-CoV-2 and a number of links have been found.

sourceString: However, whether and how SARS-CoV-2 is transmitted to humans through pangolins and other mammals remain to be clarified in future investigations.
targetString: خو، دا چې آیا او څرنګه SARS-CoV-2 انساناتو ته د میږی خوران یا نورو حیواناتو له لارو خپریږي په راتلونکو څېړنو کې باید وضاحت ورکړ شي.
en-mt: However، whether and how SARS-CoV-2 is transmitted to humans through ant-eating or other animals should be clarified in future studies.

sourceString: On the other hand, MERS-CoV has existed in dromedary camels for a long time.
targetString: له بل پلوه، MERS-CoV د یوه بوک اوښانو کې له اوږدې مودې شتون لري.
en-mt: On the other hand، MERS-CoV has been around for a long time.

sourceString: These camels serve as an important tool for transportation as well as a main source of meat, milk, leather and wool products for the local people.
targetString: دا اوښان د ترانسپورت او همدا راز د غوښې د مرکزي سرچينې، شیدو، څرمن او وړیو تولیداتو په توګه د سیمه ایزو خلکو لپاره د مهمې سرچینې په توګه خدمت کوي.
en-mt: These camels serve as an important source of transportation as well as as a central source of meat، milk، leather and wool products for the local population.

sourceString: They are widely distributed across the Middle East and Africa.
targetString: هغوی په منځني ختیځ او افریقا کې په پراخه توګه شتون لري.
en-mt: They are widely available in the Middle East and Africa.

sourceString: It is therefore impossible to sacrifice all camels for the control of MERS, as what was done in wild animal markets in China to prevent the spreading of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ځکه نو دا ناشونې ده ترڅو د MERS کنټرول لپاره ټول اوښان قرباني شي، لکه څرنګه چې د چین په لندو مارکیټونو کې ترسره شول ترڅو د SARS-CoV او SARS-CoV-2 د خپریدلو مخنیوی وشي.
en-mt: Therefore، it is impossible to sacrifice all camels to control MERS، as was done in China's wetlands markets to prevent the spread of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: To stop the recurrent outbreaks of MERS, a comprehensive approach should be taken to develop effective vaccines against MERS-CoV for camels, in combination with other infection control measures.
targetString: د MERS د بیرته خپریدلو مخنیوي لپاره، یو هراړخیز چلند باید غوره شي ترڅو د اوښانو لپاره د خپریدلو کنټرول نورو ګامونو ترڅنګ د MERS-CoV پروړاندې اغیزمن واکسین جوړ شي.
en-mt: In order to prevent the recovery of MERS، a comprehensive approach must be adopted to develop an effective vaccine against MERS-CoV، along with other measures to control the spread for camels.

sourceString: As we are not able to eliminate these viruses, new genotypes might emerge to cause outbreaks.
targetString: لکه څرنګه چې موږ نشو کولای ترڅو وېروس له منځه یوسو، نوي جینوټایپ کېدای شي منځ ته راشي او خپریدل منځ ته راوړي.
en-mt: As we can't eliminate the virus، a new genetic mutation can develop and spread.

sourceString: A variety of zoonotic CoVs are circulating in the wild.
targetString: په وحشي ژوند کې د CoVs ډیر ډولونه شتون لري.
en-mt: There are many species of CoVs in the wild.

sourceString: Particularly, bat CoVs with zoonotic potential are so diverse.
targetString: په ځانګړې توګه د څکالي CoVs له حیواني پوتانسیال سره ډیر ډولونه لري.
en-mt: In particular، there are many types of cossies with animal potential.

sourceString: There are plenty of opportunities that these zoonotic CoVs evolve and recombine, resulting in the emergence of new CoVs that are more transmissible and/or deadly in humans in future.
targetString: ډیر فرصتونه شتون لري چې دغه حیواني CoVs بدلون او بیرته ترکیب وکړي، چې پایله یې د نوي CoVs منځ ته راتلل دي چې په راتلونکي کې ډیر د خپریدو وړ دي او/یا انسانانو کې مرګوني دي.
en-mt: There are many opportunities to modify and synthesize these animal CoVs، resulting in the emergence of new COVs that are more widespread in the future and/or are deadly in humans.

sourceString: The culture of eating wild animals in some places of China should be abandoned to reduce unnecessary contact between humans and animals.
targetString: د چین په ځینو ځایونو کې د ځنګلي حیواناتو د خوړلو کلتور باید مخنیوی وشي ترڅو د انسانانو او حیواناتو ترمنځ یې د اړتیا اړیکي کمې شي.
en-mt: The culture of eating wild animals in some parts of China should be avoided in order to reduce the need for human and animal relations.

sourceString: With the ordeals of SARS, MERS and COVID-19, a better preparedness and response plan should be in place.
targetString: د SARS، MERS او COVID-19 د ستونزو لپاره باید د چمتووالي او غبرګون یو پلان جوړ شي.
en-mt: A preparation and response plan must be developed for the problems of SARS، MERS and COVID-19.

sourceString: In fact, many viruses have existed in the planet for a very long time.
targetString: په حقیقت کې، په نړۍ کې د ډیري اوږدې مودې راهېسې ډیر وېروسونه شتون لري.
en-mt: In fact، there are many long-term viruses in the world.

sourceString: They stay in their own natural reservoirs until there is a chance for spillover.
targetString: هغوی په خپلو طبیعي زیرمو کې ترهغه وخت پورې پاته کیږي چې د خپریدلو لپاره فرصت په لاس ورشي.
en-mt: They stay in their natural reserves until they have the opportunity to spread.

sourceString: Although bats have many features that favours the spreading of viruses, the chance for humans to be in contact with bats and other wildlife species can be minimized if people are educated to stay away from them.
targetString: که څه هم څکالي ډیری بڼې لري چې د وېروسونو له خپریدلو سره مرسته کوي، له څکالو او نورو ځنګلي حیواناتو سره د انسانانو د اړیکو چانس کېدای شي کم شي که خلکو ته پوهاوی ورکړی شي چې له هغوی څخه لرې اوسي.
en-mt: Although alcoholics have many forms that contribute to the spread of viruses، the chances of humans interacting with birds and other wild animals may be reduced if people are informed to stay away from them.

sourceString: Continuous surveillance in mammals is necessary for better understanding of the ecology of CoVs and their natural hosts, which will prove useful in preventing animal-to-human transmission and future outbreaks.
targetString: له حیواناتو څخه دوامداره څارنه اړینه ده ترڅو د CoVs چاپیریال او د کوربو د طبیعي چاپیریال څخه پوهاوی ترلاسه شي، چې په راتلونکو خپریدلو کې به له حیوان څخه انسان ته په مخنیوي کې ګټور ثابت شي.
en-mt: Continuous monitoring of animals is necessary to gain understanding of the environment of CoVs and the natural environment of corbo، which will prove useful in preventing animal-to-human in future outbreaks.

sourceString: To conclude, the most effective way to prevent viral zoonosis is for humans to stay away from the ecological niches of the natural reservoirs of the zoonotic viruses.
targetString: په پایله کې، د انسانانو لپاره له حیواني وېروس د مخنیوي ډیر اغیزمنه لار دا ده ترڅو د حیواني وېروسونو د طبیعي زیرمو له چاپيریالي ساحې څخه لرې اوسي.
en-mt: As a result، the most effective way for humans to prevent animal viruses is to move away from the natural resources of animal viruses.

sourceString: Several pieces in the puzzle of the zoonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2 are still missing.
targetString: د SARS-CoV-2 د حیواني مبدا په معما کې یو شمیر ټوټې اوس هم ورکې دي.
en-mt: A number of fragments in the mystery of the animal origin of SARS-CoV-2 are still missing.

sourceString: First, if bats transmit an ancestral virus of SARS-CoV-2 to pangolins, it will be of interest to see under what circumstances bats and pangolins could share the same ecological niche.
targetString: لومړی، که څکالي موروثي SARS-CoV-2 میږی خورانو ته خپروي، دا به د لیوالتیا وړ خبره وي ترڅو دا وکتل شي چې تر کوم حالت لاندې څکالي او میږی خوران کیدای شي ورته چاپيریالي ساحه سره شریکه کړي.
en-mt: First، if the pot is inherited to spread SARS-CoV-2 to the ants، it will be interesting to see under what condition the drinker and the ant feed may share with the same environmental area.

sourceString: Second, if bats play a more direct role in human transmission, how humans get into contact with bats should be determined.
targetString: دویم، که څکالي انسان ته په خپریدلو کې مستقیمه ونډه ولري، دا باید مالومه شي چې انسانان څرنګه له څکالو سره په اړیکه کې راځي.
en-mt: Secondly، if smoking contributes directly to the spread of human beings، it must be clear how humans interact with the drinkers.

sourceString: Third, if a third mammal acts as the true intermediate host, how it interacts with the different species including humans, bats and pangolins has to be clarified.
targetString: دریم، که یو دریم حیوان د اصلي منځګړي کوربه په توګه عمل کوي، دا څرنګه له بیلابیلو حیواناتو سره پشمول د انسانانو، څکالو او میږی خورانو سره اړیکه نیسي، دا باید واضح شي.
en-mt: Third، if a third animal acts as the main intermediary host، how it interacts with different animals including humans، dogs and ants، it should be clarified.

sourceString: Finally, since many mammals including domestic animals might be susceptible to SARS-CoV-2, both surveillance and experimental infection should be conducted.
targetString: په پایله کې، له هغه ځایه چې ډیری حیوانات پشمول د کورني حیواناتو کېدای شي د SARS-CoV-2 پروړاندې کمزوري وي، دواړه څارنه او تجربوي خپریدل باید ترسره شي.
en-mt: As a result، since many animals including domestic animals may be weak against SARS-CoV-2، both monitoring and experimental outbreaks must be carried out.

sourceString: Should it be a bat, a pangolin or another mammal, it is expected that SARS-CoV-2 or its parental viruses that are almost identical will be identified in its natural hosts in future.
targetString: که دا څکالی، میږی خور یا بل حیوان وي، تمه کیږي چې SARS-CoV-2 یا موروثي وېروسونه یې چې نږدې ورته دي په راتلونکي کې به په خپل طبیعي کوربو کې وپیژندل شي.
en-mt: Whether it is a pet، a sister or another animal، it is expected that SARS-CoV-2 or inherited viruses that are nearly identical will be detected in their natural home in the future.

sourceString: Continued investigations in this area will elucidate the evolutionary pathway of SARS-CoV-2 in animals, with important implications in the prevention and control of COVID-19 in humans.
targetString: په دغه برخه کې دوامداره څېړنې به په حیواناتو کې د SARS-CoV-2 ودې لارو په هکله وضاحت ورکړي، چې په انسانانو کې به د COVID-19 د مخنیوي او کنټرول پایلو کې مهم وي.
en-mt: Ongoing research in this area will explain the ways in which SARS-CoV-2 is developed in animals، which will be important in the prevention and control outcomes of COVID-19 in humans.

sourceString: Updating the diagnostic criteria of COVID-19 “suspected case” and “confirmed case” is necessary
targetString: د COVID-19 د "شکمنو قضیو" او "تایید شوي قضیو" د تشخیص معیار مالومات نوي کول اړین دي
en-mt: It is necessary to update the diagnostic criteria for "suspected cases" and "confirmed cases" of COVID-19.

sourceString: On 6 February 2020, our team had published a rapid advice guideline for diagnosis and treatment of 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) infection, and this guideline provided our experience and make well reference for fighting against this pandemic worldwide.
targetString: د 2020 د فبرورۍ په 6، زموږ د 2019 د نوي کوروناوېروس (2019-nCoV) ساري ناروغی د تشخیص او درملنې لپاره یو چټکه د مشورې لارښوونه خپره کړې ده، او دې لارښوونې زمونږ تجربه وړاندي کړې او په ټوله نړۍ کې د دغه عامې ساري ناروغي سره مبارزې لپاره ښه مالومات وړاندي کوي.
en-mt: On February 6، 2020، our 2019 New Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) infectious disease has issued a rapid advisory guidance for diagnosis and treatment of infectious diseases، and these guidelines provide our experience and provide good information for combating this common infectious disease worldwide.

sourceString: However, the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge are gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated.
targetString: خو، د 2019 (COVID-19) د کوروناوېروس یوه نوې ناروغی ده، زموږ پوهاوی او علم د روانې څیړنې موندنو او کلنیکي کارونو تجربې پربنسټ په منظمه توګه زیاتیږي؛ ځکه نو د تشخیص او درمنلې سټراتیژي په دوامداره توګه نوي کیږي.
en-mt: However، 2019 (COVID-19) is a new coronavirus pandemic، and our awareness and knowledge are increasing on a regular basis based on ongoing research findings and the experience of clinical work، so the diagnosis and treatment strategy is constantly renewed.

sourceString: In this letter, we answered one comment on our guideline and provided the newest diagnostic criteria of “suspected case” and “confirmed case” according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (seventh version) that issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China.
targetString: پدې لیک کې موږ د خپلې لارښوونې په هکله د یوه نظر پوښتنه ورکړې او د "شکمنو قضیو" او "تایید شوي قضیو" د نوي تشخیص معیار یي وړاندي کړی، دا دCOVID-19 (اوومه نسخې) لپاره د وروستي تشخیص او درملنې لارښوونو پربنسټ دی، چې د چین د خلکو جمهوریت د ملي روغتیا کمیټې لخوا خپور شوی.
en-mt: In this letter، we ask a question about our guidance and present the new diagnostic criteria for "suspected cases" and "confirmed cases،" based on the latest diagnosis and treatment guidelines for COVID-19 (seventh edition)، published by the National People's Health Committee of the Republic of China.

sourceString: In December 2019, the 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) has caused an outbreak, which is now officially named as the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the virus has been named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: د 2019 په دسمبر کې، د 2019 نوي کوروناوېروس (2019-nCoV) په خپریدلو پیل وکړ، چې په اوس وخت کې په رسمي توګه د کورونا وېروس 2019 (COVID-19) په نوم نومول شوی او د وېروس نوم د سختې تنفسي ناروغی کوروناوېروس 2 (SARS-CoV-2) کېښودل شو.
en-mt: In December 2019، the 2019 new coronavirus (2019-nCoV) began to spread، currently officially named coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) and the virus name was placed in severe respiratory disease coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: On 11 March 2020, WHO characterized COVID-19 as a pandemic.
targetString: د 2020 د مارچ په 11، د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان COVID-19 یوه عامه ساري ناروغی اعلان کړه.
en-mt: On March 11، 2020، the World Health Organization declared COVID-19 a common infectious disease.

sourceString: In order to fight against the SARS-CoV-2 infection, our team has developed a rapid advice guideline and that has been published online in Military Medical Research on 06 February 2020.
targetString: د SARS-CoV-2  ساري ناروغی خپریدلو سره د مبارزې لپاره، زموږ ټیم یو چټک د مشورې لارښوونه جوړه کړې او د 2020 د فبرورۍ په 06 دا په آنلاین توګه په پوځي طبي څیړنې کې خپور شوی دی.
en-mt: In order to combat the spread of sars-CoV-2 infectious disease، our team has developed a quick advice guide and on 06 February 2020 it has been published online in military medical research.

sourceString: It has attracted a great attention since published.
targetString: له هغه وخته چې خپور شوی ډیره پاملرنه یې جلب کړې ده.
en-mt: It has attracted a lot of attention since it was published.

sourceString: Note however that COVID-19 is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge is gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated.
targetString: خو په یاد وساتئ چې COVID-19 یوه نوې ناروغی ده، د روانې څیړنې موندنو پربنسټ او کلنیکي کارونو تجربې پربنسټ زموږ پوهاوی او علم په منظمه توګه زیاتیږي؛ ځکه نو د تشخیص او درملنې سټراتیژی په دوامداره توګه نوي کیږي.
en-mt: But keep in mind that COVID-19 is a new disease، based on ongoing research findings and the experience of clinical work، our awareness and knowledge is constantly increasing؛ therefore، the strategy of diagnosis and treatment is constantly renewed.

sourceString: For instance the Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), among 16 January 2020 to 3 March 2020, has issued a total of seven editions with some contexts being substantively changed.
targetString: د بیلګې په توګه د COVID-19 لپاره د تشخیص او درملنې لارښوونې چې د چین خلکو جمهوریت ملي روغتیا کمیټې لخوا خپاره شوي (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/)، د 2020 جنوری 16 او د 2020 د مارچ تر 3، ټولي اووه نسخې یې خپاره کړي دي چې ځینې برخې یې په زیاته توګه بدل شوي دي.
en-mt: For example، the Guidelines for Diagnosis and Treatment for COVID-19 published by the National Health Committee of the People's Republic of China (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/)، january 16، 2020 and March 3، 2020، have released a total of seven versions، some of which have been greatly altered.

sourceString: Now our guideline received a comment by Zhou et al., they introduced a simple scoring proposal based on their clinical experience.
targetString: اوس زموږ لارښوونې د Zhou et al لخوا یو نظر لاسته راوړی، هغوی د نمرې ورکولو وړاندیز کړی چې د هغوی د کلنیکي تجربې پربنسټ دی.
en-mt: Now our guidelines have obtained an overview by Zhou et al، they have suggested grading based on their clinical experience.

sourceString: Their work added new evidence for our guideline and also make valuable reference for this pandemic worldwide.
targetString: د هغوی کارونو زموږ د لارښوونې لپاره نوي شواهد اضافه کړي او د دغه عامې ساري ناروغی لپاره ارزښتناکه مالومات دي.
en-mt: Their work adds new evidence for our guidance and is valuable information for this common infectious disease.

sourceString: We endorse their significant work and express our thanks.
targetString: موږ د هغوی د زیات کار تاییدي کوو او خپله مننه څرګندو.
en-mt: We appreciate their work and express our gratitude.

sourceString: However, their work also needs update according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (Trial seventh version) and recently studies.
targetString: خو، د هغوی د کارونو مالومات هم باید دCOVID-19 (امتحاني اوومې نسخې) لپاره د وروستي تشخیص او درملنې لارښوونو او وروستیو مطالعو سره سم نوي شي.
en-mt: However، their work data should also be updated in accordance with covid-19 (test seventh edition) for the latest diagnosis and treatment guidelines and recent studies.

sourceString: According to the seventh edition (3 March 2020), to confirm the suspected case needs to combine any one item of epidemiological history features with two items of clinical manifestations to make a comprehensive analysis, or needs to meet three items of clinical manifestations if without clear epidemiological history:
targetString: د اوومې نسخې (د 2020 د مارچ 3) پربنسټ، د شکمنې قضیې د تاییدي لپاره  باید د ساري ناروغی پيژندنې تاریخچه د کلنیکي شواهدو له دوو موادو سره یوځای شي ترڅو یو هر اړخیز تحلیل جوړ شي، یا باید د کلنیکي شواهدو درې مواد پوره کړي که ښکاره د ساري ناروغی پیژندنې تاریخچه شتون ونلري.
en-mt: According to the Seventh Edition (March 3، 2020)، in order to confirm a suspected case، the history of infectious disease identification must be combined with two materials of clinical evidence to form a comprehensive analysis، or must meet three items of clinical evidence if there is no apparent history of infectious disease identification.

sourceString: Epidemiological history: (1) a history of travel or residence in Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 cases had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (2) a history of contact with SARS-CoV-2 infectious cases (with positive nucleic acid test); (3) a history of contacting with patients with fever or respiratory symptoms from Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (4) a history of contacting with cluster of confirmed cases (≥ 2 cases with fever and/or respiratory symptoms occurred within 2 weeks in small areas, such as home, office, class of school, etc).
targetString: د ساري ناروغی پیژندنې تاریخچه: (1) د وهان په ښار او شاوخوا سیمو، یا نوري ټولنې چېرته چې په تیرو 14 ورځو کې د ناروغی تر پیل وړاندې د COVID-19 قضیو رپوټ یې ورکړی دی د سفر یا استوګنې تاریخچه؛ (2) لهSARS-CoV-2 خپریدلو قضیو سره د اړیکو تاریخچه (د نیوکلیک اسید مثبتې معاینې سره)؛ (3) له هغو ناروغانو سره چي له وهان ښار او شاوخوا سیمو، یا نوري ټولنې چېرته چې په تیرو 14 ورځو کې د ناروغی تر پیل وړاندې د COVID-19 قضیو رپوټ یې ورکړی چې د تبې یا تنفسي نښو ناروغانو سره یې د اړیکو تاریخچه درلوده؛ (4) د تایید شوي قضیو له ډلو سره د اړیکو یوه تاریخچه ≥ 2 قضیې له تبې او/یا تنفسي نښو سره چې په یوې کوچنی سیمه کې لکه کور، دفتر، د ښوونځي ټولګي، او نورو کې د 2 اونیو په ترڅ کې منځ ته راغلي.
en-mt: History of infectious disease identification: (1) travel or residential history of covid-19 cases in the city and surrounding areas of Wuhan، or other communities where covid-19 cases have been reported in the past 14 days prior to the onset of the disease؛ (2) a history of communication with SARS-CoV-2 outbreaks (with positive nucleo-acid testing)؛ (3) with patients from Wuhan city and surrounding areas، or other communities where the past 14 Covid-19 cases of covid-19 in the days prior to the onset of the disease had a history of contact with patients with fever or respiratory symptoms؛ (4) a history of contact with groups of confirmed cases ≥ 2 cases with fever and/or respiratory symptoms that occurred within 2 weeks in a small area such as home، office، school class، etc.

sourceString: Clinical manifestations: (1) fever and/ or respiratory symptoms; (2) with imaging features of COVID-19 infection; (3) total white blood cell counts showing normal, decreased, or reduced lymphocyte count in the early onset stage.
targetString: کلنیکي نښې: (1) تبه او/یا تنفسي نښې؛ (2) د COVID-19 اخته کيدل له انځوریزې بڼې سره؛ (3) د وینې سپینو حجرو شمیر نورمال ښودل، کم شوي، یا د لیمپهوکایټ شمیر کمیدل د پیل په لومړنیو کې.
en-mt: Clinical symptoms: (1) fever and/or respiratory symptoms؛ (2) exposure to COVID-19 with a visual form؛ (3) The number of white blood cells showed normal، decreased، or decreased lymphocyte counts in early onset.

sourceString: Diagnosing the confirmed case should base on suspected case with any one item of pathogenic or serological evidence as following: (1) real-time PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2; (2) viral whole genome sequencing showing high homogeneity to the known novel coronaviruses; (3) positive for the specific IgM antibody and IgG antibody to SARS-CoV-2 in serum test; or a change of the SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG antibody from negative to positive, or titer rising ≥4 times in the recovery phase above that in the acute phase.
targetString: د تایید شوي قضیې تشخیص باید د شکمنې قضیې پربنسټ وي چې په لاندې توګه د پتوجینیک یا سیرولوجیکي شواهدو د یوه موادو پربنسټ وي: (1) د SARS-CoV-2 لپاره د PCR حقیقي وخت مثبت معاینه؛ (2) وېروسي ټول جینوم لړۍ کول چې له نوي کوروناوېروس سره لوړ ورته والۍ ښيي؛ (3) د سیروم په معاینه کې د ځانګړي IgM انتیباډي او دSARS-CoV-2 د IgM انتیباډی لپاره مثبت؛ یا SARS-CoV-2 د ځانګړي IgM انتيباډي له منفي څخه مثبت ته، یا مواد ≥4 لوړیږي د ښه کېدو په پړاو کې تر هغه څه چې د سخت په پړاو کې وي.
en-mt: Diagnosis of confirmed cases should be based on suspected cases based on a substance such as patogenic or serological evidence: (1) positive real-time PCR testing for SARS-CoV-2؛ (2) viral whole genome sequence showing high similarity to the new coronavirus؛ (3) positive for specific IgM antibodies in the serum test and positive for SARS-CoV-2 IgM antibodies؛ or SARS-CoV-2 negative for specific IgM antibodies. From positive to positive، or material ≥4 increases in the recovery phase until what is in the tough phase.

sourceString: We can see that the real-time PCR test for nucleic acid in respiratory tract or blood samples was added to the second (18 January 2020) and third (22 January 2020) editions.
targetString: موږ کولای شو دا وګورو چې په تنفسي جهاز کې یا د وینې په بیلګو کې د نیوکلیک اسید لپاره د PCR د حقیقي وخت معاینه په دویمې (د 18 د جنورۍ 18) او دریمې (د 2020 د جنورۍ 22) نسخو کې اضافه شوې.
en-mt: We can see that the real-time PCR test for nucleic acid in the respiratory tract or blood samples was added in the second (18 january 18th) and 3rd editions (January 22، 2020).

sourceString: The pathogenic detection of blood sample was added to the fourth (27 January 2020) and fifth (8 February 2020) editions; and then the serological evidence was added to the seventh edition.
targetString: د وینو د بیلګو د پتوجینیک پیژندل په څلورمې (د 2020 د جنورۍ 27) او پنځمې (د 2020 د فبرورۍ 8) نسخو کې اضافه شوي؛ او بیا د سیرولوجي شواهد په اومې نسخې کې اضافه شوي و.
en-mt: The identification of the pathogenic examples of blood was added in the fourth (January 27، 2020) and fifth editions (February 8، 2020)؛ and then the evidence of serology was added in the seventh edition.

sourceString: These modifications based on the researchers continued work that to search for an optimal nucleic acid detection kit for rapid diagnosis, as well as the samples from respiratory tract including blood sampling, which increased the availability of different specimens, and supported bringing the specific antibody positive result into the confirmed criteria.
targetString: دا بدلونونه د څیړونکو د دوامدارو کارونو پربنسټ دي ترڅو د چټک تشخیص لپاره د نیوکلیک اسید لوړې کچې موندلو کیت پلټنه وکړي، او له تنفسي جهاز څخه بیلګې پشمول د وینې بیلګې اخیستل، چې د توپیر لرونکو بیلګو شتون یې اضافه کړی، او په تایید شوي معیار کې د ځانګړي مثبتې پایلې راوړلو ملاتړ یې کړی.
en-mt: These changes are based on the continuing work of researchers to investigate the discovery of high levels of nucleic acid for rapid diagnosis، and samples from the respiratory tract including taking blood samples، which added to the presence of differentiated samples، and supported bringing specific positive results to the confirmed standard.

sourceString: Besides, there are more and more evidence that remind us to caution with the atypical symptomatic and asymptomatic patients.
targetString: د دې ترڅنګ، نور اضافي شواهد شتون لري چې موږ باید له عادي نښې لرونکو او بې نښې ناروغانو سره په پاملرنې سره چلند وکړو.
en-mt: In addition، there is additional evidence that we should treat normal and non-symptomatic patients with care.

sourceString: Hence, the flow chart of Zhou et al. should be updated, as they classified the person without clinical symptoms as “low risk”.
targetString: ځکه نو، د Zhou et al. کاري نقشې مالومات باید نوي شي، ځکه چې هغه کسان چې له کلنیکي نښې پرته و د "ټیټ خطر" په توګه یې درجه بندي کړي.
en-mt: Therefore، the work map data of Zhou et al. should be updated، because those without the annual symptoms rated them as "low risk."

sourceString: The score system also needs to be verified in further clinical practice and studies.
targetString: د نمرې ورکولو سیستم هم باید په نورو کلنیکي کارونو او مطالعو کې تایید شي.
en-mt: The grading system must also be approved in other clinical works and studies.

sourceString: To conclude, we hope more direct evidence coming up and call for readers to provide their comments.
targetString: به پایله کې، موږ هیله مند یو ترڅو نور مستیقم شواهد راشي او له لوستونکو غواړو ترڅو خپل نظرونه ورکړي.
en-mt: As a result، we hope for more evidence to come and ask readers to give their opinions.

sourceString: For the diagnosis of “suspected case” and “confirmed case”, we suggest to trace and obey the newest guidelines of their home countries.
targetString: د "شکمنو قضیو" او "تایید شوي قضیو" تشخیص لپاره، موږ وړاندیز کوو ترڅو د خپلو هېوادونو نوي لارښوونې تعقیب کړي او اطاعت وکړي.
en-mt: In order to identify "suspected cases" and "confirmed cases،" we suggest that our countries follow and comply with new guidelines.

sourceString: Our team will also timely update our guideline to offer help.
targetString: زموږ ټیم په وخت سره خپله لارښوونه نوي کړې ترڅو مرسته وړاندي کړي.
en-mt: Our team has updated its guidance in time to provide assistance.

sourceString: Bangladesh reports five new deaths due to COVID-19, a daily highest
targetString: بنګله ديش د Covid-19 لامله پنځه نورو کسانو مړېنه راپور کوي چې په ورځ کې د مړينو لويه شمېره ده۔
en-mt: Bangladesh reports five more deaths caused by Covid-19، which is the largest number of deaths per day.

sourceString: Yesterday, Bangladesh has confirmed five new deaths due to COVID-19 on the day.
targetString: پرون, بنګله دېش د COVID-19 له وجې د پینځو نورو کسانو مړينه تائيد کړه.
en-mt: Bangladesh confirmed the deaths of five people due to COVID-19.

sourceString: This is the highest number of fatalities in a day due to the virus.
targetString: دا هلته په یوه ورځ کې د ویروس له امله د مړینې تر ټولو زیاته شمیره ده.
en-mt: This is the highest number of deaths due to the virus in a day.

sourceString: As of yesterday, Bangladesh's Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR) reported the number of recorded infected cases included 114 active cases and 33 recovered cases who were staying home.
targetString: پرون د بنګله دیش د وبایی ناروغیو کنټرول او تحقیق ادارې (IEDCR) د کرونا وایرس نه اغېزمن شوو کسانو په اړه یو راپور خپور کړ چې په هغې کې 114 هغه کسان هم شامل دي چې تر اوسه پکې ویروس موجود دی، او 33 پکې هغه پېښې هم شاملې دي چې دغې ناروغۍ نه روغ شوي دي او دا په خپلو کورونو کې پاتې و.
en-mt: The Bangladesh Bureau of Disease Control and Research (IEDCR) released a report on coronavirus-infected people، including 114 people still infected with the virus، and 33 cases of those who had recovered from the disease and remained at home.

sourceString: A total of 17 deaths have been recorded.
targetString: په مجموع کې د 17کسانو مړينې ريکارډ شوې دي.
en-mt: A total of 17 deaths have been reported.

sourceString: In an online news briefing, the director of IEDCR, Dr Meerjady Sabrina Flora, said the fatalities included four males and one female.
targetString: په يو آن لاين خبري بريفنګ کي د IEDCR ډایرکټر ډاکټر ميرجاډي صابرينه فلورا وئيلي دي چې په مړو کسانو کي څلور سړي او يوه ښځه شامل دي.
en-mt: In an online news release, IEDCR director Dr. Mirjady Saberina Flora said four men and a woman were among the dead.

sourceString: According to Dr Meerjady, two cases were aged above 60, two between 51 and 60, and one 41-50 years old.
targetString: Dr Meerjady وينا ده چي په مړو کسانو کي دوه د شپيتو کالو څخه پورته, دو تنان 51 نه تر 60 او يو تن 41 نه تر 50 کالو عمر وو.
en-mt: According to Dr Meerjady, two of the dead were 51 to 60 years old and one was 41 to 50 years old.

sourceString: She also said two of the victims were from Dhaka.
targetString: هغې دا هم وويل چې په قربانيانو کې دوه کسان د ډاکا (Dhaka) اوسيدونکي دي.
en-mt: She also said that two of the victims were from Dhaka.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) declared COVID-19 a pandemic on March 11.
targetString: د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان په 11مارچ 2020 باندي COVID-19 نړيواله وبا اعلان کړه.
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) announced the outbreak of COVID-19 on 11 Mar 2020.

sourceString: A hospital official told Anadolu Agency, a local news outlet, that one of the deceased was Jalal Saifur Rahman, a director of Bengali Anti-Corruption Commission, who was cared for at the Kuwait Maitree Hospital.
targetString: د روغتون چارواکي انادولو خبري اجنسي ته وئيلي, چي په مړو کسانو کي يو د بنګال د فساد ضد کميسيون رئيس جلاج سيف الرحمن و, کوم چي په کوويت ميټري روغتون کي و۔
en-mt: Hospital officials told Anadolu News Agency that one of the dead was The Head of Bangladesh's Anti-Corruption Commission, Jajaj Saif Rahman, who was at Quit Meteri Hospital.

sourceString: On Saturday, in an online video announcement, Bangladeshi Road Transport and Bridges Minister Obaidul Quader said public transport would be shut down for longer than initially planned, until this coming Saturday.
targetString: د شنبې په ورځ په يوه آن لاين وډيو کي, په بنګله ديش کې د زمکي سړکونو او پلونو وزير عبيدالقادر وئيلي چي عام ترانسپورت به د مخکې اعلان کړي پلان څخه زيات وخت لپاره وتړل شي۔
en-mt: In an online video on Saturday , The Minister of Roads and Bridges in Bangladesh , Obaid al-Qadir , said public transport would be closed for longer than planned .

sourceString: This public transport shutdown had initially started on March 26 and was planned to end on Saturday, April 4.
targetString: لومړی دغه عام ټرانسپورت په مارچ 2 باندي وتړل شو او پلان دا و چې د شنبې په ورځ اپريل 4 نيټه باندې ختم شي۔
en-mt: The first public transport was closed on March 2 and the plan was to end on Saturday April 4.

sourceString: Transport of essential goods -- medical, fuel and food -- was still allowed.
targetString: خو د ضروري څيزونو لکه درمل, سونګ مواد او خوراکي توکو وړل راوړل بيا هم خلاص وو۔
en-mt: But the supply of essential goods such as medicine, fuel and food was still open.

sourceString: The first recorded incidents of COVID-19 infection in Bangladesh were on March 8, in two people who returned from Italy and also the wife of one of them.
targetString: بنګله ديش کې د Covid-19 پيښې د مارچ په اتمه نيټه مخې ته راغلې وې, کوم کي چي دوه کسان د اټلي نه راستون شوي وو او د يو کس ميرمن هم پکښي شامله وه۔
en-mt: Covid-19 cases in Bangladesh occurred on March 8, involving two people returning from Italy and one's wife.

sourceString: As of March 19, these three had already recovered.
targetString: وروسته دغه درې کسان د مارچ په 19 نيټه روغ شول۔
en-mt: The three men were later recovered on March 19.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 surpasses one million infections worldwide
targetString: په نړۍ کې د SARS-CoV-2 متاثره شویو کسانو شمېره له یو ملیون څخه زیاته شوې.
en-mt: The number of people affected by SARS-CoV-2 worldwide has exceeded one million.

sourceString: On Thursday, the total number of cases of the SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus infections surpassed one million worldwide, Johns Hopkins University data indicated.
targetString: د پنجشنبې په ورځ د جان هاپکينز پوهنتون معلومات ښيي چي په نړۍ کي د SARS-CoV-2 کورونا وېروس ناروغۍ پيښې له يو مليون څخه زياتې شوې دي.
en-mt: On Thursday، data from Johns Hopkins University showed that more than one million cases of SARS-CoV-2 have been reported worldwide.

sourceString: At least 52 thousand deaths were linked to COVID-19, the disease caused by the coronavirus.
targetString: لږ تر لږه 52 زره مړينې د کوويډ-19 سره تړاو لري, هغه ناروغي چې د کورونا وېروس له امله را منځ ته شوې.
en-mt: At least 52،000 deaths have been linked to COVID-19، a disease caused by the coronavirus.

sourceString: The milestone came the same day Malawi confirmed its first coronavirus infections and Zambia had its first coronavirus-related death.
targetString: دغه هدف هغه ورځ مخې ته راغلی وو چي په ملاوي کې د کورونا لومړۍ ناروغي او په زيمبيا کي د کورونا وېروس له امله لومړۍ مړينه ثبت شوه.
en-mt: The goal came on the day of the first coronavirus outbreak in Malawi and the first death due to the coronavirus in Zimbabwe.

sourceString: North Korea claimed, as of Thursday, it was one of the few countries remaining free of coronavirus infections.
targetString: د پنجشنبې په ورځ شمالي کوریا دعوا کړې چې هېواد يې د هغه يو څو هېوادونو څخه دی چې د کورونا وېروس له عفونت څخه پاک دی.
en-mt: On Thursday، North Korea claimed its country was one of the few countries to be free of coronavirus infections.

sourceString: By yesterday, the World Health Organization reported 1,051,635 confirmed cases, including 79,332 cases in the twenty four hours preceding 10 a.m. Central European Time (0800 UTC) on April 4.
targetString: تيره ورځ, د روغتيا نړيوال سازمان 1,051,635 تاييد شوو پېښو په اړه راپور ورکړ چې له دې ډلې 79,332 هغه پېښو چې په 4 اپريل تېرو څلور ویشتو ساعتونو کې د مرکزي اروپايي وخت (0800 UTC) د سهار 10 څخه مخکې رامنځ ته شوې.
en-mt: The World Health Organization reported 1,051,635 confirmed cases, of which 79,332 occurred before 10 a.m. central European time (0800 UTC) in the past 4 hours of 4 April.

sourceString: In the United States, over 244 thousand coronavirus cases were recorded, linking to at least 5,900 deaths.
targetString: د امریکا په متحده ایالاتو کې, د کورونا وېروس د 244 زره نه زياتي پيښې ثبت شوې دي, چي لږ تر لږه 5,900 مړينې پکې شامل دي.
en-mt: In the United States، more than 244،000 coronavirus cases have been reported، including at least 5،900 deaths.

sourceString: CBS News reported, citing Johns Hopkins University data, there were over 1,000 US deaths on Wednesday caused by coronavirus infections.
targetString: د CBS News د خبر له مخې، چې د جان هاپکينز پوهنتون د معلوماتو پر اساس وايي، د امریکا په متحده ایالاتو کې د چهارشنبې په ورځ 1,000 نه زيات کسانو د کورونا ناروغۍ له وجې ژوند له لاسه ورکړ.
en-mt: According to cbs news، according to Johns Hopkins University، more than 1،000 people died from the coronavirus on Wednesday.

sourceString: Around the world, countries announced stricter measures to inhibit the disease from spreading.
targetString: د نړۍ په کچه،ګن شمېر هيوادونو د کورونا ناروغۍ د خپريدو مخنيوي لپاره سخت ګامونه پورته کړي.
en-mt: Many countries around the world have taken drastic measures to prevent the spread of the coronavirus.

sourceString: On Thursday, Sergei Sobyanin, the mayor of Moscow, extended the city lockdown to May 1.
targetString: د پنجشنبې په ورځ، د مسکو ښاروال سېرګي سوبیانین د قرنطین موده د مې تر لومړۍ پورې و غځاوه.
en-mt: On Thursday، Moscow's mayor، Sergei Sobyanin، extended the quarantine period until the first of May.

sourceString: Nationally, President Vladimir Putin declared Russians would continue to be paid without going to work until April 30.
targetString: د روسيه اولسمشر ولادي مير پيوټين ويلي چې د اپريل 30 پورې به روسيانو ته په کورونو دننه تاديه ورکول کيږي.
en-mt: Russian President Vladimir Putin has said that payments will be paid to Russians inside their homes by April 30.

sourceString: The parliament of Portugal voted to extend the national state of emergency by 15 days; the vote passed with 215 votes in favor, ten abstentions, and one vote against.
targetString: د پرتګال پارليمان اضطراري حالت د نورو 15 ورځو لپاره غځولو په حق کې رايي ورکړې؛ د اضطراري حالت لپاره 215 رايې مثبتې او یوه رایه منفي وه.
en-mt: Portugal's parliament voted in favour of extending the state of emergency for another 15 days؛ 215 votes for the state of emergency were in favour and one vote was no.

sourceString: Saudi Arabia extended curfews in the holy cities of Mecca and Medina to last the entire day; previously, the curfew was only in effect between 3 p.m. and 6 a.m.
targetString: سعودي عرب د مکې او مدېنې په سپېڅلو ښارونو کې ګرځبندېز غځولی تر څو د ورځې د پای پورې دوام ولري؛ مخکې دغه ګرځبندېز د ماسپښين 3 بجو نه تر سهار 6 بجو پورې وه.
en-mt: Saudi Arabia has extended curfews in the holy cities of Mecca and Madinah to continue until the end of the day؛ previously، the curfew was from 3 p.m. to 6 a.m.

sourceString: Thailand planned to implement a curfew between 10 p.m. and 4 a.m.
targetString: تایلند د شپې د لسو بجو نه د سهار تر 4 بجو پورې د ګرځبندېز د پلي کولو پلان لري.
en-mt: Thailand plans to implement curfews from 10:00 a.m. to 4 a.m.

sourceString: The governor of Ohio, Mike DeWine, announced the state had extended its stay-at-home order until May 1.
targetString: د اوهایو والي مائیک ډي وائن اعلان کړی چې ايالت پہ کور دننہ د اوسیدو امر ميي 1 پوری غځولی دی.
en-mt: Ohio Governor Mike de Waine has announced that the state has extended its home-to-home order to May 1.

sourceString: Stores in Australia lower toilet paper limits per transaction
targetString: آسټريليا کې پلورنځايونو د تشناب کاغذ ورکولو حد ټيټ کړی ډی
en-mt: In Australia, retailers have lowered the threshold for toilet paper

sourceString: On Sunday and Saturday evening, Australian store chains Woolworths and Coles lowered their purchase restrictions on toilet paper to two and one package per transaction in all stores on national level, respectively.
targetString: د يکشنبې او شنبې په ماښام د آسټریلیايي پلورنځيو ځنځير وولورتس او کولز د تشناب د کاغذ د پلورنې قيدونه بندیزونه راکم کړي چې په ټولو پلورنځايونو کې په ملي کچه په يو وخت دوه يا يوه بسته ده.
en-mt: On Sunday and Saturday evening، a chain of Australian stores، Wares and Koles، has reduced the restrictions on the sale of toilet paper that is two or one package at a time in all retail outlets nationally.

sourceString: ALDI also introduced a one-pack limit, on Monday.
targetString: ALDI هم د دوشنبې په ورځ, د يوې بستې حد معرفي کړ.
en-mt: Aldi also introduced a package limit on Monday.

sourceString: These limitations were posted as messages on the checkouts, and on the chains' Facebook pages.
targetString: دغه حدونو د خبرتيا د پېغامونو په بڼه کې د وتني ننوتنې په ځايونو او د دغه ځنځير د فيس بک په پاڼه لګول شوی و.
en-mt: These restrictions were placed in the form of statements in the form of notifications and on the Facebook page of the chain.

sourceString: Buyers were reportedly stocking up due to fears of COVID-19 in case people need to self-isolate.
targetString: د راپور له مخې اخيستونکو د کوويډ-19 له امله قرنطين کيدو له ويرې زېرمې کولې.
en-mt: According to the report، the residents were afraid of being quarantined due to COVID-19.

sourceString: On Wednesday, Woolworths also limited toilet paper purchases for home delivery to one pack per order.
targetString: د چهارشنبې په ورځ, وولورتهس هم د تشناب د کاغذ د کور لپاره اخيستلو حد تر يوې بستې راټيټ کړی.
en-mt: On Wednesday, Werthus also lowered the limit for toilet paper to one package.

sourceString: These changes followed the previous four-pack per transaction restriction introduced by Woolworths and Coles on March 4 and 5 respectively.
targetString: دا بدلونونه د تير شوي په يو وخت څلور بستو ورکولو څخه ورستو راغلي چې د وولورت او کولز لخوا پرله پسې په مارچ 4 او 5 معرفي شوي و.
en-mt: The changes came after the last four packages were introduced in a row by Welort and Koles on March 4 and 5.

sourceString: Coles, in its March 8 media release, reported that with the four-pack restriction in place, "many stores are still selling out within an hour of delivery", and called the demand "unprecedented", while ALDI, in a Facebook post on Tuesday, called it "unexpected".
targetString: کولز د مارچ 8 په ميډيا راپور کې ويلي  چي دا څلور بستو د محدوديت سره سم، "زياتره سټورونه خپل توکي د رارسېدو څخه وروستو په يو ساعت کي خرڅوي" او غوښتنه "بې ساري" بولي، بل اړخ ته آلډي د سه شنبې په ورځ د فيس بک پوسټ کي دغه "ناڅاپي" بولي.
en-mt: In a March 8 media report، Cols said that under the restrictions، "most stores sell their items within an hour" and call the request "unprecedented،" while Eddy on Tuesday called it "unexpected."

sourceString: Sales went up in a "sharp increase" last week, according to a Woolworths spokesperson.
targetString: د وولورتهس وياند وائي چي خرڅلاو تېره اونۍ "خورا زيات" شوی و.
en-mt: The 2016 2016 sale was "very high" last week.

sourceString: Costco's store in Canberra also limited the allowed amount to two packs last week.
targetString: په کينبرا کې کوسټکو سټور هم تيره اونۍ د مجاز مقدار حد دوه ته محدود کړې.
en-mt: The Costa Store in Canberra also narrowed the permissible amount limit to two last week.

sourceString: To further alleviate the shortage, Coles ordered bigger packages from suppliers and increased delivery frequency, Woolworths ordered extra stock, while ALDI made stocks for a planned Wednesday special available early.
targetString: د کمښت کمولو لپاره ، کولز د اکمالوونکو څخه د لوی کڅوړو او رسولو زياتوالي غوښتنه کړې، وولورتهس د اضافي سټاک امر کړی، بلخوا آلډي د پلان شوي ځانګړي چهارشنبې لپاره سټاک چمتو کړی.
en-mt: In order to reduce the decline، The Coloss has requested an increase in large packages and deliveries from the buyers، Wollens has ordered additional stock، on the other hand Eddy has provided the stock for a planned special Wednesday.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman, executive director of the Australian Retailers Association, said that retailers try to raise stock, but local council restrictions on the timing of truck-deliveries make it hard.
targetString: د آسټريلیا پرچون اتحادیې اجرائيوي رئيس رسیل زیمرمن وویل چې پرچون پلورونکي هڅه کوي چې د ذخیره زياته کړي، خو د مقامي شورا لخوا د لاريو په وخت باندې د بندېز له امله دا مشکل دي.
en-mt: Russell Zimmerman، chief executive of the Australian Retail Association، said the retailer was trying to increase the stock، but that was difficult due to a ban on trucks by a local council.

sourceString: He expects rising production costs, as suppliers try to meet demand, and fewer specials.
targetString: هغه د توليد د قيمتونو زياتوالي تمه لري, ځکه چې اکمالونکي هڅه کوي چې غوښتنې پورا کړي او څه ځانګړي.
en-mt: He expects an increase in production prices, as suppliers try to meet demand and what's special.

sourceString: On Tuesday, ALDI announced that following the early release of stock, some stores can't run the Wednesday special.
targetString: د سه شنبې په ورځ ، آلډې اعلان وکړ چې د ذخیرې له وخته ختمېدو وروسته، ځینې هټۍ نشي کولی چې ځانګړې چهارشنبه و چلوي.
en-mt: On Tuesday، Ed announced that after the stock ended، some stores could not operate on special Wednesdays.

sourceString: In a News.com.au report, Dr Gary Mortimer, retail expert from Queensland University of Technology, said the stores fill the stock every night.
targetString: په News.com.au راپور کې د کوئينزلينډ يونيورسټي آف ټيکنالوجي ډاکټر ګيري مورټيمر وائي چې سټورونه هره شپه زېزمې پورا کوي.
en-mt: In News.com.au report، Queensland University of Technology Dr. Gary Mortimer says stores are locked every night.

sourceString: He remarked toilet paper is a bulky item, leading to low quantity of stocks in numbers, and, when sold out, leaves vast shelf spaces empty, hardening the feeling of a shortage.
targetString: هغه يادګيرنه وکړه چې ټائلټ پيپر لوي توکي دي, او کم مقدار شميره کي وي, او کله چي خرځ کړې شي, نو غټو الماريو کې ځايونه خالي شي, او د سټاک کم والي احساس ورکوي.
en-mt: He noted that the notepad is a large item, a small number, and when it is sold, the spaces in the large shelves are emptied, making the stock feel low.

sourceString: Coles and Woolworths have a view [that] if there was plenty of stuff on the shelf, if product like toilet rolls and sanitiser could be [bought] and are there in quantities, you would probably minimise the panic said Russell Zimmerman per ABC News.
targetString: رسل زيمرمن ABC News ته ويلي چي کلوز او وولورتهس يو نظر لري چې که په الماريو کې څيزونه زيات وي, او که لکه تشناب او سانيټائزر  غوندې څيزونه زيات وي, نو کيدي شي چي کم خطر ولري.
en-mt: Russell Zimmerman told ABC News that Clous and Volertas have an idea that if there are more things in the closet, and if there are more things like toilets and sanitizers, they may be less dangerous.

sourceString: Recycled toilet paper producer Who Gives a Crap said on last Wednesday they'd run out of stock.
targetString: د ري سائيکل شوي ټائلټ پيپر واله په تيره چهارشنبه ويلي وو چي دوئي سره زېرمه ختميږي.
en-mt: The New York Times reported on Wednesday that it was going to close.

sourceString: Kimberly-Clark, which makes Kleenex Toilet Tissue, and Solaris Paper which makes Sorbent, emphasized they were working 24/7 to maintain the supply, according to the News.com.au report.
targetString: د نيوز ډاټ کام راپور کې د کلينيکس ټائلټ ټشو او سولاريس پيپر سوربينټ جوړولو واله کيمبرلي-کلارک حواله باندي وائي چې دوئي 24/7 کار کړې چې سپلائي بحال اوساتي.
en-mt: The News Dotcom report cites the cambridge-clark building of the Clinics Tattoo Tattoo and Solaris Piper Surbent، citing the work done 24/7 to restore the supply.

sourceString: Domain.com, a real estate site, reported some property sellers offering free toilet paper to the first bidder on auctions in Melbourne, when fewer auctions were held because of buyers having time off on the long weekend of Labour Day.
targetString: د ريال اسټيټ سائټ ډومين ډاټ کام راپور کې ويل شوي چې په ميلبرن کي پراپرټي کارکوونکو په ليلام کي اول داو ورکوونکو له ټائلټ پيپر وړيا ورکړي دي, د ليبر ډي باندي د وخت کموالي له امله لړ ليلامونه ترسره شول.
en-mt: The real estate site domain dot com report said that the employees of The MailburnE real estate agent paid the first person free of The Real Paper in the auction, and the auctions were held due to the lack of time on Labor Day.

sourceString: The Thursday edition of NT News, a daily printed in Darwin, included an eight-page insert meant to be cut up and used as toilet paper.
targetString: د داروین ورځپاڼه اين ټي خبري پنجشنبې ايډيشن کي اتمه پانړه د ټائلټ پيپر په توکه کاراول کيدل و.
en-mt: The 2016 Edition of The New Year's Edition was published by The Daily Telegraph.

sourceString: The stores were originally reluctant to impose restrictions, according to a report from ABC Australia on March 3 in which they said they had no plans to introduce restrictions on the purchases.
targetString: د آسټرالیایي بي سي March 3 راپور ترمخه سټورونو واله د بنديزونو په حق کي نه وو, او د څيزونو په اخستو بنديز لګولو هيڅ پلان نلري.
en-mt: According to the March 3 Australian report، stores were not entitled to restrictions، and there was no plan to ban the purchase of goods.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman added that other products are also in high demand, including masks, sanitiser, dried goods, handwash and flour.
targetString: رسل زيمرمن زياته کړه چې د نورو شیانو غوښتنه هم لوړه ده, کوم کې چي ماسکونه, سانيټايزر, خشک ځيزونه, هينډواش او اوړه شامل دي.
en-mt: Russell Zimmerman added that demand for other things is also high, which includes masks, sanitizers, dry areas, handwash and flour.

sourceString: Similarly, outside of Australia, on Sunday evening online British supermarket Ocado was observed limiting purchases of Andres toilet paper to two 12-roll packs.
targetString: هم په هغه ډول د آسټريليا نه بهر, د يکشنبې په ورځ باندي برټش آن لاين سپرمارکيټ اندريس ټائلت پيپر د 12رول پيکس اخستلو مشاهده کړې.
en-mt: In the same way, outside of Astrilia, on Sunday the Bretsch online supermarket Andreas Tyalt Popper observed taking 12-12-year-long pixels.

sourceString: World Health Organization declares COVID-19 pandemic
targetString: د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان COVID-19 وېروس د نړیوالې وبا په توګه اعلان کړ.
en-mt: The World Health Organization has declared COVID-19 a global pandemic.

sourceString: On Wednesday, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19 — the disease caused by coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 — to be a pandemic.
targetString: د چهارشنبې په ورځ د روغتيا نړيوال سازمان کوويډ-19 وباء ګرزولې, کومه چي د کورونا واېرس سارس-کو-2 ناروغې له امله رامينځته شوې
en-mt: On Wednesday، the World Health Organization (WHO) announced covid-19، caused by the coronavirus SARS-Co-2 virus

sourceString: Although the word "pandemic" only refers to how widely a disease has spread, not how dangerous specific cases are, the WHO noted the need to drive governments to action:
targetString: که لفظ وباء د بيمارې زيات کچ باندې خوريدل وي, نه دا کې خطرناکې پيښې څومره دي, د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان دولتونو ته د اقداماتو د ترسره کونې امر کړی.
en-mt: If the word is spread over a large number of cases, no matter how dangerous it is, who has ordered governments to take action.

sourceString: All countries can still change the course of this pandemic.
targetString: ټول هيوادونه اوس هم د وباء موده بدلولی شي.
en-mt: All countries are still able to change.

sourceString: If countries detect, test, treat, isolate, trace and mobilize their people in the response, said Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, the Director-General of the WHO.
targetString: د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان د ډايرکټر جنرال تدروز ادهنوم چیبريسوس له اړخه وايي چې که چېرې هېوادونو په ځواب کې خپل خلک کشف،ټيسټ علاج، درملنه، یوازې او تکړه کړل.
en-mt: World Health Organization Director General Tedros Adnum Chibrisus says that if countries detect، test، treat، and develop their people in response.

sourceString: We are deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity and by the alarming levels of inaction.
targetString: مونږ ډېر زيات د کورونه ناروغي په خطرناکه کچه خپرونې او شدت  سره د هغې خلاف ګامونه نه اخيستو په اړه ډېر زيات اندېښمن یو.
en-mt: We are very concerned about the spread of the disease at a dangerous level and not taking steps against it.

sourceString: According to Dr. Tom Frieden, formerly the director of the United States' Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the pandemic is "unprecedented."
targetString: امريکا کې پخواني ناروغيو کنترول او مخنيوي ډايرکټر ډاکټر ټام فريډین وینا ده چې دغه وبا "بې ساري" ده.
en-mt: Former U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention، Dr. Tom Frieden، said the pandemic was "unprecedented."

sourceString: He said, in remarks published by CNN in February, "other than influenza, no other respiratory virus has been tracked from emergence to continuous global spread."
targetString: هغه فروري مياشت کې سي این این په خپره شوې يوه تجزيه کې ویلي، چې دا انفلوئينزا پرته بل يو وېروس هم په نړيوال کچه خپور شوي
en-mt: According to a cnn analysis released in February، the virus was spread globally، with the exception of influenza.

sourceString: Ghebreyesus expressed a similar view, saying "we have never before seen a pandemic sparked by a coronavirus."
targetString: غيبريسوس هم خپله شننه همداسې څرګنده کړې، مونګ مخکې داسې قسمه وباء سره نه يو مخ شوي څنګه چې کورونا وېروس وباء ده؛.
en-mt: In the same way، the coronavirus has not been treated as a coronavirus.

sourceString: He continued, "and we have never before seen a pandemic that can be controlled at the same time."
targetString: هغه وويل چې، مونګ داسې وباء هم نه ده ليدلې چې په هم هغه وخت کې قابو کړي شي.
en-mt: He said: "He didn't see any of that at the time.
