sourceString: The new status as a pandemic follows the WHO's decision in January to declare the outbreak a public health emergency of international concern.
targetString: د وبا په توکه نوي صورتحال سره  جنوري کې د روغتیا د نړیوال سازمان پرېکړه ده چې وباء به په نړيوال کچه عامه روغتيایي حالت بیړنی اعلانوي.
en-mt: In January، the World Health Organization (WHO) decided to declare a public health emergency on a global scale.

sourceString: The United States' National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Disease's director, Dr. Anthony Fauci, said of the outbreak, "bottom line, it's going to get worse."
targetString: د امریکا متحده ایالاتو د حساسیت او عفوني ناروغيو ملي انسټیټیوټ رئيس ويلي چې د وبا به په ټيټه ليکه به زياته خرابه شي.
en-mt: The head of the U.S. National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases said the pandemic would worsen.

sourceString: As of Thursday, Associated Press reported there were at least 126,000 cases of COVID-19 worldwide, resulting in over 4,600 deaths.
targetString: د  Associated Press خبري آژانس د پنجشنبې په ورځ بیا په یو رپورټ کې ویلي چې  د کورونا وېروس نه متاثره شوو په یو لاک او شپږ ویشت زره کسانو کې څه د پاسه څلور زره او شپږ سوه کسان مړه رپورټ شوي دي.
en-mt: The Associated Press reported on Thursday that more than 4،600 people were reported dead in one and twenty-six thousand people.

sourceString: The 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic is an ongoing pandemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: د 2019–20 د کوروناوېروس وبا د کورونا وېروس (2019-nCoV) د وبا ادامه ده، چې د سختې تنفسي ناروغی د کوروناوېروس 2 (SARS-CoV-2) لامله خپريږې۔
en-mt: The 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic is the continuation of the coronavirus (2019-nCoV) pandemic، causing the spread of the severe respiratory disease coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: The outbreak was identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019, declared to be a Public Health Emergency of International Concern on 30 January 2020, and recognized as a pandemic on 11 March 2020.
targetString: د دغې وبا پیژندګلوي په دسمبر 2019 کې د چین په وهان ښار کې شوې وه ،او د دسمبر په دیرشمه ترې د نړیوالو اندیښنو له وجې په ملک کې ترې ولسي هیلت ایمرجنسي ولګول شوه،او د مارچ 11، 2020 نیټه بیا عالمي وبا وګرځول شوه.
en-mt: The outbreak was reported in Wuhan، China، on December 30، 2019 due to international concerns، and the pandemic was re-established on March 11، 2020.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 1.61 million cases of COVID-19 have been reported in 210 countries and territories, resulting in approximately 97,000 deaths.
targetString: د روان 2020  کال د اپرېل په 10مه یوې اندازې مطابق په 210 هېوادونو کې د کرونا وېرس 1.60 میلیونه کیسونه رپورټ شول،چې څه د پاسه 97,000 کسانو د مرګ سبب وګرځیدل.
en-mt: As of April 10، 2020، 1.60 million cases of covid-19 have been reported in 210 countries، resulting in more than 97،000 deaths.

sourceString: About 364,000 people have recovered.
targetString: شا وخوا 364,000 کسان د ناروغۍ څخه روغ شوي دي.
en-mt: About 364،000 people have recovered from the disease.

sourceString: The case fatality rate has been estimated to be 4% in China, while globally ranging from 13.04% in Algeria to .08% in New Zealand.
targetString: د مرګ شرحه په چین کې 4%، او په ټوله نړۍ کې بیا 13.04% فیصده الجیریا کې .08% او په نیوزي لینډ کې  ریکارډ شوې.
en-mt: The death rate was 4% in China، 13.04% in Algeria and 08% in New Zealand.

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.
targetString: عمومي علايم له تبې، وچ ټوخي، او ستړیا څخه عبارت دي.
en-mt: Common symptoms include fever، dry cough، and fatigue.

sourceString: Complications may include pneumonia and acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: د ناروغۍ جدي او پېچلې علايم له سینه بغل، د تنفسي سیستم د بندوالي بېلا بېل علايم، او د بدن د ډېرو غړو له فعالیته غورځېدل چې پایله یې کمزورتیا او یا مرګ دی.
en-mt: Serious and complex symptoms include pneumonia، respiratory failure، and the function of many organs، resulting in weakness or death.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days, but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: دغې ناورغۍ د لګیدو په عمومي توګه په پینځو ورځو کې علامات راښکاره کیږي خو په ځينې کیسونو کې دوه نه تر څوارلسو ورځو پورې اخلي،
en-mt: Symptoms typically appear within five days، but in some cases it takes two to fourteen days.

sourceString: There is no known vaccine or specific antiviral treatment.
targetString: د نوي کورونا وېروس لپاره کوم ځانګړی واکسین یا درملنه نشته.
en-mt: There is no vaccine or treatment for the new coronavirus.

sourceString: Primary treatment is symptomatic and supportive therapy.Recommended preventive measures include hand washing, covering one's mouth when coughing, maintaining distance from other people, and monitoring and self-isolation for people who suspect they are infected.
targetString: لومړۍ علاج یی علامتي دې ناروغ تن ته دلاسه ورکول او د هغه مرسته کړل ګټه ور دي،تجویز شوي احتیاطي تدابیر مهم دي، لکه لاسونه وینځل،د ټوخي په وخت خلې ته څه نیول،یو بل سره  فاصله ساتل، او شک منو کسانو له ځان بیلول مهم دي.
en-mt: The first symptomatic treatment of the patient is benefiting from the loss and help of the patient، and the prescribed precautions are important، such as washing hands، coughing، keeping distance from each other، and avoiding doubts.

sourceString: Authorities worldwide have responded by implementing travel restrictions, quarantines, curfews, workplace hazard controls, and facility closures.
targetString: په نړیواله کچه چارواکو د سفر بندیزونه، قرنطين، ګرځبندېز، د کار په ځایی کې خطر کنټرول کولو غوندې قوانین عملي کوي.
en-mt: International authorities implement laws such as travel restrictions، quarantines، curfews، and workplace risk controls.

sourceString: The pandemic has led to severe global socioeconomic disruption, the postponement or cancellation of sporting, religious, political and cultural events, and widespread shortages of supplies exacerbated by panic buying.
targetString: د وبا له امله په نړۍ کې سخت معاشي و اقتصادي ګډوډي پيدا شوې،  ده لوبو، مذهبي، سياسي او کلتوري پېښې ختمول او اخيستلو وېرې انتقال کې پراخه کمښت راغلی.
en-mt: As a result of the pandemic، there has been a massive decline in wages and economic disruptions in the world، and the elimination of religious، political and cultural events and the fear of buying.

sourceString: Schools and universities have closed either on a nationwide or local basis in 193 countries, affecting approximately 99.4 percent  of the world's student population.
targetString: د نړۍ ټولو 193هېوادونو کې ملي يا ځایی اساس باندې پوهنتونونه او مکتبونا تړل شوې، کوم له امله چې په نړۍ کې شاوخوا 99.4 فيصدي زدکوونکي اغېزمن کړي دي.
en-mt: Universities and schools are closed on a national or local basis in all 193 countries، affecting around 99.4% of students worldwide.

sourceString: Misinformation about the virus has spread online, and there have been incidents of xenophobia and discrimination against Chinese people, other people of East and Southeast Asian descent and appearance, and others from areas with significant virus cases.
targetString: آنلاين د وېروس حواله سرو غلط معلومات شريک کړي شوي وو، او د چينايي خلکو خلاف د ځنوفوبیه او تبعيض پيښي مخې ته راغلي، دیی کې ختيځ او سوېلي ختيځ اسيايي نسل خلک، او د ويروس پام ور پېښوي سيمې شاملې دي.
en-mt: Online viral citations were shared with misinformation، and there have been incidents of discrimination against Chinese people، including people of East and South Asian descent، and areas of virus-related incidents.

sourceString: Due to reduced travel and closures of heavy industry, there has been a decrease in air pollution and carbon emissions.
targetString: د سفري وسيلو کم والي او د لويو کارخانو بنديز له امله د هوا ککړتيا او کاربون اخراج کې کمښت راغلی.
en-mt: Air pollution and carbon emissions have decreased due to the ban on travel devices and the ban on large factories.

sourceString: Health authorities in Wuhan, China (the capital of Hubei province) reported a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown cause on 31 December 2019, and an investigation was launched in early January 2020.
targetString: د دسمبر په 31 په 2019، د چین د هوبي ولایت، ووهان کې د نامعلوم ایټولوژی پیښې د سینیومونیا قضیه راپور شوې وه.
en-mt: On December 31، 2019، a case of pneumonia was reported in Wuhan، Hubei Province، China.

sourceString: The cases mostly had links to the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market and so the virus is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
targetString: د زياتې پېښیی د هوانان سمندري خوراکي توکو سره اړيکې لري او ویل کيږي چې د وېروس اصليت زونيتیک دې.
en-mt: Most of the cases are related to Hawaiian seafood and the origin of the virus is said to be zomatic.

sourceString: The virus that caused the outbreak is known as SARS-CoV-2, a newly discovered virus closely related to bat coronaviruses, pangolin coronaviruses, and SARS-CoV.The earliest known person with symptoms was later discovered to have fallen ill on 1 December 2019, and that person did not have visible connections with the later wet market cluster.
targetString: د وبا خپرونکي وېروس د SARS-CoV په نوم پېژندل شوي، نوي موندل شوي ويروس ده ښاپېرک کورونا وېروس، پانګولین کورونویرس، او SARS-CoV سره نژدې ورته والی لري، اولني کس چې په 1ډسمبر 2019 رنځور شوي وو هغه دا ويټ کلوستر مارکيټ سره اړيکې نه لرلې
en-mt: The spread of the pandemic virus known as SARS-CoV، the newly discovered virus is closely related to the dragon coronavirus، the pandemic coronavirus، and SARS-CoV، the first person to suffer on December 1، 2019.

sourceString: Of the early cluster of cases reported in December 2019, two-thirds were found to have a link with the market.
targetString: ډسمبر 2019 کې لومړی راپور شوي پېښو کې دوه په دريمه برخه کسانو موندل شوي چې مارکيټ سره یې اړیکې لرلې۔
en-mt: In December 2019، two-thirds of the first reported cases were found to be linked to the market.

sourceString: On 13 March 2020, an unverified report from the South China Morning Post suggested that a case traced back to 17 November 2019, in a 55-year-old from Hubei province, may have been the first.On 26 February 2020, the WHO reported that, as new cases reportedly declined in China but suddenly increased in Italy, Iran, and South Korea, the number of new cases outside China had exceeded the number of new cases within China for the first time.
targetString: په چين کې 13مارچ 2020 د سوېلي چين مرنينګ پوست اخبار کې نه تایید شوي راپور کې ویل شوي چې حبې صوبې 55کلن تن کې 17نومبر 2019 نېټه باندې پېښه موندلې شوي وه، په 26 فبروري2020 ډبليو ایچ او چين کې د وباء پېښو کې کموالي راپور کړو خو روستو په ايټاليا، ايران او سوېلي کوریا کې  پېښو کې زياتوالي راغي. په اول ځل چين نا بهر په چين کې د پېښو نه زياتې شوې.
en-mt: On March 13، 2020، an unconfirmed report in the South China Meering Post reported that 17 of the 55-year-old haba province had been detected on 17 November 2019، and on 26 February 2020، W.H. and China reported a decrease in the number of cases in China، but the number of cases increased in Italy، Iran and South Korea. For the first time، there have been no cases in China.

sourceString: There may be substantial underreporting of cases, particularly among those with milder symptoms.
targetString: ښايي د مواردو رپورټ کول خورا کم وي، خصوصأ په هغه پيښو کې چې کوچني علايم لري.
en-mt: It may be very rare to report cases، especially in cases with minor symptoms.

sourceString: By 26 February, relatively few cases had been reported among youths, with those 19 and under making up 2.4% of cases worldwide.The United Kingdom's chief scientific adviser, Patrick Vallance, estimated that 60% of the British population would need to become infected before effective herd immunity could be achieved.
targetString: په فرورۍ 26 لږې پېښې په ځوانانو کې راپور شوي، دغه کې 19 او کم عمر ځوانان په نړۍ کې 2.4% دي، د انګلستان غټ سائنسټفیک مشير پاتریک ولانس تخمينا لګولې چې بايد انګلینډ %60 آبادي ده ناروغي څخه مخکې معافيت ولري۔
en-mt: On 26 February 2016، fewer cases were reported in young people، 19% and under 2.4% globally، with uk senior scientific adviser Patrick Vance estimating that 60% of england's population should have pre-immunity.

sourceString: Cases refers to the number of people who have been tested for COVID-19, and whose test has been confirmed positive according to official protocols.
targetString: د پېښو شمېره کې هغه خلقو ته اشاره ده کومو باندې چې COVID-19 لپاره ازمېښت شوي دي۔
en-mt: The number of cases refers to people who have been tested for COVID-19.

sourceString: As of 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of its population, and many countries have had official policies not to test those with only mild symptoms, such as Italy, the Netherlands, Spain, and Switzerland.
targetString: د 23 مارچ پورې يو هېواد هم د خپل نفوسو د 3% وګرو ازموينه نه وه کړې، دې کې زيادتره هيوادونو پاليسۍ وه چې دا کم تره نښو نښانو واله لبارتري ازمېښت به نه کوو، لکه اتالي، نیدرلینڈ، سپين او سویټزرلینډ۔
en-mt: As of 23 March، a country did not test a population of 3% of its population، with most countries having policies that would not test these lesser markers، such as Italy، Netherlands، Spain and Switzerland.

sourceString: A study published on 16 March found that in China, up to 23 January, an estimated 86% of COVID-19 infections had not been detected, and that these undocumented infections were the infection source for 79% of documented cases.
targetString: د يوې څېړنې له مخې چې د مارچ په 16 نېټه  خپره شوې، کې ویلي شوي وو، چې تر 23 جنورۍ  د يو اندازې پورې %86 COVID-19 ناروغي پېښې نه وو موندلي شوې او دا چې دغه غېر سنده انفکشن ده %79 پېښو لپاره سرچينه وه.
en-mt: A study published on March 16 found that as of January 23، 86% of covid-19 cases had not been detected and that the infection was responsible for 79% of cases.

sourceString: A statistical analysis published 30 March estimated that numbers of infections in Italy were considerably greater than the reported cases.
targetString: د هغې ارقامي شننې له مخې چې د مارچ په 30مه خپره شوه، په ایټالیا کې په کورونا ناروغۍ د اخته کسانو شمېره تر هغې څخه ډېره لوړه ده چې په اړه یې راپور شوی.
en-mt: According to an analysis released on March 30، the number of people infected with the coronavirus in Italy is much higher than it has been reported.

sourceString: The initial estimates of the basic reproduction number (R0) for COVID-19 were 1.4 to 2.4.
targetString: د COVID-19 اولني اندازې ترمخه بنيادي تولید شمېره د RO) 1.40) نه تر د 2.4 ده.
en-mt: The primary production number for COVID-19 is from RO 1.40 to 2.4.

sourceString: A study published by the US Center for Disease Control and Prevention has concluded that it may be 5.7.
targetString: د متحده ایالاتو د ناروغيو د کنترول او مخنيوي مرکز لخوا په خپره شوې څېړنه کې راځي چې دا ښایي 5.7 وي.
en-mt: According to a study published by the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention، it may be 5.7.

sourceString: Most people with COVID-19 recover.
targetString: زياتره خلک د COVID-19 څخه روغيږي.
en-mt: Most people are recovering from COVID-19.

sourceString: For those who do not, the time from development of symptoms to death has been between 6 and 41 days, with the most common being 14 days.
targetString: دا نه رغېدو لپاره د مرګ پورې علايم جوړېدو عمل 6 نه تر د 41 ورځو پورې دی، او ډېر عام خلکو لپاره دغه 14ورځې دی.
en-mt: The symptoms of non-recovery are 6 to 41 days، and for most people it is 14 days.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 97,000 deaths had been attributed to COVID-19.
targetString: تر 10 اپریل 2020 پورې، شاوخوا 97.000 ملیارده مړينې د کوویډ-19 لامله شوي.
en-mt: As of 10 April 2020، around 97.000 billion deaths have been caused by COVID-19.

sourceString: In China, as of 5 February about 80% of deaths were in those over 60, and 75% had pre-existing health conditions including cardiovascular diseases and diabetes.Official tallies of deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic generally refer to dead people who tested positive for COVID according to official protocols.
targetString: په چين کې، د فرورۍ 5 پورې د مړينې %80 د 60 کال عمر نه زياتو کسانو کې وه، او %75 کسانو د مخکې نه د زړه او شوګر ناروغي لرلې، عموما" پہ رسمي توګه COVID-19 وباء مړه کسانو له ده مثبت ازمېښت لپاره پروتوکول ورکوي.
en-mt: In China، 80% of deaths as of February 5 were in people over the age of 60، and 75% of people had pre-existing cardiovascular disease and diabetes، generally officially testing COVID-19 and dying.

sourceString: The number of true fatalities from COVID-19 may be much higher, as it may not include people who die without testing - e.g. at home, in nursing homes, etc.
targetString: امکان لري چې COVID-19 له امله په رښتيا د مړو کسانو شمېرہ زياته وي، ځکه چې دی کې به هغه مړه کسان شامل نا وي کوم چې د ټيسټ نه بغیر مړه شوي دي، مثال په توګه کورونو يا نرسنګ کورونو او نورو ځايونو کې۔
en-mt: It is possible that the death toll from COVID-19 is really high، as it will not include those who died without testing، for example in homes or nursing homes and other places.

sourceString: Partial data from Italy found that the number of excess deaths during the pandemic exceeded the official COVID death tally by a factor of 4-5x.
targetString: له ایټالیا څخه لومړني معلومات ښيي چې د COVID-19 له امله  د مړينې شمېره د رسمي مړينو څخه 5x-4 زیاته ده.
en-mt: Preliminary data from Italy indicates that the death toll from COVID-19 is 5x4 higher than the official death toll.

sourceString: A spokeswoman for the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) acknowledged "We know that [the stated death toll] is an underestimation", a statement corroborated by anecdotal reports of undercounting in the U.S. Such underestimation often occurs in pandemics, such as the 2009 H1N1 swine flu epidemic.The first confirmed death was in Wuhan on 9 January 2020.
targetString: د متحده ایالاتو ناروغيو او مخنيوي مرکزونو وياند (CDC) منلې ده چې (د مړه شوو کسانو شمېره) کمه وښودل شوه، ده انيکدوتل راپور تر مخه يو ايس کې کم حسابي تایید شوي، داسې ډول کم ارزښت په وباء کې کيږي، لکه  په 2009 کې H1N1 Swine flue وباء. اولني تایید شوي مړينه پو ووهان ښار د کال 2020 جنورۍ په  9 نېټه شوي وه۔
en-mt: A spokesperson for the Us Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) has acknowledged that the number of deaths has been underestimated، noting that the u.S. has been underestimated، such as the H1N1 Swine flue outbreak in 2009. The first confirmed death in Wuhan city was on January 9، 2020.

sourceString: The first death outside mainland China occurred on 1 February in the Philippines, and the first death outside Asia was in France on 14 February.
targetString: د چين مینلند څخه بهر اولني مړي د فرورۍ په اوله نېټه فلپاين کې شوي وو، او د اسيا نه بهر اولني مړي په فرانس کې 14 February باندې مخې ته راغلې وو.
en-mt: The first bodies were found outside the Chinese mainland in the Philippines on February 1، and the first bodies from outside Asia were found in France on 14 February.

sourceString: By 28 February, outside mainland China, more than a dozen deaths each were recorded in Iran, South Korea, and Italy.
targetString: 28 فروري د چين مرکزي ځمکې نه بهر، په ايران، سوېلي کوريا او ايټاليا کې په لسګونو مړينې ثبت شوي.
en-mt: On February 28، dozens of deaths were reported in Iran، South Korea and Italy.

sourceString: By 13 March, more than forty countries and territories had reported deaths, on every continent except Antarctica.Several measures are commonly used to quantify mortality.
targetString: د مارچ په 13مه نېټه 40 نه زياتو هېوادونو او سيمو او د انترکتیکا نه بغیر هر براعظم کې مړينې راپورونه شوي دي، د مړينو اندازه کولو لپاره ډير عمومي تدابیر نیول شوي.
en-mt: As of March 13، more than 40 countries and territories، and in every continent except Antarctica، more general measures have been taken to measure deaths.

sourceString: These numbers vary by region and over time, and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak, and population characteristics such as age, sex, and overall health.The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
targetString: دا شمېرې د سيمې او وخت تېرېدو سره بدلېږي، او د آزموینو حجم، د روغتيا پاملرنې  کيفيت، درملنې اختيار، د اولني پېښې وروسته وخت او ده نفوس ځانګړتياوې لکه عمر، جنس، او عمومي روغتيا لخوا اغيزمن کيږي، د مرګ تر پېښې تناسب د ټاکل شوي وخت په جريان  کې د تشخيص شويو پېښو شمېر سره وېشل شوي د مړينې شمېره منعکس کوي.
en-mt: These numbers vary with region and time، and are influenced by the volume of tests، health care quality، treatment options، time after the first incident، and demographic characteristics such as age، sex، and general health، reflecting the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases during the specified time period.

sourceString: Based on Johns Hopkins University statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) as of 10 April 2020.
targetString: د جان هاپکينز پوهنتون د شمېرو له مخې کال د 2020, کال د اپرېل تر 10م پورې په نړۍ کې د مرګ تناسب 6.0% دی۔
en-mt: According to Johns Hopkins University, the death rate in the world is 6.0% as of April 10, 2020.

sourceString: The number varies by region.
targetString: دا شمېره د سيمې په کچه فرق لري.
en-mt: This number varies by region.

sourceString: In China, estimates for the death-to-case ratio decreased from 17.3% (for those with symptom onset 1–10 January 2020) to 0.7% (for those with symptom onset after 1 February 2020).Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percent of diagnosed people who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percent of infected (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease.
targetString: په چين کې د مړينې تناسب په هغه %17.3 کسانو کې (کومو کې چې دا 1 نه تر د 10 جنوري 2020 پورې نښي وي) تر د %0.7 ره ټيټ شوي (کومو کې چې د 1 فرورۍ, 2020 نه پس نښې نښاني راغلې وې).نورو ګامونو کې د پېښې مړينو کچه(CFR) شامله ده، کوم چې د ناروغي څخه مړه شوي کسانو سلنه منعکس کوي، او د ناروغي پېښو کچه(IFR)، کوم چې د ناروغه (تشخيص شوي او ناتشخيص شوي) کسانو سلنه څرګندوي چې د ناروغي څخه مړه دي۔
en-mt: The proportion of deaths in China has decreased by 17.3% (in those with symptoms from 1 to 10 January 2020) to 0.7% (with symptoms occurring after 1 February 2020). Other measures include the case death rate (CFR)، which reflects the percentage of people dying from the disease، and the disease case rate (IFR). The percentage of patients (diagnosed and undiagnosed) indicates that they are dead from the disease.

sourceString: These statistics are not timebound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution.
targetString: دغه احسائيه د وخت حد نه لري او مخصوصو آبادي د عفونت څخه تر د حل تعقيب وي۔
en-mt: This process does not have a time limit and specially residents follow the infection to the solution.

sourceString: A number of academics have attempted to calculate these numbers for specific populations.
targetString: يو شمېر علمي بنسټونو هڅه کړې ترڅو دا ارقام د ځانګړو نفوسو لپاره وکاروي.
en-mt: A number of scientific institutions have tried to use these figures for specific populations.

sourceString: The University of Oxford's Centre for Evidence-Based Medicine estimates that the infection fatality rate for the pandemic as a whole is between 0.1% and 0.39%.
targetString: د آکسفورډ پوهنتون مرکز ادویه شواهدو پر بنياد اندازه لګولې چې وباء لپاره د ناروغي کچه 0.1% نه تر د 0.39 مينځ کې ده.
en-mt: The University of Oxford's Centre for Medicines has measured the disease from 0.1% to 0.39%.

sourceString: The upper estimate of this range is consistent with the results from the first random testing for COVID-19 in Germany, and a statistical study analysing the impact of testing on CFR estimates.
targetString: په جرمني کې د دې رینج لوړه اندازه پرله پسې د COVID-19 تشخيص دي، او او يوې ستاتیسټکل څېړنه ده تشخيص په CFR اغيزمن کېدو اندازه ورکوي.
en-mt: The highest rate of this range in Germany is a consistent diagnosis of COVID-19، and a state-of-the-art study is giving the diagnosis a measure of the effectiveness of CFR.

sourceString: The WHO asserts that the pandemic can be controlled.
targetString: د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان څرګنده کړې چې وبا کنترول کېدی شي.
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) has confirmed that the pandemic can be controlled.

sourceString: The peak and ultimate duration of the outbreak are uncertain and may differ by location.
targetString: د ناروغۍ زياتوالی او وخت غیریقیني دی او دا چې ځای په مناسبت سره مختلف وي.
en-mt: The increase in disease and time is uncertain، and the location varies accordingly.

sourceString: Maciej Boni of Penn State University stated, "Left unchecked, infectious outbreaks typically plateau and then start to decline when the disease runs out of available hosts.
targetString: د Penn رياست پوهنتون  Maciej Boni وايي چې د نه چېک شوي انفکشن ناروغي عمومي ډول د فیلتو او بيا کمیدل شروع شي چې کله ناروغي د شته کوربه څخه تيريږي.
en-mt: Penn State University's Maciej Boni says that uninfected infections generally begin to decline and then decline when the disease passes through an existing host.

sourceString: But it's almost impossible to make any sensible projection right now about when that will be".
targetString: خو دا امکان نه لري چي اوس څه قسمه هوښيار وړاندوينه اوکړو چې دا به کله وي.
en-mt: However، it is not possible to predict when it will happen.

sourceString: The Chinese government's senior medical adviser Zhong Nanshan argued that "it could be over by June" if all countries can be mobilized to follow the WHO's advice on measures to stop the spread of the virus.
targetString: د چين حکومت ستر طبي سلاکار zhong Nashan استدلال کوي چې دغه به د جون پورې ختم شي، که چېرې ټول هېوادونو د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان له اړخه د وېروس خپريدو مخنيوي  لپاره ورکړي شوي مشورو باندې عمل وکړي.
en-mt: The Chinese government's top medical advisor، Zhong Nashan، argues that it will end in June if all countries follow the advice given by the World Health Organization to prevent the spread of the virus.

sourceString: On 17 March, Adam Kucharski of the London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine stated that SARS-CoV-2 "is going to be circulating, potentially for a year or two".
targetString: په 17مارچ، ده Adam Kucharski of London School of Hygiene & Typical Medicine وايي چې کېدې شي SARS-CoV-2  په احتمالي توګه يو يا دوه کالو پورې راخور شي.
en-mt: On 17 Mar، Adam Kucharski of the London School of Hygiene & Typical Medicine says SARS-CoV-2 could potentially be in a year or two.

sourceString: According to the Imperial College study led by Neil Ferguson, physical distancing and other measures will be required "until a vaccine becomes available (potentially 18 months or more)".
targetString: د ايمپيريل کالج مطالعې کې نييل فرګوسن وايي چې دا يو بل سره فاصله او نور احتياط به پکار وې "تر څو چې واکسين نه وي شته شوي (په راروانو 18مياشتو يا زيات وخت کې)"۔
en-mt: Niel Ferguson، a study at Imperial College، said that distance and more caution would be needed "unless there is a vaccine (in the next 18 months or more)."

sourceString: William Schaffner of Vanderbilt University stated, "I think it's unlikely that this coronavirus—because it's so readily transmissible—will disappear completely" and it "might turn into a seasonal disease, making a comeback every year".
targetString: د وينډربيلټ پوهنتون څخه ويليم شافنر وینا کړې، ،"زه خيال کوم چې امکان نه لري چې دغه کورونا وېروس - ځکه چې دا په اسانه د لګېدو وړ وي په بشپړ ډول به ورک شي او دا ممکنه ده" په موسمي ناروغي بدل شي، چې هر کال بېرته راشي.
en-mt: William Scheffner، from The University of Vanderbilt، said: "I think it's not possible that the coronavirus - because it's easy to infect - will disappear completely and it's possible" to become a seasonal disease to come back every year.

sourceString: The virulence of the comeback would depend on herd immunity and the extent of mutation.
targetString: د وېروس راستنېدل به د معافيت او بدلون حد پورې اړه ولري.
en-mt: The return of the virus will depend on the extent of immunity and change.

sourceString: Symptoms of COVID-19 can be relatively non-specific and infected people may be asymptomatic.
targetString: د COVID-19 علايم نسبتا" غېر مشخص کېدی شي او ناروغه کسان بغیر له نښو نښانو کېدی شي.
en-mt: The symptoms of COVID-19 can be relatively unknown and can be treated without symptoms.

sourceString: The two most common symptoms are fever (88%) and dry cough (68%).
targetString: دوه عامه نښې نښانې يې %88 تبه او %68 خشک توخی دی.
en-mt: Two common symptoms are 88% fever and 68% dry fever.

sourceString: Less common symptoms include fatigue, respiratory sputum production (phlegm), loss of the sense of smell, shortness of breath, muscle and joint pain, sore throat, headache, chills, vomiting, hemoptysis, diarrhea, or cyanosis.The WHO states that approximately one person in six becomes seriously ill and has difficulty breathing.
targetString: په کم شمېر عمومي علايمو کې ستړیا، بلغم، د شامعې حس نشتون، ساه لنډي، د عضلاتو او بندونو دردونه، ستوني درد، سر درد، سرطاني ناروغي، کانکو، هموټیسیس، پيچس يا سایانوسي شامل دي. د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان وايي چې په شپږو کې يو کس ناروغه کېږي او تنفس مشکل لري۔
en-mt: Few general symptoms include fatigue، phlegm، lack of sense of humor، shortness of breath، muscle and band pain، throat pain، headache، cancer، conco، hemosis، pitch or cyanosis. According to the World Health Organization، one in six people get sick and have difficulty breathing.

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) lists emergency symptoms as difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, sudden confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.Further development of the disease can lead to severe pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, sepsis, septic shock and death.
targetString: امریکا کې د ناروغيو کنترول او مخنيوي مرکز(CDC) عاجله نښو يو لېست جوړ کړی چې له مخې یې تنفسی ستونزې، په سینه  کې درد يا فشار، ناڅاپي مغشوشیت، را بېدرېدو کې ستونزې او مخ يا په شونډو کې شينولې شامل دي. دغو نښې نښانې لرلو وله ته سمدستي طبي پاملرنې تجویز کړي شوي ده. دا بيماري نور زياتوالي سختې نمونيا، سخت تنفسي پریشاني ساينډروم، سېپسېز، سبتیک شوک او مرګ هم راوستې شي.
en-mt: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) has developed a list of emergency signs that include respiratory problems، chest pain or pressure، sudden confusion، difficulty in stopping، or blurring of the lips. The symptoms of these symptoms have been promptly prescribed for medical attention. The disease can also lead to more severe pneumonia، severe respiratory distress syndrome، synesthesia، septumic shock and death.

sourceString: Some of those infected may be asymptomatic, with no clinical symptoms but with test results that confirm infection, so researchers have issued advice that those with close contact to confirmed infected people should be closely monitored and examined to rule out infection.
targetString: دغو ناروغه کسانو کې به څه نه څه نښې نښانې نه وي او نه به پکې طبي نښې وې، خو په تشخيص کې به ناروغي ښکاره کيږي، د څېړونکي مشوره ورکړې چې کومو کسانو ده ناروغه کسانو سره نژدې وخت اړولې وې هغو باندې دي نظر وساتل شي او د عفونت د ختمولو لپاره څېړنه وشي.
en-mt: There will be no symptoms and no medical symptoms، but the diagnosis will be revealed، and the researchers advised that those who had been infected with the disease should be kept an eye on them and be investigated to end the infection.

sourceString: Chinese estimates of the asymptomatic ratio range from few to 44%.
targetString: چين د نښو نه بغير ناروغي اندازه %44 لګولې ده.
en-mt: China has a rate of 44% without symptoms.

sourceString: The usual incubation period (the time between infection and symptom onset) ranges from one to 14 days; it is most commonly five days.As an example of uncertainty, the estimate of the fraction of people with COVID-19 who lost their sense of smell was initially 30% and later fell to 15%.
targetString: د علايمو او ککړتيا ترمنځ 14ورځې وخت وي، زيات تر 5 ورځې وې، په دې کې غيریقیني صورت حال څه داسې دې چې COVID-19 مخ کسانو کې د شامعې حس 30 سلنه وي او روسته بیا 15% شي.
en-mt: The time between symptoms and infection was 14 days، more than 5 days، while the average person with COVID-19 was 30% and then 15%.

sourceString: Some details about how the disease is spread are still being determined.
targetString: د ناروغۍ د خپرېدو د څرنګوالي په هکله ځینې تشریحات لا هم د مشخصېدو په مرحله کې دي.
en-mt: Some explanations for how the disease spread are still being determined.

sourceString: The disease is believed to be primarily spread during close contact and by small droplets produced during coughing, sneezing, or talking; with close contact being within 1 to 2 metres (3 to 6 feet).
targetString: اول ناروغي د کسانو سره بېخی نژدې اړيکه کې اوسېدل، ده توخي له امله هوا کې څاڅکو، پرانجي او يا نژدې کسانو سره 1 نه تر 2 ميټره (3 نه تر 6 فټ) خبرې کولو له لارې خپرېږي۔
en-mt: First، the disease is transmitted in very close contact with people، caused by air drops، sneezes، or 1 to 2 m (3 to 6 ft) of air.

sourceString: Studies have found that an uncovered coughing can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 metres (15 feet) to 8.2 metres (27 feet).
targetString: موندنې ښيي، چې آزاده هوا کې د ټوخی له امله کېدای شي دا واېروس له 4.5 متره (15 فوټو) نه تر 8.2 (27) فوټو پورې انتقال شي.
en-mt: The findings suggest that the virus can be transmitted from 4.5 meters (15 feet) to 8.2 (27) feet.

sourceString: Some have proposed that the virus may also be transmitted by small droplets that stay for more prolonged periods in the air, that may be generated during speech.Respiratory droplets may also be produced during breathing out, including when talking, though the virus is not generally airborne.
targetString: ځيني خلک وړانديز کوي چې ويروس په هوا کې د کوچنیو څاڅکو په شکل هم لېږدېدای شي ځکه چې دا ډير ساعت لپاره په هوا پاتې کېږي، کوم چه د خبرو په وخت کې دا خلې نه وځي، تنفسي څاڅکي هم دا ساه په وخت کې پيدا کيږي خو کله چې خبرې کيږي، حلانکي ويروس په هوا کې قدرتي نه پيدا کېږي.
en-mt: Some people suggest that the virus can also be transmitted in the form of small droplets in the air because it stays in the air for many hours، which does not leave the air during the speech، and respiratory droplets can also be transmitted in the air، but when spoken، the virus does not become natural in the air.

sourceString: The droplets can land in the mouths or noses of people who are nearby or possibly be inhaled into the lungs.
targetString: دغه څاڅکي د نژدې کسانو په خوله کې يا په پوزه کې کېناسته شي يا امکان لري چې سږي ته لاړ شي.
en-mt: These droplets can be found in the mouth or in the nose or may go to the lungs.

sourceString: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolized and thus result in airborne spread.
targetString: ځيني طبي عملونه لکه انټوبيشن او کارډيوپلمونري ري سسيټيشن (CPR) هم ده تنفسي رطوبتونو ايروسولايزډ او دغسې په هوا کې خپور شي.
en-mt: Some medical practices such as intubation and cardioplemonary respiration (CPR) are also used to aerosolid respiratory tracts and thus spread into the air.

sourceString: It may also spread when one touches a contaminated surface, including skin, and then touches their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: دا واېروس کېدای شي د پوستکي په ګډون له ککړو سطحو سره د تماس په صورت کې په سترګو، پزه او خوله باندې د لاس وهلو له لارې هم خپور شي.
en-mt: This virus can also be spread by touching the eyes، nose and mouth، including the skin.

sourceString: While there are concerns it may spread by faeces, this risk is believed to be low.
targetString: دا اندېښنه هم شتون لري چې ناروغي د فاضله موادو سرو هم خپرېږي خو دا خطر کم ګڼل کيږي.
en-mt: There is also concern that the disease is spread by waste، but the risk is low.

sourceString: The Government of China denied the possibility of faecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2.The virus is most contagious during the first three days after onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.
targetString: د چين حکومت له دې امکان څخه انکار کړی دی چې SARS-CoV-2 د له ککړتیا  څخه خور شوی وي.دا وېروس د نښانو راتلو څخه وروستو درې ورځو کښې زيات خپرېدونکی وي کۀ څۀ هم د نښانو څرګندېدو او د رنځ د آخيريو پړاونو څخه وړاندې د خپرېدو امکان شتون لري.
en-mt: The Chinese government has denied the possibility that SARS-CoV-2 was spread from infection، and the virus spread more than three days after the outbreak of the virus، although it is possible to spread before the symptoms appear and before the early stages of the disease.

sourceString: People have tested positive for the disease up to three days before onset of symptoms suggesting transmission is possible before developing significant symptoms.
targetString: خلکو د ثمشهړص له پیل څخه درې ورځې وړاندې د دې ناروغۍ لپاره مثبت معاینه کړې چې د پام وړ نښو رامینځته کیدو دمخه د لیږد امکان شتون لري.
en-mt: People have tested positive for the disease three days before the onset of the disease، with the possibility of transmission before significant symptoms develop.

sourceString: Only few reports of laboratory-confirmed asymptomatic cases exist, but asymptomatic transmission has been identified by some countries during contact tracing investigations.
targetString: یوازې د لابراتوار لخوا تایید شوي اسیمپټوماتیک قضیې راپورونه شتون لري ، مګر د اړیکې موندنې تحقیقاتو په جریان کې د ځینې هیوادونو لخوا اسیمپټومیټیک لیږد پیژندل شوی.
en-mt: There are only reports of laboratory-confirmed osmeptomatic cases، but some countries have identified osptomitic transmission by some countries during contact finding investigations.

sourceString: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) states that while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.The virus survives for hours to days on surfaces.
targetString: د ناروغیو مخنیوي او کنټرول لپاره د اروپایي مرکز (ECDC) ویلي چې پداسې حال کې چې دا په بشپړ ډول روښانه نده چې ناروغي په اسانۍ سره څنګه خپریږي ، یو شخص عموما دوه څخه تر دری نورو پورې اخته کوي. وېروس د ساعتونو څخه تر څو ورځو پورې په جریان کې ژوند کوي.
en-mt: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) said that while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads، one person typically infects two to three others. The virus lives for hours to several days.

sourceString: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and 304 stainless steel, for one day on cardboard, and for up to four hours on copper.
targetString: په ځانګړي توګه ، وېروس وموندل شو چې تر درې ورځو پورې په پلاستيک (پولی پروپیلین) او 304 سټینلیس فولادو کې ، د یوې ورځې لپاره په بورډ کارت کې ، او تر څلورو ساعتونو پورې په مسو کې کشف شوی.
en-mt: In particular، the virus was found to be in plastic (polypropylene) and 304 stainless steel for up to three days، on a board card for one day، and in copper for up to four hours.

sourceString: This, however, varies based on the humidity and temperature.Pets and other animals have tested positive for COVID-19.
targetString: دا په هرصورت ، د رطوبت او تودوخې پراساس توپیر لري. د پالتو څاروی او نورو څارویو د COVID-19 لپاره مثبته ازموینه کړې.
en-mt: However، it varies based on humidity and humidity. Pet and other animals tested positive for COVID-19.

sourceString: There is no evidence animals can pass the virus on to humans, though British authorities advise washing one's hands after contact with animals, like after contact with other surfaces infected people could have touched.
targetString: داسې کوم شواهد شتون نلري چې څاروي انسانانو ته وېروس لیږدوي ، که څه هم بریتانیا چارواکي د څارویو سره د تماس وروسته د لاسونو مینځلو مشوره کوي ، لکه د نورو سطحو سره چې د ناروغۍ سره اړیکه درلوده کیدی شي.
en-mt: There is no evidence that animals transmit the virus to humans، although British authorities advise washing hands after contact with animals، such as with other surfaces that have been in contact with the disease.

sourceString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel virus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan.
targetString: د سخت او نازکه تنفسي سينډروم کورونا وېروس 2019 (COVID-19) يو نوی وېروس دی چې په لومړي ځل د په وهان کې د  د سختې تنفسي ناروغی سره اړوند سينه بغل د درې ناروغانو څخه واخيستل شو۔
en-mt: Severe and fragile respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) is a new virus that was first taken from three patients with severe respiratory disease related to severe respiratory disease in Dhan.

sourceString: All features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in related coronaviruses in nature.Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which dissolves its protective envelope.SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.
targetString: د ناول SARS-CoV-2 وېروس ټولې برخی په طبیعت کې په اړونده کورونا وېرس کې پیښیږي. د انسان بدن بهر، وېروس د کورنۍ صابون لخوا وژل کیږي، کوم چې خپل محافظتي لفافه یې تحلیلوي. SARS-CoV-2 له اصلي SARS سره نږدې تړاو لري.
en-mt: All variants of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in the nature of the coronavirus. Outside of the human body، the virus is killed by household soap، which analyzes its protective envelope. SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to sars.

sourceString: It is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
targetString: ویل کيږي چې د وېروس منشه له حیواناتو ده.
en-mt: The virus is believed to be from animals.

sourceString: Genetic analysis has revealed that the coronavirus genetically clusters with the genus Betacoronavirus, in subgenus Sarbecovirus (lineage B) together with two bat-derived strains.
targetString: جينيايي تحلیل په ډاګه کوي چې کورونا واېرس په جینیتیکي ډول د بیټا کورونا وېروس ژانر سره په سبجینس ساربیک وېروس (نسب ب) کې دوه دوه ډډ کونکي فشار سره یوځای کلستر کوي.
en-mt: Genetic analysis indicates that coronaviruses genetically cluster together with the beta-corona virus variant in subgenes sarbic virus (ancestry B).

sourceString: It is 96% identical at the whole genome level to other bat coronavirus samples (BatCov RaTG13).
targetString: دا د نورو څکالکو کورونا وېرس نمونو (BatCov RaTG13) ته د ټول جینوم په کچه 96٪ ورته دی.
en-mt: This is 96% of the total genome rate to other samples (BatCov RaTG13).

sourceString: In February 2020, Chinese researchers found that there is only one amino acid difference in certain parts of the genome sequences between the viruses from pangolins and those from humans.
targetString: په 2020 فبروري کې، چینايي څیړونکو وموندله چې د جینوم سلسلو په ځینو برخو کې د پینګولینز او د انسانانو څخه د ورېروسونو ترمینځ یوازې یو امینو اسید توپیر شتون لري.
en-mt: In February 2020، Chinese researchers found that there is only one amino acid difference between pingolins and viruses from humans in some parts of the genome.

sourceString: Whole-genome comparison to date has found at most 92% of genetic material shared between pangolin coronavirus and SARS-CoV-2, which is insufficient to prove pangolins to be the intermediate host.
targetString: د نیټې سره د بشپړ جینوم پرتله نسبتا %92 مواد جینیاتیک مواد موندلي چې د پینګولین کورونا وېروس او SARS-CoV-2 تر مینځ شریک شوي ، کوم چې د مینځنۍ کوربه کیدو لپاره پانګولین ثابتولو لپاره کافي ندي.
en-mt: Compared with the date of the full genome، relatively 92% found genetic material shared between pingolin coronavirus and SARS-CoV-2، which is not enough to prove that it is a medium host.

sourceString: Infection by the virus can be provisionally diagnosed on the basis of symptoms, though confirmation is ultimately by reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) of infected secretions or CT imaging.
targetString: د وېروس په وسيله انتان کولی شي په لنډ ډول د نښو په اساس تشخیص شي، که څه هم تایید په پای کې د اخته شوي محصولاتو یا CT امیجز معاوضه د پولیمرېز سلسلې عکس العمل لخوا دی.
en-mt: Infections caused by the virus can be briefly diagnosed on the basis of symptoms، although the confirmation is ultimately caused by the polymeric chain reaction of infected products or CT amygdalas.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: په وهان کې د PCR سره د PCR پرتله کولو یوې مطالعې وړاندیز وکړ چې CT د PCR په پرتله خورا حساس دی ، که څه هم لږ مشخص دی ، د دې ډیری عکس العملونه د نورو نمونیا او ناروغۍ پروسو سره پوښل شوي.
en-mt: A study comparing PCR to PCR in TheHan suggested that CT is more sensitive than PCR، although less specific، most of its reactions are covered with other sampling and disease processes.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".
targetString: د 2020 مارچ پورې، د راډیولوژي امریکایی کالج وړاندیز کوي چې "CT باید د COVID-19 تشخیص کولو لپاره د لومړۍ کرښې ازموینې لپاره یا د سکرین کولو لپاره ونه کارول شي".
en-mt: As of March 2020، the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used for a front-line test or for screening to diagnose COVID-19."

sourceString: The WHO has published several RNA testing protocols for SARS-CoV-2, with the first issued on 17 January.
targetString: د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان د SARS-CoV-2 لپاره د RNA ازموینې ډیری پروتوکولونه خپاره کړي ، په لومړي سر کې د جنوري په 17 خپور شوی.
en-mt: The World Health Organization has released several RNA testing protocols for SARS-CoV-2، first published on January 17.

sourceString: The test uses real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).
targetString: ازموینه د ریښتیني وخت ریورس لیږد پولیمریزې زنځیر غبرګون (rRT-PCR) کاروي.
en-mt: The test uses real-time polymeric chain reaction (rRT-PCR).

sourceString: The test can be done on respiratory or blood samples.
targetString: ازموینه د تنفس یا وینې نمونو باندې ترسره کیدی شي.
en-mt: The test can be performed on breath or blood samples.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to days.
targetString: پایلې عموما د څو ساعتونو څخه تر ورځو پورې شتون لري.
en-mt: Results are usually available from a few hours to days.

sourceString: Generally this test is carried out on a nasopharyngeal swab though a throat swab may also be used.A number of laboratories and companies are developing serological tests, which detect antibodies.
targetString: په عموم کې دا ازموینه په ناسوفرینجیل سویب باندې ترسره کیږي پداسې حال کې چې د ستوني سویب هم کارول کیدی شي. یو شمیر لابراتوارونه او شرکتونه سیرولوژيکي ازموینې پرمخ وړي ، کوم چې انټي باډیزونه کشف کوي.
en-mt: In general، this test is performed on a nasopharyngeal swab while the throat swab can also be used. A number of laboratories and companies are conducting serological tests, which detect antibodies.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, none of these has been proved sufficiently accurate to be approved for widespread use.
targetString: د 2020 کال د اپریل تر 6 پورې ، له دې څخه هیڅ یو په کافي اندازه دقیق نه دی ثابت شوی چې د پراخه کارونې لپاره تصویب شي.
en-mt: As of April 6، 2020، none of these have been proven to be sufficiently accurate to be approved for widespread use.

sourceString: In the US a serological test developed by Cellex has been approved for emergency use by certified laboratories only.
targetString: په متحده ایالاتو کې د سیلیکس لخوا رامینځته شوی سیرولوژيکي ازموینه یوازې د تصدیق شوي لابراتوارونو لخوا د اضطراري کارونې لپاره منظور شوې.
en-mt: The cereology test developed by Celix in the United States is only approved for emergency use by certified laboratories.

sourceString: Characteristic imaging features on radiographs and computed tomography (CT) of people who are symptomatic include asymmetric peripheral ground glass opacities and absent pleural effusions.
targetString: د رادیوګرافونو او کمپیوټري ټوموگرافي (CT) کې د امیجنګ ځانګړتیاوې چې علامتي دي د غیر متناسب پیریفیریل ګریډ اپیسیسیس او غیر حاضر خوشبیني عامل شامل
en-mt: Characterization of aging in radiographs and computer-tomographic (CT) that are symptomatic include disproportionate pyrepheryl grade aposis and absent optimism factor

sourceString: The Italian Radiological Society is compiling an international online database of imaging findings for confirmed cases.
targetString: د ایټالیا راډیولوژانو ټولنه د تایید شویو قضیو لپاره د عکس العمل موندنو نړیوال آنلاین ډیټابیس ترتیبوي.
en-mt: The Italian Radiolodical Society sets up a global online database of reaction findings for confirmed cases.

sourceString: Due to overlap with other infections such as adenovirus, imaging without confirmation by PCR is of limited specificity in identifying COVID-19.
targetString: د نورو انتانونو لکه اډینو وېروس سره د ډیریدو له امله، د PCR لخوا تایید پرته عکس اخیستل د COVID-19 پیژندلو کې محدود مشخصیت لري.
en-mt: Due to the increase in infections of other infections such as adenovirus، photographing without PCR confirmation has limited specificity in identifying COVID-19.

sourceString: A large study in China compared chest CT results to PCR and demonstrated that though imaging is less specific for the infection, it is faster and more sensitive, suggesting its consideration as a screening tool in epidemic areas.
targetString: په چین کې یوې لویې مطالعې د سینټ CT پایلې PCR سره پرتله کړې او څرګنده یې کړه چې که څه هم عکس العمل د انفیکشن لپاره لږ مشخص دی ، خو ګړندی او ډیر حساس دی ، په ایپیډیمیک برخو کې د سکرینینګ وسیلې په توګه د دې پام وړاندیز کوي.
en-mt: A large study in China compared the results of St. Ct pcr and revealed that although the reaction is less specific to infection، it is faster and more sensitive، suggesting its attention as a screening tool in epidymic areas.

sourceString: Artificial intelligence-based convolutional neural networks have been developed to detect imaging features of the virus with both radiographs and CT.
targetString: د مصنوعي استخباراتو پر اساس قوي اعصابي شبکې د راډیوګرافونو او CT دواړو سره د وېروس عکس العمل کشفه کولو لپاره رامینځته شوي.
en-mt: Strong neural networks based on artificial intelligence have been developed to detect viral replication with both radiographs and CT.

sourceString: Strategies for preventing transmission of the disease include maintaining overall good personal hygiene, washing hands, avoiding touching the eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands, and coughing or sneezing into a tissue and putting the tissue directly into a waste container.
targetString: د ناروغۍ د لیږد څخه مخنیوي لپاره ستراتیژیو کې شامل دي د عمومي شخصي حفظ الصحې ساتل ، د لاسونو مینځل ، د لاسونو ، پوزې او خولې سره د لاسونو نه پریښودل منع کول ، او ټوخی کول یا چپنه کول او نسج مستقیم په فاضله کانتینر کې اچول.
en-mt: Strategies to prevent transmission of the disease include maintaining general personal hygiene، washing hands، preventing the hands from leaving hands، nose and mouth، and coughing or wearing and putting tissue directly into a waste container.

sourceString: Those who may already have the infection have been advised to wear a surgical mask in public.
targetString: هغه کسان چې ممکن دمخه انتان ولري نو ورته سپارښتنه شوې چې په عام محضر کې جراحي ماسک واغوندي.
en-mt: People who may already have an infection are advised to wear surgical masks in public.

sourceString: Physical distancing measures are also recommended to prevent transmission.Many governments have restricted or advised against all non-essential travel to and from countries and areas affected by the outbreak.
targetString: فزیکي واټن لرل اقدامات هم د لیږد مخنیوي لپاره وړاندیز شوي. ډیری دولتونو هیوادونو او سیمو ته د ودې په واسطه زیانمن شوي ټول غیر لازمي سفر محدود یا مشوره کړ
en-mt: Physical distancing measures are also recommended to prevent transmission. Many governments have restricted or advised all non-essential travel affected by the growth of countries and regions.

sourceString: However, the virus has reached the stage of community spread in large parts of the world.
targetString: په هرصورت ، وېروس د نړۍ په لویو برخو کې د خپریدو مرحلې ته رسیدلی.
en-mt: However، the virus has reached a stage of spreading in large parts of the world.

sourceString: This means that the virus is spreading within communities, and some community members don't know where or how they were infected.Health care providers taking care of someone who may be infected are recommended to use standard precautions, contact precautions, and eye protection.Contact tracing is an important method for health authorities to determine the source of an infection and to prevent further transmission.
targetString: دا پدې معنا ده چې وېروس په ټولنو کې خپریږي ، او د ټولنې ځینې غړي نه پوهیږي چیرې چیرې او څنګه دوی په ناروغۍ اخته شوي. د روغتیا پاملرنې چمتو کونکي د هغه چا پاملرنه کوي چې ممکن  د معیاري احتیاط ، د تماس احتیاط او د سترګو محافظت وکاروي. د اړیکې تثبیت د روغتیا چارواکو لپاره یو مهم میتود دی چې د ناروغۍ سرچینه وټاکي او نور لیږد مخه ونیسي.
en-mt: This means that the virus is spreading in communities، and some members of the community don't know where or how they became infected. Health care providers care for those who may use standard caution، contact caution and eye protection. Contact identification is an important method for health authorities to determine the source of the disease and prevent further transmission.

sourceString: The use of location data from mobile phones by governments for this purpose has prompted privacy concerns, with Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issuing a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: د دې هدف لپاره د حکومتونو لخوا د ګرځنده تلیفونونو څخه د موقعیت ډیټا کارولو سره د محرمیت اندیښنې راپورته شوي ، د بخښنې نړیوال سازمان او 100 نورو سازمانونو په یوه بیان کې د دې ډول نظارت محدودیتونو غوښتنه کړې.
en-mt: Privacy concerns have been raised by governments with the use of location data from mobile phones for this purpose، Amnesty International and 100 other organisations have called for such surveillance restrictions in a statement.

sourceString: Various mobile apps have been implemented or proposed for voluntary use, and as of April 7, 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: بیلابیل ګرځنده ایپسونه د داوطلبي کارونې لپاره پلي شوي یا وړاندیز شوي ، او د 2020 اپریل څخه تر 20 پورې ماهر ګروپونه د محرمیت دوستانه حلونو کار کوي ، لکه د نورو ګرځنده تلیفونونو سره د کاروونکي نږدې کیدو ته د بلوټوت کارول.
en-mt: Various mobile apps have been implemented or offered for voluntary use، and from April 2020 to April 2020 expert groups are working on privacy-friendly solutions، such as using Bluetooth to approach the user with other mobile phones.

sourceString: Users then receive a message if they've been in close contact with someone who has tested positive for COVID-19.Misconceptions are circulating about how to prevent infection; for example, rinsing the nose and gargling with mouthwash are not effective.
targetString: بیا کارونکي پیغام ترلاسه کوي که چیرې دوی د یو چا سره نږدې اړیکې ولري څوک چې د COVID-19 لپاره مثبته ازموینه کړې وي.غلط فهمۍ د ناروغۍ د مخنیوي څرنګوالي په اړه خپریږي. د مثال په توګه ، د پوزې پاکول او د خولې واش سره  مؤثره ندي.
en-mt: The user then receives a message if they have a close relationship with someone who has tested positive for COVID-19. For example، cleaning the nose and mouthwash is not effective.

sourceString: There is no COVID-19 vaccine, though many organizations are working to develop one.
targetString: د CoVID-19 واکسین شتون نلري، که څه هم ډیری سازمانونه کار کوي ترڅو دا واکسین جوړ کړي.
en-mt: There is no COVID-19 vaccine، although many organizations are working to develop the vaccine.

sourceString: Hand washing is recommended to prevent the spread of the disease.
targetString: د لاس مینځل کولی شي د ناروغۍ خپریدو مخه ونیسي یا یې خپرول کم کړي.
en-mt: Hand washing can prevent or reduce the spread of the disease.

sourceString: The CDC recommends that people wash hands often with soap and water for at least twenty seconds, especially after going to the toilet or when hands are visibly dirty; before eating; and after blowing one's nose, coughing, or sneezing.
targetString: CDC سپارښتنه کوي چې خلک لږ تر لږه شل ثانیو لپاره ډیری وختونه په صابون او اوبو سره ومینځي ، په ځانګړي توګه تشناب ته د تلو وروسته یا کله چې لاسونه په ښکاره ډول چټل وي؛ مخکې له خوړلو؛ او د پزی د وهلو وروسته ، ټوخی یا ټوخی.
en-mt: The CDC recommends that people wash frequently with soap and water for at least 20 seconds، especially after going to the bathroom or when their hands are apparently dirty؛ before eating؛ and after beating the nose، coughing or coughing.

sourceString: This is because outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which bursts its protective bubble.
targetString: دا ځکه چې د انسان بدن بهر، ویروس د کورنۍ صابون لخوا وژل کیږي ، کوم چې خپل محافظت بلبلا ماتوي.
en-mt: This is because outside the human body، the virus is killed by household soap، which breaks its protective bubble.

sourceString: CDC further recommended using an alcohol-based hand sanitizer with at least 60% alcohol by volume when soap and water are not readily available.
targetString: CDC نور د الکول پراساس لاسي سنیټیټر کارولو وړاندیز وکړ لږترلږه 60% الکول د حجم له مخې کله چې صابون او اوبه په اسانۍ سره شتون نلري.
en-mt: The CDC recommends the use of alcohol-based hand sanitizer to at least 60% alcohol by volume when soap and water are not readily available.

sourceString: The WHO advises people to avoid touching the eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands.
targetString: د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان خلکو ته وائي چي تر څو مو لاسونه نه وي وينځلي خپل سترګې، پوزه يا خله مه لمس کوئ.
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) tells people not to touch their eyes، nose or mouth until they wash their hands.

sourceString: Surfaces may be decontaminated with a number of solutions (within one minute of exposure to the disinfectant for a stainless steel surface), including 62–71% ethanol, 50–100% isopropanol, 0.1% sodium hypochlorite, 0.5% hydrogen peroxide, and 0.2–7.5% povidone-iodine.
targetString: مخونه د يو شمېر محلولونو په مرسته د وېروس څخه ضد عفوني کېدی شي (بې زنګه پولادي مخ لږ تر لږه يوې دقيقې لپاره د وېروسو پاکوونکي ته مخامخ کړئ) چې پکښي 62-71% پورې ايتنول، 50-100%  پورې آيسو پروپينول، 0.1% سوډيم هايپوکلورائيډ, 0.5% هائيډروجن پر اکسائيډ  او 0.2-7.5% پورې پوويډون آيوډين شامل وي۔
en-mt: Faces can be disinfected with the help of a number of solutions (exposure to a viral cleanser for at least one minute) containing 62-71% ethanol، 50-100% eso propinol، 0.1% sodium hypochloride، 0.5% hydrogen peroxide and 0.2-7.5% poydonium iodine.

sourceString: Other solutions, such as benzalkonium chloride and chrohexidine gluconate, are less effective.
targetString: نور محلولونه لکه بينزالکونيم کلورائيډ او کلوروهيکسيډين ګلوکونيټ لږ اغېزمن وي۔

en-mt: This lowers the risk level to health services that have been eliminated and provides additional time for other health services and vaccines to be developed.

sourceString: Non-pharmaceutical interventions that may manage the outbreak include personal preventive measures, such as hand hygiene, wearing face-masks, and self-quarantine; community measures aimed at physical distancing such as closing schools and cancelling mass gathering events; community engagement to encourage acceptance and participation in such interventions; as well as environmental measures such surface cleaning.More drastic actions aimed at containing the outbreak were taken in China once the severity of the outbreak became apparent, such as quarantining entire cities and imposing strict travel bans.
targetString: غیر دارویي موارد چې کولای شي د وېروس شیوع کنترول کړي، فردي محافظوي اقدامات دي لکه: د لاس مینځل، د ماسک اغوستل، او د ځان قرنطینول؛او ټولنیز اقدامات چې ټولنیز لرېوالی پکې شامل دی لکه: د ښوونځیو بندول او د لویو غونډو لغو کول؛ او د ټولنې له خوا د دې محدودیتونو منل او په دې اقداماتو کې د خلکو ونډه او هغې ته تشویقول؛ او همدارنګه بهداشتي اقدامات لکه د سطحو پاکول. کله چې د وېروس د شیوع شدت څرګند شو، چین د وېرس د شیوع د محدودولو په برخه کې تر ټول جدي اقدامات تر سره کړل لکه: د ښارونو مکمل قرنطین او په سفرونو باندې جدي محدودیتونه لګول.
en-mt: Non-pharmacological cases that can control the spread of the virus are individual protective measures such as: hand washing، wearing a mask، and self-quarantine؛ and social measures that include social distancing such as: closing schools and canceling large gatherings؛ and community acceptance of these restrictions and encouraging people's participation in these measures؛ as well as health measures such as cleaning surfaces. As the severity of the virus became apparent، China took the most serious measures to limit the spread of the virus، including complete city quarantine and serious restrictions on travel.

sourceString: Other countries also adopted a variety of measures aimed at limiting the spread of the virus.
targetString: نورو هېوادونو هم د دې وېروس د نشر د محدودولو په برخه کې مختلف اقدامات تر سره کړل.
en-mt: Other countries have also taken steps to limit the spread of the virus.

sourceString: South Korea introduced mass screening and localized quarantines, and issued alerts on the movements of infected individuals.
targetString: جنوبي کوریا خپل ټول خلک و پوښتل او مخلي قرنطین یې تطبیق کړ او په ناروغۍ د اخته کسانو د تګ را تګ لپاره یې جدي اخطارونه ورکړل.
en-mt: South Korea has questioned all its citizens and implemented a pre-quarantine and issued serious warnings for people infected with the disease.

sourceString: Singapore provided financial support for those infected who quarantined themselves and imposed large fines for those who failed to do so.
targetString: سینګاپور د هغو ملوثو کسانو سره مالي  مرستې وکړې کوم چې ځانونه یې قرنطین کړي وو او هغه کسان یې جریمه کړل چې قرنطین یې نه و کړی.
en-mt: Singapore has granted financial assistance to those who have quarantined themselves and punished those who have not been quarantined.

sourceString: Taiwan increased face mask production and penalized hoarding of medical supplies.Simulations for Great Britain and the United States show that mitigation (slowing but not stopping epidemic spread) and suppression (reversing epidemic growth) have major challenges.
targetString: تایوان د ماسکونو د تولیدونې کچه لوړه کړله او د روغتیایي توکو احتکار کوونکي یې جریمه کړل. د بریتانیا او امریکا ورته والی ښیي چې د وېروس کمونې (د نشر د سطحې کمول نه د هغې درول) او  د وېروس محو کولو (د وبا د زیاتېدو مخنیوی) په برخه کې مهمې ننګونې شتون لري.
en-mt: Taiwan has increased the production of masks and penalized health care providers. Similarities between The United Kingdom and the United States show that there are significant challenges in reducing the spread of the virus (not reducing the spread of the spread) and the elimination of the virus (preventing the spread of the pandemic).

sourceString: Optimal mitigation policies might reduce peak healthcare demand by 2/3 and deaths by half, but still result in hundreds of thousands of deaths and health systems being overwhelmed.
targetString: د وېروس د کمونې پالیسي کېدای شي چې د روغتیایي خدمتونو تقاضا په 2/3 او مړینه نیم ته را ټيټه کړي، خو لا هم کېدای شي په سلګونو زره خلک ژوند له لاسه ورکړي او روغتیایي خدمتونه له منځه لاړ شي.
en-mt: The common virus policy could reduce the demand for health services by 2/3 and death by half، but hundreds of thousands of people could still lose their lives and health services.

sourceString: Suppression can be preferred but needs to be maintained for as long as the virus is circulating in the human population (or until a vaccine becomes available, if that comes first), as transmission otherwise quickly rebounds when measures are relaxed.
targetString: د وېروس محو کول کېدای شي غوره وي خو باید تر هغې پورې دوام ولري چې وېروس د خلکو په منځ کې موجود وي (او که واکسین له دې مخکې جوړ شي نو باید دا مرحله تر همغې مودې پورې دوام ولري)، خو که اقدامات ودرول شي نو ډېر ژر به بېرته وېروس را ورګرزي.
en-mt: Eradication of the virus may be better، but it should continue until the virus is present among the population (and if the vaccine is already developed، this stage should continue for some time)، but if the measures are stopped، the virus will return soon.

sourceString: Long-term intervention to suppress the pandemic causes social and economic costs.
targetString: د وېروس د محو کولو لپاره اوږد مهاله محدودیتونه د ټولنیز او اقتصادي زیانونو لامل کېږي.
en-mt: Long-term restrictions on the elimination of the virus cause social and economic damage.

sourceString: There are no specific antiviral medications approved for COVID-19, but development efforts are underway, including testing of existing medications.
targetString: د کوویډـ19 لپاره کوم مشخص د وېروس ضد درمل نشته، خو پراختیایي هڅې لا هم روانې دي چې د موجوده درملو ټېسټ هم پکې شامل دی.
en-mt: There are no specific antiviral drugs for COVID-19, but development efforts are still underway, including testing of existing drugs.

sourceString: Taking over-the-counter cold medications, drinking fluids, and resting may help alleviate symptoms.
targetString: د تبې د درملو استعمالول، مایعات څښل، او استراحت کول کېدای شي د مرض د علایمو په کمولو کې مرسته وکړي.
en-mt: The use of fever medications، drinking fluids، and rest may help to reduce the symptoms of the disease.

sourceString: Depending on the severity, oxygen therapy, intravenous fluids, and breathing support may be required.
targetString: د مرض د شدت مطابق، د مریض د صحت لپاره د مصنوعي اکسجن استعمال، سیرم، او د تنفسي سیستم قوت اړين دي.
en-mt: According to the severity of the disease، the use of artificial oxygen، serum، and respiratory system strength is necessary for the health of the patient.

sourceString: The use of steroids may worsen outcomes.
targetString: ستيراید استعمال سره نتيجې خرابېدای شي۔
en-mt: The results can deteriorate with the use of steride.

sourceString: Several compounds that were previously approved for treatment of other viral diseases are being investigated for use in treating COVID-19.
targetString: ډېری مرکبات چې د نورو وېروس ناروغيو لپاره وو هغه هم د  COVID-19 د علاج لپاره پلټل شوي دي۔
en-mt: Most of the compounds that were for other viral diseases have also been investigated for the treatment of COVID-19.

sourceString: The WHO also stated that some "traditional and home remedies" can provide relief of the symptoms caused by SARS-CoV-19.
targetString: د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان ویلي چې ځيني "دوديز او کورنۍ درملنې" د SARS-CoV-19 رامېنځ ته شوي نښو کې راحت ورکوي شي۔
en-mt: The World Health Organization has said that some "traditional and family therapies" can provide relief in the emerging symptoms of SARS-CoV-19.

sourceString: Increasing capacity and adapting healthcare for the needs of COVID-19 patients is described by the WHO as a fundamental outbreak response measure.
targetString: د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان له اړخه د COVID-19 ناروغه کسانو لپاره ظرفيت او روغتيا پاملرنې ګامونه زياتول تشریح کړي شوي دي۔
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) has described capacity and health care measures for people infected with COVID-19.

sourceString: The ECDC and the European regional office of the WHO have issued guidelines for hospitals and primary healthcare services for shifting of resources at multiple levels, including focusing laboratory services towards COVID-19 testing, cancelling elective procedures whenever possible, separating and isolating COVID-19 positive patients, and increasing intensive care capabilities by training personnel and increasing the number of available ventilators and beds.
targetString: د ECDC او په اروپا کې د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان سیمه ئیز  دفتر روغتونونو، لومړي روغتيايي خدماتو ته ده وسيلو په بېلو بېلو کچو رسولو لارښووني اوښولي دي، چې پکې ده لبارتریو کې  COVID-19 تشخيص باندې زياته توجه ورکول شامل دي۔
en-mt: THE ECDC AND THE WHO'S REGIONAL OFFICE IN EUROPE HAVE PROVIDED GUIDANCE ON THE DELIVERY OF DIFFERENT LEVELS OF DEVICES TO HEALTH SERVICES، INCLUDING INCREASING ATTENTION TO THE DIAGNOSIS OF COVID-19 IN THE COUNTRY.

sourceString: There are various theories about where the very first case (the so-called patient zero) may have originated.
targetString: داسې ډېر نظريات هم ممکنه ده چې (تش په نوم صفر ناروغي) رامېنځ ته شي.
en-mt: There are a lot of things that can be called "zero".

sourceString: The first known case of the novel coronavirus may trace back to 1 December 2019 in Wuhan, Hubei, China.
targetString: د کورونا وېروس لومړنۍ مثبته پېښه د 2019 کال د ډېسمبر میاشتې په لومړۍ نېټه د چین هېواد د ووهان ښار په مرکز اوبي کې ثبت شوه.
en-mt: The first confirmed case of coronavirus was reported in Wuhan، China، on December 1، 2019.

sourceString: Within a month, the number of coronavirus cases in Hubei gradually increased.
targetString: هوبي کې په يو مياشت کې د کورونا وېروس کې کیسونه ورو ورو زيات شول.
en-mt: Covid-19 cases have increased in a month.

sourceString: These were mostly linked to the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, which also sold live animals, and one theory is that the virus came from one of these kinds of animals; or, in other words, has a zoonotic origin.A pneumonia cluster of unknown cause was observed on 26 December and treated by the doctor Zhang Jixian in Hubei Provincial Hospital, who informed the Wuhan Jianghan CDC on 27 December.
targetString: دغه زيادتره کیسونه ده Huanan  سمندري خوراکي هول سېل مارکيټ سره تړل شوي وو، کوم کې چې ژوندي ځناور هم خرڅېږي، او ده يوه نظريه هم مخې ته راځي چې ويروس دغه قسمه ځناورو له راغلې، په نورو ټکو کې، دغه زونوتیک اصليت لري، د نمونيا کلستر په نه پېژندل شوي امله 26 دسمبر کې مخې ته راغله او ډبليو ایچ او پي خبر کړي شوو.
en-mt: Most of these cases were linked to the Huanan Marine Food Hole Sale Market، where live animals are also sold، and there is also a theory that the virus came from such animals، in other words، has zoonotic origin، came in front of the 26 December due to an unknown pneumonia cluster and was reported by W.H.P.

sourceString: On 30 December, a group of doctors at Wuhan Central Hospital alerted their colleagues of a "SARS-like coronavirus".
targetString: د ډېسمبر په 30مه د ډاکټرانو يوې ډلې په وهان مرکزي روغتون کې خپل ملګري د SARS غونډې کورونا وېروس خبرداری ورکړل.
en-mt: On December 30، a group of doctors at The Central Hospital in Afghanistan warned of the SARS outbreak.

sourceString: Eight of these doctors, including Li Wenliang, were admonished by the police for spreading false rumours, and another, Ai Fen, was reprimanded by her superiors for raising the alarm.
targetString: دغه اتو ډاکټرانو کې چې پکې لې وين ليانګ هم شامل وو، د دروغو اوازې خپرېدو له امله ورته پوليس نصيحت اوکړو او بل ال فن مشرانو بې عزته کړي.
en-mt: The eight doctors، including Li Wein Liang، were given the same advice and insulted other members of the al-art leaders due to rumors of lying.

sourceString: The Wuhan Municipal Health Commission later released a public notice on 31 December and informed the WHO.
targetString: د ووهان ښاروالۍ روغتون کمیسیون روستو يوا عامه خبرتيا ورکړه او په 31 ډسمبر یې د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان له خبرتيه ورکړه.
en-mt: The Wuhan Municipal Hospital Commission gave a public notice and informed the World Health Organization on December 31.

sourceString: Enough cases of unknown pneumonia had been reported to health authorities in Wuhan to trigger an investigation in early January.During the early stages of the outbreak, the number of cases doubled approximately every seven and a half days.
targetString: تېره جنورۍ کې په ووهان کې  د نمونيا ناپېژندل شوی پېښې په بشپړه توګه پلټنو لپاره روغتیایي چارواکو ته راپور ورکړ چې، د وباء په اولني برخه کې،  د کيسونو شمېره په هر اووه اووه نيمو ورځو کې يو په دوه کيدل شول.
en-mt: In January، an unidentified case of pneumonia in Wuhan reported to health officials that in the first part of the country، the number of cases doubled every seven and a half days.

sourceString: In early and mid-January 2020, the virus spread to other Chinese provinces, helped by the Chinese New Year migration and Wuhan being a transport hub and major rail interchange.
targetString: د جنورۍ 2020 په اول او مينځ کې، وېروس د چين نورو ولاياتو کې خپور شو، دغه کې چين د نوي کال مهاجرت د ټرانسپورټ مرکز ووهان او د غټ ریل تبادلې ځايون مرستيال وو.
en-mt: In The First and Middle Of January 2020، the virus spread to other provinces of China، where China was the new year's migration hub of Wuhan and vice-president of the Giant Railway Interchange.

sourceString: On 20 January, China reported nearly 140 new cases in one day, including two people in Beijing and one in Shenzhen.
targetString: په 20 جنوري، چين يوه ورځ کې 140کیسونه راپور کړل، کوم کې چې دوه د بيجنګ او يو دا شنجن واله شامل وو.
en-mt: On January 20، China reported 140 cases a day، which included two of Beijing's and one that was a green one.

sourceString: Later official data shows that 6,174 people had already developed symptoms by 20 January 2020.As of 26 March, the United States has overtaken China and Italy with the highest number of confirmed cases in the world.As of 9 April 2020, more than 1.61 million cases have been reported worldwide; more than 97,000 people have died and more than 364,000 have recovered.
targetString: وروسته د رسمي معلوماتو له مخې وښودل شوه چې د 20 جنوري 2020 پورې 6,147 خلکو کې نښې نښانې راغلې دي.26مارچ باندې په نړی کې د متحده ایالاتو د چين او اتلې نه ده ثبت شوې ناروغه کسانو په زياته شمېره کې مخکې شوو، 9 اپريل 2020 باندې په نړيواله کچه د 1.61 ميليون نه زياتې پېښې رپورټ شوي، د 97000 نه زيات کسان مړه شول او د 36400 نه زيات روغ شول.
en-mt: Official data later showed that 6،147 people had symptoms as of January 20، 2020.26 March preceded the highest number of unregistered sick people in the world، on April 9، 2020، more than 1.61 million cases were reported globally، more than 97،000 people died and more than 36،400 recovered.

sourceString: Around 200 countries and territories have had at least one case.
targetString: شاوخوا 200 هيوادونو او سيمو کې لږترلږه يوه يوه پېښه ولرله.
en-mt: At least 200 countries and regions have been involved.

sourceString: Due to the pandemic in Europe, many countries in the Schengen Area have restricted free movement and set up border controls.
targetString: په یورپ کې د وباء د لاسه، په شینجین سيمه کې ډېرو هېوادونو ازاد ګرځېدلی مني کړې شوو او په پولو باندې يې کنترول مضبوط کړې شوو.
en-mt: Due to the pandemic in Europe، many countries in the Schengen area have been accepted and their control over borders has been strengthened.

sourceString: National reactions have included containment measures such as quarantines (known as stay-at-home orders, shelter-in-place orders, or lockdown) and curfews.As of 2 April, nearly 300 million people, or about 90% of the population, are under some form of lockdown in the United States, more than 50 million people are in lockdown in the Philippines, about 59 million people are in lockdown in South Africa, and 1.3 billion people are in lockdown in India.
targetString: په ملي توګه د تحويلې تدبيرونه شامل دي (لکه په کور کې ايسارېدو حکم، د استوګنې حکم يا لاک داون) او ګرځبندېز، په 2اپريل، شاوخوا 300ميليونه خلک، يا 90% آبادي، په امريکا کې په څه نه څه ډول لاک داون کې دي، 50ميليونه خلک په Philipine کې پو لاک داون کې دي، شاوخوا 59% ميليونه خلک په سوېلي افريقا او 1.3 ميليونه خلک په انډيا کې په لاک داون کې دي.
en-mt: Nationally included delivery measures (such as a stay-at-home order، a residence order or lock down) and curfews، as of April 2، about 300 million people، or 90% of the population، are in some form of lock down in the United States، 50 million people are in lock down in Philipine، about 59% of the population in South Africa and 1.3 million in India.

sourceString: On 26 March, 1.7 billion people worldwide were under some form of lockdown, which increased to 2.6 billion people two days later—around a third of the world's population.
targetString: د مارچ په 26مه، په ټوله نړۍ کې 1.7 ملیارده خلک تر یو څه بندیز لاندې و. چې دوه ورځې وروسته یې 2.6 ملیارد خلکو ته زیاتوالی ورکړ - د نړۍ د نفوس دریمه برخه.
en-mt: As of March 26، 1.7 billion people worldwide were under some restrictions، which two days later increased to 2.6 billion people - a third of the world's population.

sourceString: The first confirmed case of COVID-19 has been traced back to 1 December 2019 in Wuhan; one unconfirmed report suggests the earliest case was on 17 November.
targetString: د کورونا وېروس لومړی پېژندل شوی کیس  په تېر 1 ډسمبر 2019 په وهان، چين رامېنځ ته شوی و.
en-mt: The first known case of coronavirus was reported in Wuhan، China on December 1، 2019.

sourceString: Doctor Zhang Jixian observed a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown cause on 26 December, upon which her hospital informed Wuhan Jianghan CDC on 27 December.
targetString: د دسمبر په 31 په 2019، د چین د هوبي ولایت، ووهان کې د نامعلوم ایټولوژی پیښې د سینیومونیا قضیه راپور شوې وه.
en-mt: On December 31، 2019، a case of pneumonia was reported in Wuhan، Hubei Province، China.

sourceString: Initial genetic testing of patient samples on 27 December 2019 indicated the presence of a SARS-like coronavirus.
targetString: د 2019 کال د دسمبر په 27د مریضانو لومړنیو جنټیکي ټېسټونو د کرونا موجودیت د SARS ډوله ویروس په بڼه ثابت کړ.
en-mt: On December 27، 2019، the first genetic tests of patients confirmed the presence of the coronavirus in the form of the SARS virus.

sourceString: A public notice was released by Wuhan Municipal Health Commission on 31 December.
targetString: د ووهان ښاروالۍ روغتون کمیسیون روستو يوا عامه خبرتيا ورکړه او په 31 ډسمبر یې د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان له خبرتيه ورکړه.
en-mt: The Wuhan Municipal Hospital Commission gave a public notice and informed the World Health Organization on December 31.

sourceString: The WHO was informed on the same day.
targetString: د روغتیا نړيوال سازمان ته په همدې ورڅ معلومات ورکړل شول.
en-mt: The same information was given to the World Health Organization.

sourceString: As these notifications occurred, doctors in Wuhan were warned by police for "spreading rumours" about the outbreak.
targetString: کله چې یادې حبرونې رامنځ ته شوې، د وهان پولیسو ډاکټرانو ته د شیوع د شایعاتو د نشر په اړه خبرداری ورکړ.
en-mt: When the incident occurred، police were alerted to the outbreak of the outbreak.

sourceString: The Chinese National Health Commission initially claimed that there was no "clear evidence" of human-to-human transmission.
targetString: په لومړیو کې، د چین د روغتیا ملي کمسیون ادعا وکړه چې داسې هې کوم واضح مدرک نشته چې ویروس د انسان څخه انسان ته منتقل کېږي.
en-mt: At first، China's National Health Commission claimed there was no clear evidence that the virus was transmitted from human to human.

sourceString: In late January, the Chinese government launched a radical campaign later described by the Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping as a "people's war" to contain the spread of the virus.
targetString: د جنوري په وروستیو کې، د چین دولت یو بنیادي کمپاین په لاره واچاوه چې بیا وروسته د چین د کمونېست ګوند د عمومي مشر شی جینګ پینګ له خوا د خلکو د جنګ په نامه و نومول شو چې د ویروس نشر پکې شامل دی.
en-mt: In late January، the Chinese government launched a foundational campaign that was later dubbed the People's War by Xi Jinping، the leader of the Communist Party of China، which included the spread of the virus.

sourceString: In what has been described as "the largest quarantine in human history", a cordon sanitaire was announced on 23 January stopping travel in and out of Wuhan, which was extended to a total of 15 cities in Hubei, affecting a total of about 57 million people.
targetString: د وهان په قرنطین کې، چې د انسانیت په تاریخ کې تر ټولو لوی قرنطین دی، د جنوري په 23 د بهداشتي خدمتونو یو کمربند جوړ شوی و چې د وهان ښار ته یې د تګ را تګ ټول سفرونه بند کړي وو، او بیا د هوبي سیمې 15 نورو ښارونو ته هم دا قرنطین وغزېد چې تقریبا 57 ملیونه کسان یې اغېزمن کړل.
en-mt: The Wuhan quarantine، the largest in human history، was set up on January 23، which blocked all travel to Wuhan، and extended it to 15 other cities in the Hubei region، affecting nearly 57 million people.
