targetString: تېره اونۍ، مونږ خبر ترلاسه کړ چې زمونږ د SF اړونده کارکوونکي ښایي د کووېډ-19 وېروس باندې اخته شوي وای.
en-mt: Last week، we learned that our SF-related staff may have been infected with COVID-19.

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: خو بیا هم، د یو لړ احتیاطي اقداماتو ترسره کولو سره، مونږ د وېروس ضد پاکوالي ډله وګمارله تر څو د سانفرانسیسکو په دفتر کې ټولې سطحې ضدعفوني کړي.
en-mt: However، by taking a series of precautions، we have hired an anti-virus cleaning team to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: دوی د روغتون د کچې وېروس ضد محلول څخه ګټه اخلي تر څو هره سطحه او همدارنګه لابي او د لیفټ غاړې چې زمونږ پوړ ته رارسیږي، ضدعفوني کړي.
en-mt: They use hospital-level anti-virus solution to disinfect any surface as well as the lobby and lyft side that reaches our floor.

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: په ودانۍ کې د پاملرنې دندې له پروتوکول څخه کار اخیستل کیږي او هغه مواد کاروي چې د کرایه اخیستونکو خوندیتوب سره مرسته کوي.
en-mt: The maintenance duties in the building are utilized and use materials that assist the safety of tenants.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: مونږ د ارامۍ احساس کوو چې دفتر به د بېرته ورستنېدو پر مهال په سمه توګه چمتو وي.
en-mt: We feel comfortable that the office will be properly prepared upon its return.

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: زمونږ د DC دفتر په WeWork کې پروت دی چې د کویډ-19 پروتوکول یې له مونږ او د DC اړونده کارکوونکو سره شریک کړی دی.
en-mt: Our DC office is located in WeWork that has shared the COVID-19 protocol with us and the relevant DC staff.

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: له تېرې اونۍ راپدېخوا، زمونږ د DC دفتر سان فرانسیسکو سره د شریک شوي لارښود سره سم په بشپړه توګه یو لرې ځای ته لېږدول شوی.
en-mt: Since last week، our DC office san Francisco has been moved to a completely remote location in accordance with the guidance shared with our DC Office San Francisco.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: لکه څنګه چې په نیویارک ښار کې زمونږ اړونده همکاران پوهیږي، مونږ په بروکلین کې د یو ځای ځایګي د اجاره نیولو په اړه په خپلو کې بحث او خبرې کوو.
en-mt: As our relevant colleagues in New York City know، we are discussing and discussing renting a place in Brooklyn.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: دا خبرې اترې دوام لري، خو ښایي ځنډ هم پکې راشي.
en-mt: These conversations are still ongoing، but they may also be delayed.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: زمونږ د ځینو همکارانو لومړی ځل دی چې لرې سیمو کې کار کوي.
en-mt: This is the first time we have worked in remote areas.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: زمونږ اوږدمهاله لرې سیمو همکاران پوهیږي چې دا کېدای شي یو ډول نظم او سمون وي، او تاسو ته د ځینو سلامشورو وړاندې کول غواړي:
en-mt: Our long-term remote colleagues understand that this can be some sort of discipline and adjustment، and want to offer you some advice:

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: د غونډو د وخت اوږدوالی تر یو یا دوه ساعتونو پورې محدود کړئ.
en-mt: Limit the length of the session to one or two hours.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: که چېرې اوږدو غونډو ته اړتیا لیدل کیږي، دا په پام کې ونیسئ چې دا غونډه د څو ورځو په بهیر کې څنګه په څو برخو ویشل کېدی شي.
en-mt: If it is necessary، consider how the meeting can be divided into several parts over the course of a few days.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: د غونډې موخه په روښانه ډول مالومه کړئ، باید اجنډا ولري، او د لوستلو مواد له غونډې مخکې ولېږئ.
en-mt: The purpose of the meeting is clear، it must have an agenda، and send the material before the meeting.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: د ژوندۍ مرستې او همکارۍ او تماس د رامنځته کولو لپاره د Google Docs  او Zoom اوزارو پر مټ ویډیو رالنډه کړئ.
en-mt: Use google docs and zoom tools to create live help and collaboration and contact.

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: د هرې غونډې د جوړولو لپاره مشر وټاکئ. داسې یو څوک چې د پوښتنو په اړه د خبرو څارنه وکړي او د خبرې کوونکي لیست تعقیب کړي او داسې یو څوک چې نوټ اخیستو کې مرسته وکړي (یا په مشترک ډول نوټ اخیستنه وکړي).
en-mt: Choose a leader for each meeting. A person who monitors conversations about questions and follows the speaker's list and someone who helps to take notes (or take notes jointly).

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: که چېرته ارام مایکروفون یا غوږیو ته اړتیا لرئ، نو د ټکنالوژۍ د ملاتړ برخې ته یو ایمیل ولېږئ.
en-mt: If you need a microphone or headphones، send an email to the technology support section.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: د ناشتې خواړو لپاره د خپلې هوساینې تادیې څخه کار واخلئ.
en-mt: Use your food to eat.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: د ویشل شوي کار په اړه له خپلو همکارانو سره د خبرو کولو لپاره د #remoties channel in Slack سره یوځای شئ.
en-mt: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk to your colleagues about distributed work.

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: د بشری سرچینو د فعالیتونو ټیم په ټول بنسټ کې د ویشل شوي کار د لاډېروالي ملاتړ لپاره د ویبینار پر اساس ولاړ ارګونومیک لارښود ته کتنه کوي.
en-mt: The Human Resources Activities Team is looking at the webinar-based ergonomics guide to support the increased transparency of distributed work across the foundation.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: تېره اونۍ مو د ټولنې اړونده قراردادونو ترلاسه کوونکو څخه غوښتنه وکړه تر څو د ویکیمیډیا له لوري مالي ملاتړ کېدونکي عامه پروګروامونه، لکه ایډیټاتونز تر هغه وخته پورې لغوه کړي، تر څو پورې چې د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان له لوري د وبا له منځه تلل نه وي اعلان شوي.
en-mt: Last week، we asked recipients of community-related contracts to cancel wikimedia-funded public programs، such as Editatons، until the who declared the pandemic a pandemic.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: مونږ هغوی خبر کړل چې مونږ پوه شوو چې د لغوې او نورو محدودیتونو لپاره زمونږ غوښته ښایي دا ناشونې کړي تر څو د هغوی د قرارداد پر بنسټ ولاړ فعالیتونه ترسره کړو او دا چې د یادو فعالیتونو د ځنډ او د موخو د بدلون لپاره به هیڅوک نه جریمه کیږي.
en-mt: We informed them that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions may make it impossible to carry out their contract-based activities and that no one will be penalized for delaying these activities and changing the objectives.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: مونږ به راتلونکې اونۍ د ویکیمانیا او نورو سیمه‌ییزو او د ټولنې موضوعي کنفرانسونو په اړه د نورو لارښودونو څارنه پیل کړو.
en-mt: We will continue to monitor other guidelines on Wikimania and other regional and community-themed conferences next week.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: داسې ښکاري چې د نړیوالې ټولنې عمومي احساس له ګډوډۍ څخه خپګان، خو د خپلو ټولنو، ویکيمیډیا او نورو باندې د تمرکز کولو لپاره په روڼتیا او وړتیا کې ارام او راحت دی.
en-mt: The general sense of the international community seems to be overwhelmed by confusion، but is comfortable and comfortable in the transparency and ability to focus on their communities، the wikimedia and others.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: په مخکې تګ سره، CRT په میتاویکي کې د یوې پاڼې جوړولو باندې کار کوي تر څو د اغېزې د څارنې او له هغوی سره زمونږ د اړیکو تعقیبولو په موخه د ټولنې لپاره یوه فضا رامنځته کړي.
en-mt: Going forward، CRT is working on creating a page in Metawixiki to create an atmosphere for the community to monitor the impact and track our relationship with them.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: د کوویډ-19 اړونده موضوعګانو سره سروکار درلودل
en-mt: Dealing with COVID-19 related issues

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: مونږ به د پنجشنبې په ورځ، 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT ، ستاسو جنترۍ ته د یو ځانګړي کاري غونډې په اړه یو بلنلیک درولېږو.
en-mt: We will send a letter to your calendar on Thursday، 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: مونږ به دا وخت د اضافي نوو مالوماتو شریکولو، ستاسو پوښتنو ځوابولو او له یو بل سره د اړیکې پیدا کولو په موخه د وخت لګولو لپاره وکاروو.
en-mt: We will use this time to share additional information، answer your questions and connect with each other.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: مونږ په دې کې سره یوځای یو او که په دې ډول له یو بل سره مرسته کولی شو.
en-mt: We can help each other in this way.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: د دې ترڅنګ، تاسو په دې ایمېل ادرس کې کولی شئ مالوماتو پیدا کولو ته دوام ورکړئ او د کوویډ-19 اړونده نور مهم مالومات په Office Wiki کې پیدا کړئ.
en-mt: In addition، you can continue to find information in this e-mail address and find more important information related to COVID-19 in Office Wiki.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: CRT به په دغو پاڼو کې تازه مالومات وراچوي او ټول مالومات به په یو ځای کې ساتي.
en-mt: The CRT will update the information on these pages and keep all the information in one place.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: مونږ له هغو کارکوونکو سره د دوامداره اړیکو ساتلو باندې هم کار کوو چې اوسمهال په ډېرو اغېزمنو هېوادونو کې اوسیږي.
en-mt: We are also working on maintaining a continuous relationship with the employees who are currently living in the most affected countries.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: که چېرته تاسو د داسې سفر، پروګرامونو، لوی کاري بهیر، د پوښښ اړونده ننګونو، او یا داسې څه په اړه پوښتنې لرئ چې په هکله یې مرستې ته اړتیا لرئ، تاسو کولی شئ پرته له شکه CRT خبر او یا هم کار ورسره وکړئ.
en-mt: If you have questions about such travel، programs، major workflows، coverage-related challenges، or something you need help with، you can definitely notify or work with the CRT.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: مونږ غواړو د اړتیا په صورت کې مرستې وړاندې او اړیکې رامنځته کړو.
en-mt: We want to help and connect if needed.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: که چېرته تاسو محرم او حساس مالومات لرئ، په مهربانۍ سره یې د بشري سرچینو د نړیوالو عملیاتو مشر، براین جوډن ته په ایمیل کې ولېږئ.
en-mt: If you have confidential and sensitive information، please send it to Brian Joden، head of operations at Human Resources International.

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: هیڅ بدلون ته باید د کار او مسوولیتونو پرېښودو په سترګه و نه کتل شي.
en-mt: No change should be seen as giving up work and responsibilities.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: بلکې دا په یو ډول رسمیت پېژندنه ده چې په داسې یو وخت کې زمونږ کار او مسوولیتونه باید داسې تنظیم شي چې پخوا په هغه ډول نه وو تنظیم شوي.
en-mt: But it is a recognition that at this time our work and responsibilities should be regulated in a way that was not previously organized.

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: دا هغه ګامونه دي چې باور لرو د یو بل ملاتړ لپاره اړین دي، په دې توګه مونږ کولی شو خپل کار ته دوام ورکولی شو، خپل فعالیت په داسې مرستو سنبال کړو چې دوی ورته اړتیا لري او نړۍ ورته په داسې خدمت سنباله کړو چې دوی پرې باور کولی شي.
en-mt: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support each other، so that we can continue to work، support our activities with the help they need، and make the world a service that they can trust.

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: زمونږ پلان شوی کار به د وخت په رارسېدو سره زمونږ په تمه وي.
en-mt: Our planned work will be looking forward to the arrival of time.

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: د اوس لپاره دا د یو بل د ملاتړ او د هغه مهم کار لپاره د فضا رامنځته کولو وخت دی چې ښایي په راتلونکو اونیو او په ممکن ډول میاشتو کې ورسره مخ شو.
en-mt: For now، it's time to create space for each other's support and the important work we may face in the coming weeks and possibly months.

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: مونږ د دې موخې ترلاسه کولو لپاره تاسو ته اړتیا لرو، او له تاسو غوښتنه لرو چې د خپل ځان او خپلو کورنیو خیال وساتئ، په دې توګه به تاسو د اړتیا رامنځته کېدو پر مهال په چمتو او سنبال اوسئ.
en-mt: We need you to do this، and we want you to take care of yourself and your family، so that you can be prepared and prepared when necessary.

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
targetString: اوس په مهربانۍ سره – خپل لاسونه پرېمینځئ او مخ مو مه لمس کوئ!
en-mt: Now be kind - wash your hands and don't touch your face!

sourceString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
targetString: کاترین، CRT (اماندا کې، امي وي، براین جې، دوریین ډي، ګریګوري وي، جیم وي، جویل ایل، لینیت ایل، راین ایم، او ټوني ایس)، او د مشرتابه ټیم نور غړي (ګرانټ آی، هیتر ډبلیو، جیم وي، جانین یو، لیسا ایس، روبین اې، ریان ایم، او ټوبي این).
en-mt: Katherine, CRT (Amanda In, Amy V, Brian J, Durian Dee, Gregory V, Jim V, Joel L, LynetT, Ryan M, and Tony S), and other members of the leadership team (Grant Ai, Heather W., Jim V, Janine Yu, Lisa S., Robin A., Ryan M., and Toby N).

sourceString: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines.
targetString: د اینجیوټینسین بدلولو انزایم 2 (ACE2) داسې انزایم دي چې په سږو، شریانونو، زړه، پښتورګو او کولمو کې د حجرو له بیروني سطحې (د حجرې غشا) سره وصل دي.
en-mt: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme that is connected to the outer surface of cells (cell membranes) in the lungs، arteries، heart، kidneys and intestines.

sourceString: ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.
targetString: ACE2 د انجیوټینسین II اندازه کمولو او د Ang(1-7) زیاتوالو سره د انجیوټینسین-بدلولو انزایم (ACE) د فعالیت مخه نیسي، او پدې سره د زړه ناروغیو درملنې لپاره ژمن درمل ګرځي. ACE2 د ځینې کوروناویروسونو لپاره حجرو ته د ننوتلو نقطې په توګه هم کار کوي.
en-mt: ACE2 inhibits the activity of angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) with an increase of Ang(1-7)، making it a promising drug to treat heart disease. ACE2 also acts as an entry point for certain coronaviruses.

sourceString: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.
targetString: د انزایم انساني نسخه ډیری وختونه hACE2 ته ویل کیږي.
en-mt: The human version of the enzyme is often called hACE2.

sourceString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.
targetString: د انجیټینسین بدلولو انزایم 2 یو ډول زنک دی، چې میټالو انزایم لري او د اندوتیلیل او نورو حجرو په سطحه کې میشت دي.
en-mt: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a type of zinc، which contains a metal enzyme and resides on the surface of endothelial and other cells.

sourceString: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.
targetString: د ACE2 پروټین دN -ټرمینل پیپټایډز M2 ډومین او د C ټرمینل کلینرین رینل امینو اسید لیږدونکی ډومین لري.
en-mt: Ace2 protein has the domain of N-terminal peptides M2 and the domain of C-terminal clenbuterol receptor amino acids.

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.
targetString: ACE2 یو واحد تیریدونکی I ډول د غشا پروټین دي، چې د انزایمیک فعال ډومین لري، او په سږو او نورو نسجونو کې د حجرو په سطحه کې راڅرګندیږي.
en-mt: ACE2 is a single aggressive Type I membrane protein، which has an enzyme-active domain، and appears on the surface of cells in the lungs and other tissues.

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.
targetString: د ACE2 بیرونی ډومین د ټرانس میمبررین ډومین څخه د بل انزایم په واسطه جلا شوی چې د شیډاس په نوم پیژندل کیږي، او وروستي محلول کېدونکي پروټین د وینې جریان کې خپریږي او په پای کې د ادرار یا متیازو له لارې خارجیږي.
en-mt: Ace2's outer domain is separated from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as shedas، and the last soluble protein is released into the bloodstream and eventually excreted through urine or metastasis.

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.
targetString: ACE2 په ډیرو ارګانونو کې شتون لري: ACE2 په اکثرو ارګانونو کې د اصلي سږو II ډول الوولر حجرو، د کوچنیو کولمو انتروسیټس، شریان او رګونو اندوتیلیل حجرو او د شریان هوارو عضلاتو حجرو سره وصل دی.
en-mt: ACE2 is present in many organs: ACE2 is associated with primary pulmonary type II alular cells in most organs، small intestine intestinal، arterial and vascular endothelial cells، and arterial-flat muscle cells.

sourceString: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.
targetString: د ACE2 mRNA بڼه په دماغي کورټکس، سټریټم، های پوتالاموس، او د مغزو ساقې کې هم موندل کیږي.
en-mt: The form of ACE2 mRNA is also found in the cerebral cortex، strystem، hypothalamus، and brain suces.

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.
targetString: د ACE2 لومړنۍ دنده د ACE لپاره د متوازن په توګه عمل کول دي.
en-mt: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a balance for ACE.

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
targetString: ACE وایژونسټریکټر انجیوټینسین II په انجیوټینسین II هورمون کې جلا کوي.
en-mt: ACE isolates angiotensin II in the hormone angiotensin II.

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
targetString: ACE2، په خپل وار، د کاربوکسیل ټرمینل امینو اسید فینیلالینین د انجیوټینسین II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) څخه جلا کوي او په واسوډیلیټر انجیوټینسین (1-7)، (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH) ته یې اړوي.
en-mt: ACE2، in turn، separates carboxyl terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and converts it into vasodilator angiotensin (1-7)، (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.
targetString: ACE2 کولی شي یو شمیر نور پیپټایډونه هم جلا کړي لکه [des-Arg9] - بریډیکینین، اپیلین، نیوروټینسین، ډینورفین A، او ګریلین.
en-mt: ACE2 can also separate a number of other peptides such as [des-Arg9] - bridkinin، epinephrine، neurotransmitters، denorphine A، and garline.

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.
targetString: ACE2 هغه غشا هم تنظیموي چې د خنثی امینو اسید لیږدونکي SLC6A19 وي او د هارټینپ په ناروغۍ اخته شوی وي.
en-mt: ACE2 also regulates membranes that are carriers of the neutral amino acid SLC6A19 and have been infected with the disease of hartenup.

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: د ټرانس میبرین پروټین په توګه، ACE2 د ځینې کوروناویروسونو لپاره حجرو ته د دننه کیدو اصلي ځای په توګه کار کوي، لکه د HCoV-NL63؛SARS-CoV  (هغه ویروس چې د SARS لامل کیږي)؛ اوSARS-CoV-2  (هغه ویروس چې د COVID-19 لامل کیږي).
en-mt: As a transmiserine protein، ACE2 acts as the main entry point for certain coronaviruses into cells، such as HCoV-NL63؛ SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS)؛ and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: په ځانګړې توګه، د حجرو په سطحه کې د ACE2 انزایمیک ډومین سره د SARS-CoV او SARS-CoV2 د سپیک S1 پروټین تړل د ویروسونو او انزایمونو دواړو لپاره چې په حجرو کې میشت دي د انډوکوټیسس او لیږد لامل ګرځي.
en-mt: In particular، the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 with the enzyme domain ace2 on the cell surface leads to endocotic and transmisses for both viruses and enzymes that reside in cells.

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.
targetString: د ننوتلو دغه پروسه د کوربه سیرن پروټیز TMPRSS2 لخوا د S پروټین چمتو کولو ته هم اړتیا لري، چې د احتمالي معالجې په توګه ددې مخنیوی اوس مهال تر تحقیق لاندې دی. چې دا له ځینو سره ددې انګیرنې لامل ګرځیدلې چې په حجرو کې د ACE2 کچې کمول ښايي د ناروغۍ سره په مبارزه کې مرسته وکړي.
en-mt: This entry process also requires the preparation of s protein by host serine protease TMPRSS2، which is currently under investigation as a potential treatment. This has led some to believe that reducing the levels of ACE2 in cells may help fight the disease.

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: په هرصورت، ګڼو مسلکي ټولنو او تنظیموونکو ادارو د معیاري ACE مهار کونکي او د ARB درملنې ته د دوام ورکولو وړاندیز کړی.
en-mt: However، many professional associations and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing to standardize ACE inhibitors and ARB treatments.

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
targetString: په جولايي 11، 2012 کې خپرې شوې سیستماتیکې بیاکتنې او میټا تحلیل وموندله چې "د ACE مهار کونکو کارول د کنټرولونو په پرتله د نمونیا په خطر کې د پام وړ 34% کمښت سره تړاو درلود."
en-mt: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11، 2012 found that "the use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% decrease in risk of pneumonia compared to controls."

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: سربیره پردې، "د نمونیا خطر په هغه ناروغانو کې هم کم شوی چې د ACE مهار کونکو سره یې درملنه شوې څوک چې د نمونیا له لوړ خطر سره مخ وو، په ځانګړي توګه هغه کسان چې د مغزي سکتې او زړه ناروغۍ یې درلودې.
en-mt: In addition، "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at high risk of pneumonia، especially those with stroke and heart disease.

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: د ACE مهار کونکو کارولو د نمونیا اړوند مړینې کمولو سره هم تړاو درلود، که څه هم پایلې یې د نمونیا د عمومي خطر په پرتله لږې پیاوړې وې."
en-mt: "The use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with reduced pneumonia-related mortality، although the results were less robust than the overall risk of pneumonia."

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: د ACE2  انساني ترکیب (rhACE2) د سږو حاد ټپونو لپاره د نوې درملنې په توګه ګڼل کیږي او داسې ښکاري چې په خوګانو کې د لپپولیسسچارډ د راپارول شوي شدید تنفسي رنځ سنډروم سره د نبض هیموډینامیکس او آکسیجن اشباع ښه کوي.
en-mt: The human combination of ACE2 (rhACE2) is considered to be the new treatment for acute lung injuries and appears to improve pulse hemodynamics and oxygen saturation with laposchard in pigs with severe respiratory syndrome.

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: په انسانانو کې د rhACE2 نیم عمر شاوخوا 10 ساعته دی او د 24 ساعتونو لپاره د اغیزې (مودې) سربیره د عمل پیل یې 30 دقیقې دی.
en-mt: The half-life of rhACE2 in humans is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the effect (duration) for 24 hours.

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: ډیری موندنې وړاندیز کوي چې rhACE2 ممکن د هغو کسانو لپاره هیله بخښونکي درمل وي چې د کلاسیک رینین - انجیوټینسین سیسټم مهار کونکو (RAS مهار کونکو) زغم ونلري یا په هغو ناروغیو کې چیرته چې انجیوټینسین II لوړ شوي وي. د حاد تنفسي رنځ سنډروم درملنې لپاره د rhACE2 تزریق کول په کلینیکي آزموینو کې ارزول شوي دي.
en-mt: Many findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those who do not tolerate classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where angiotensin II has been elevated. RhACE2 injections for the treatment of acute respiratory syndrome have been evaluated in clinical trials.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: b'COVID-19 اپلیکیشنونه د مبایل سافټویر اپلیکیشنونه دي چې د 2019-20 کورونا ویرس ناروغۍ په غبرګون کې د اړیکې په تعقیب کې د مرستې لپاره طرحه شوي دي، د بیلګې په توګه، د هغو اشخاصو ("اړیکې") پیژندلو پروسه چې ښايي د اخته شوي کس سره په اړیکه کې وو.
en-mt: B'COVID-19 applications are mobile software applications designed to help in tracing the connection in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic، for example، the process of identifying individuals ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected person.

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: په ځینو سیمو او قدرتونو کې بیلابیل اپلیکیشنونه د حکومتونو په رسمي ملاتړ سره رامینځته یا وړاندیز شول.
en-mt: In some regions and powers، various applications were developed or proposed with the official support of governments.

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: د اړیکو تعقیب اپلیکیشن جوړولو لپاره ډیری چوکاټونه رامینځته شوي دي.
en-mt: There are many ways to create a relationship tracking app.

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: د محرمیت اندیښنې راپورته شوي، په ځانګړي توګه د هغو سیسټمونو په اړه چې د اپلیکیشن کارونکو جغرافیایی موقعیت تعقیب پراساس جوړ شوي دي.
en-mt: Privacy concerns have been raised، especially about systems built on the geographical location of app users.

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: په لږ شمیر مزاحم بدیلونو کې د بلوټوت سگنلونو کارول شامل دي تر څو کارونکی په نږدې کیدو سره د نورو ګرځنده ټلیفونونو ته دننه شي.
en-mt: A small number of annoying alternatives include the use of bluetooth signals to allow users to enter into other mobile phones as soon as possible.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: په 10 اپریل 2020 کې، ګوګل او ایپل په ګډه اعلان وکړ چې دوی به په ګډه د بلوټوت پر بنسټ دغه اپلیکیشنونو څخه ملاتړ وکړي تر څو په مستقیم ډول ددوی په Android او iOS عملیاتي سیسټمونو کې کار وکړي.
en-mt: On April 10، 2020، Google and Apple announced that they would jointly support bluetooth-based apps to work directly on their Android and iOS operating systems.

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: په چین کې، د چین حکومت، د Alipay سره په ګډه، یو داسې اپلیکیشن جوړ کړی چې ښاریانو ته اجازه ورکوي تر څو وګوري چې ایا دوی خو د هغو خلکو سره په اړیکه کې نه وو چې د کوویډ-19 ناروغي لري.
en-mt: In China، the Chinese government، together with Alipay، has developed an app that allows citizens to check if they were not in contact with people with COVID-19.

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: دغه اپلیکیشن د چین له 200 څخه په ډیرو ښارونو کې کارول کیږي. په سینګاپور کې، د TraceTogether په نوم یو اپلیکیشن کارول کیږي.
en-mt: The app is used in more than 200 cities in China. In Singapore، an app called TraceTogether is used.

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: نوموړی اپلیکیشن د آی ټي سیمه ییزې ټولنې لخوا رامینځته شوی، چې د آزادې سرچینې په توګه خپور شوی او حکومت ته به وسپارل شي. شمالي مقدونیا د "StopKorona!" په نامه د بلوتوټ پربنسټ اپلیکیشن په لاره اچولی چې له احتمالي ناروغانو سره تماس معلوموي او د روغتیايي خدمتونو چارواکو ته ګړندی ځواب چمتو کوي.
en-mt: The app was developed by the IT Regional Community, which has been released as a free source and will be handed over to the government. North Macedonia has launched a Bluetooth-based app called StopKorona، which detects contact with potential patients and provides a quick response to health authorities.

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: دغه اپلیکیشن د مخابراتو او ټیکنالوژۍ وزارت او روغتیا وزارت لخوا رامینځته شوی دی.
en-mt: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communications and Technology and the Ministry of Health.

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: تر 14 اپریل 2020 پورې، اپلیکیشن د ګوګل پلی پلورنځي او اپل اپلیکیشن سټور لخوا منظورۍ ته په تمه وو.
en-mt: As of April 14، 2020، the app was expected to be approved by the Google Play Store and The Apple App Store.

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").
targetString: په 12 اپریل، حکومت وویل چې د تماس تعقیب اپلیکیشن د پراختیا په وروستۍ مرحله کې دی، او په یو څو اوونیو کې به د ترلاسه کیدو وړ وي. ورته اپلیکیشن په آیرلینډ او فرانسه کې هم پلان شوی ("StopCovid").
en-mt: On 12 April، the government said the contact tracking app is in the final stage of development، and will be available within a few weeks. The same app is also planned in Ireland and France ("StopCovid").

sourceString: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.
targetString: آسټرالیا او نیوزیلینډ دواړه د سینګاپور د TraceTogether اپلیکیشن او BlueTrace پروټوکول پر بنسټ پر اپلیکیشنونو غور کوي. روسیه په پام کې لري چې په ماسکو کې د هغو ناروغانو لپاره چې په کوویډ-19 ناروغۍ اخته دي د geofencing اپلیکیشن معرفي کړي، او پداسې بڼه جوړ شوی تر څو ډاډ ترلاسه شي چې دوی له کور څخه بهر نه ځي.
en-mt: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering applications based on Singapore's TraceTogether and BlueTrace Protocol. Russia is planning to introduce a geofencing app for patients infected with COVID-19 in Moscow، and a form has been developed to ensure they don't go outside.

sourceString: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.
targetString: راس انډرسن، د کیمبرج پوهنتون د امنیت انجینرۍ پروفیسر، د اپلیکیشن پر بنسټ سیسټمونو کې یو شمیر احتمالي عملي ستونزې لیست کړي، د هغو غلطو مثبتو پایلو او د اغیزمنتیا احتمالي نشتون په شمول که چیرې د اپلیکیشن کارول یوازې د خلکو لږې برخې پورې محدود وي.
en-mt: Ross Anderson، a professor of security engineering at the University of Cambridge، listed a number of potential practical problems in app-based systems، including those false positive results and the potential lack of effectiveness if the use of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.

sourceString: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.
targetString: د ګمراه کونکي یا زیان رسونکي "کوروناویروس" اپلیکیشنونو خپرولو په اړه اندیښنو ته په پام سره، اپل محدودیتونه ټاکلي چې کوم ډول سازمانونه کولی شي په اپل سټور کې د کوروناویروس اړوند اپلیکیشنونه اضافه کړي. دا یې یوازې په "رسمي" یا په بل عبارت، په مشهورو سازمانونو پورې محدود کړي دي.
en-mt: Due to concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" applications، Apple has set limits on what types of organizations can add coronavirus-related apps to the Apple Store. It is limited to "official" or، in other words، to popular organizations.

sourceString: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.
targetString: ګوګل او ایمیزون هم ورته محدودیتونه وضع کړي دي.
en-mt: Google and Amazon have imposed similar restrictions.

sourceString: Privacy campaigners voiced their concern regarding the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.
targetString: د محرمیت کمپاینرانو د کوروناویروس اپلیکیشنونو په کارولو سره د ډله ایزې څارنې اغیزو په اړه خپله اندیښنه څرګنده کړه، په ځانګړي توګه پدې اړه چې آیا د کروناویروس وبا سره د مبارزې کولو لپاره د څارنې رامینځته شوې زیربنا به له مینځه وړله شي کله چې دغه ګواښ پای ته ورسید.
en-mt: Privacy campaigners expressed their concern about the impact of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps، particularly about whether the surveillance infrastructure created to combat the coronavirus pandemic will be destroyed once the threat is over.

sourceString: Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: د بخښنې نړیوال سازمان او له سلو څخه زیاتو نورو سازمانونو یوه اعلامیه خپره کړې چې ددې ډول څارنې لپاره یې د محدودیتونو غوښتنه وکړه.
en-mt: Amnesty International and more than 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for restrictions on such surveillance.

sourceString: The organisations declared eight conditions on governmental projects:
targetString: پورته یادو سازمانونو د دولتي پروژو په اړه اته شرطونه اعلان کړل:
en-mt: The following are the requirements for government projects:

sourceString: surveillance would have to be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";
targetString: څارنه باید "قانوني ، لازمي او متناسبه" وي؛
en-mt: The monitoring should be "lawful، necessary and proportionate"؛

sourceString: extensions of monitoring and surveillance would have to have sunset clauses;
targetString: د نظارت او څارنې غځول باید د پای ته رسولو فقرې ولري؛
en-mt: Monitoring and monitoring should have a termination clause؛

sourceString: the use of data would have to be limited to COVID-19 purposes;
targetString: د معلوماتو کارول به د کوویډ-19 موخو پورې محدود وي؛
en-mt: The use of data will be limited to the purposes of COVID-19؛

sourceString: data security and anonymity would have to be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;
targetString: د معلوماتو امنیت او ناڅرګندوالی باید خوندي وساتل شي او د شواهدو پراساس خوندي شي؛
en-mt: Information security and uncertainty must be maintained and protected on the basis of evidence؛

sourceString: digital surveillance would have to avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalisation;
targetString: ډیجیټل څارنه باید د تبعیض او څنډې ته کیدو مخه ونیسي؛
en-mt: Digital surveillance should be prevented from being discriminated against؛

sourceString: any sharing of data with third parties would have to be defined in law;
targetString: د دریمې ډلې سره د معلوماتو شریکول باید قانون کې تعریف شي؛
en-mt: The sharing of information with third parties shall be defined in law؛

sourceString: there would have to be safeguards against abuse and the rights of citizens to respond to abuses;
targetString: ناوړې ګټې اخیستنې ته د ځواب ویلو لپاره باید د ناوړې ګټې اخیستنې پر وړاندې او د اتباعو حقونو په اړه محافظتونه موجود وي؛
en-mt: In order to respond to abuse، there must be safeguards against abuse and the rights of citizens؛

sourceString: meaningful participation by all "relevant stakeholders" would be required, including that of public health experts and marginalised groups.The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also issued checklists.
targetString: د ټولو "اړونده ذیدخلو" لخوا معنی لرونکې ګډون ته اړتیا لیدل کیږي، د عامې روغتیا کارپوهانو او څنډې ته شوو ډلو په شمول. د آلمان د بې نظمۍ کمپیوټر کلب (CCC) او د بې پولې خبریالانو (اوه ګرینزین راپور ورکونکی) (RSF) هم چیک لیستونه خپاره کړل.
en-mt: Meaningful participation is required by all "relevant stakeholders،" including public health experts and marginalized groups. The German Irregular Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Seven Greenland Reporters) (RSF) also published checklists.

sourceString: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of persistent surveillance by removing the tracing mechanism from their device operating systems once it is no longer needed.
targetString: ګوګل/اپل وړاندیز شوی پلان په پام کې لري ترڅو د خپلې آلې عملیاتي سیسټمونو څخه د تعقیب میکانیزم لرې کولو سره د دوامدارې څارنې ستونزه حل کړي کله چې نوره اړتیا نه وي.
en-mt: Google/Apple is considering a proposed plan to solve the persistent monitoring problem by removing the tracking mechanism from its operating systems when it is no longer needed.

sourceString: Some countries used network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating both the need to download an app and the ability to avoid tracking.
targetString: ځینې هیوادونو د اپلیکیشن پرځای د شبکې پر بنسټ د موقعیت تعقیب کارولی، چې د اپلیکیشن ډاونلوډ کولو اړتیا یې له منځه وړې او د تعقیب مخنیوي وړتیا لري.
en-mt: Some countries have used network-based location tracking rather than an app، which eliminates the need to download the app and has the ability to prevent tracking.

sourceString: In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.
targetString: په اسرایلو کې، د شبکې پربنسټ تعقیب منظور شو.
en-mt: In Israel، the network was followed.

sourceString: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant potential privacy problems.
targetString: د شبکې پربنسټ حل لارې چې د خام موقعیت ډیټا ته لاسرسی لري د احتمالي محرمیت پام وړ ستونزې لري.
en-mt: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant privacy issues.

sourceString: However, not all systems with central servers need to have access to personal location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).
targetString: که څه هم، ټول مرکزي سیسټمونه د مرکزي سرورونو په درلودلو سره اړتیا نلري چې د شخصي موقعیت ډیټا ته لاسرسی ولري؛ د محرمیت خوندي کولو یو شمیر سیسټمونه جوړ شوي چې مرکزي سرورونه یوازې د داخلي اړیکې لپاره کاروي (لاندې برخه وګورئ).
en-mt: However، not all centralized systems require having centralized servers that have access to personal location data؛ a number of privacy-saving systems have been developed that central servers use only for internal communication (see section below).

sourceString: In South Korea, a non-app-based system was used to perform contact tracing.
targetString: په سویلي کوریا کې، د تماس تعقیب ترسره کولو لپاره د اپلیکیشن پرته سیسټم وکارول شو.
en-mt: In South Korea، an application-free system was used to conduct contact tracing.

sourceString: Instead of using a dedicated app, the system gathered tracking information from a variety of sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined these to generate notices via text messages to potentially-infected individuals.
targetString: د ځانګړي شوي اپلیکیشن کارولو پرځای، سیسټم له بیلابیلو سرچینو څخه د ګرځنده وسیلو د تعقیب ډیټا او د کارت راکړې ورکړې ډیټا په شمول د تعقیب معلومات راټول کړل، او سره یوځای یې کړل ترڅو احتمالي ناروغۍ لرونکو اشخاصو ته د لنډو پیغامونو له لارې خبر ورکړي.
en-mt: Instead of using the specified app، the system collected tracking data from a variety of sources، including tracking data from mobile devices and card transaction data، and combined it to inform potentially ill individuals via short messages.

sourceString: In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government has also made the location information publicly available, something permitted because of far-reaching changes to information privacy laws after the MERS outbreak in that country.
targetString: د تماس موندونکو احتمالي کسانو ته د خبر ورکولو لپاره ددې معلوماتو کارولو سربیره، حکومت د موقعیت معلوماتو ته عامه لاسرسی آزاد کړئ، چې په هیواد کې د MERS خپریدو وروسته د معلوماتو محرمیت قوانینو کې د خورا پراخه بدلونونو له امله دغه څه ته اجازه ورکړل شوې ده.
en-mt: In addition to using this information to notify potential contacts، the government releases public access to location information، which has been allowed due to a wide-ranging change in data privacy laws following the outbreak of MERS in the country.

sourceString: This information is available to the public via a number of apps and websites.Countries including Germany considered using both centralized and privacy-preserving systems.
targetString: خلک دغو معلوماتو ته د یو شمیر اپلیکیشنونو او ویب پاڼو له لارې لاسرسی لري. د آلمان په شمول نور هیوادونه مرکزي او د محرمیت ساتلو سیستمونه کاروي.
en-mt: People access this information through a number of apps and websites. Other countries, including Germany, use central and privacy-preserving systems.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, the details had not yet been released.
targetString: تر 6 اپریل 2020 پورې، لاهم پدې اړه جزیات ندي خپاره شوي.
en-mt: As of April 6، 2020، no details have been released.

sourceString: Privacy-preserving contact tracing is a well-established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: د محرمیت ساتنې د تماس تعقیب یوه رامنځته شوې ښه مفکوره ده، چې د ادب څیړنې کافي برخه یې حداقل 2013 کال سره نږدیوالی لري.تر 7 اپریل 2020 پورې، د کارپوهانو لسګونو ډلو د محرمیت دوستانه حل لارو باندې کار کاوه، لکه د بلوټوت کمه انرژي (BLE) کارول تر څو کارونکی په نږدې کیدو سره د نورو ګرځنده ټلیفونونو ته دننه شي.
en-mt: Pursuing a confidentiality contact is an established good idea، with a sufficient amount of literature research close to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020، dozens of groups of experts worked on privacy-friendly solutions، such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) so that users can access other mobile phones as soon as possible.

sourceString: However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.
targetString: په هرصورت، PEPP-PT د همغږۍ هڅه ده چې مرکزي او غیرمرکزي شوي دواړه طریقې لري او یو واحد پروتوکول نلري. په غیرمتمرکز پروتوکولونو کې د نږدې کیدو محرمیت ساتنې غیرمرکزي تعقیب (DP-PPT/DP-3T)، د لنډمهاله تماس شمیرې (TCN، د fka د تماس پیښو شمیرې، CEN)، د محرمیت حساسیت پروتوکولونه او د ګرځنده اړیکو تعقیب میکانیزمونه (PACT) او نور شامل دي.
en-mt: However، PEPP-PT is a collaborative effort that has both centralized and decentralized approaches and does not have a single protocol. Decentralized protocols include decentralized close privacy protection follow-up (DP-PPT/DP-3T)، short-term contact numbers (TCN، fka contact incident numbers، CEN)، privacy sensitivity protocols and mobile communication tracking mechanisms (PACT)، etc.

sourceString: In these protocols, identifiable personal data never leaves the device, and all matching happens on-device.
targetString: پدې پروتوکولونو کې، د تشخیص وړ شخصي معلومات هیڅکله آله نه پریږدي، او ټول پرتله کول په آله کې ترسره کیږي.
en-mt: In these protocols، identifiable personal information never leaves the device، and all comparisons are done in the tool.

sourceString: The Privacy Group at MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: د محرمیت ګروپ کله چې د COVID-19 خپریدو تعقیب کولو لپاره د موقعیت یا لارې د تقاطع ډیټا راټولوي او کاروي په MIT میډیا لیب کې SafePaths رامینځته کوي، چې دا د محرمیت ساتنې تخنیکونو کارولو لپاره یو پلیټ فارم دی.
en-mt: The Privacy Group when collecting and using location or pathway data to track the spread of COVID-19 creates SafePaths at MIT MediaLab، a platform for the use of privacy protection techniques.

sourceString: It is based on research from the whitepaper "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" released in March 2020.Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a company developing privacy technologies that was also originally founded at the MIT Media Lab.
targetString: دا په مارچ 2020 کې د وایټ پیپر "ایپس ګون روګ: په وبا کې د شخصي محرمیت ساتل" په سرلیک د خپرې شوې څیړنې پراساس جوړ شوی پلیټ فارم دی.بله ورته هڅه د انیګما MPC لخوا د SafeTrace پلیټ فارم جوړول دي، چې نوموړی د محرمیت ټیکنالوژیو جوړولو یو شرکت دی او په اصل کې په MIT میډیا لیب کې هم رامینځته شوی وو.
en-mt: It is based on research published in March 2020 by WhitePapper titled "Apps Go On Rong: Protecting Personal Privacy in the Pandemic."Another similar effort is the creation of safeTrace platform by Anigma MPC، which is a company building privacy technologies and was originally also created at MIT Media Lab.

sourceString: SafeTrace utilizes secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health data with other users and officials, without compromising the privacy of that data.
targetString: SafeTrace د هارډویر خوندي ټیکنالوژیو څخه کار اخلي ترڅو کاروونکو ته اجازه ورکړي چې حساس موقعیت او د روغتیا معلومات له نورو کاروونکو او چارواکو سره شریک کړ ، پرته لدې چې ددې معلوماتو محرمیت پر سر هوکړه وشي.
en-mt: SafeTrace uses secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health information with other users and authorities، without any agreement on the confidentiality of this information.

sourceString: On 5 April 2020, the global TCN Coalition was founded by groups that had coalesced around what was essentially the same approach and largely overlapping protocols, with the goal to reduce fragmentation, and enable global interoperability of tracing and alerting apps, a key aspect of achieving widespread adoption.
targetString: په 5 اپریل 2020 کې، د TCN نړیوال ایتلاف د یو شمیر ډلو لخوا رامینځته شو چې شاوخوا ورته کړنلارې او په لویه کچه پراخ پروتوکولونه یې سره یو ځای کړل چې موخه یې د تجزیې راکمول، او د تعقیب او د خبرتیا اپلیکیشنونو په برخه کې نړیوالې همکارۍ ته زمینه برابرول چې په پراخه کچه د کارونې موخې ترلاسه کولو یو کلیدي اړخ دی.
en-mt: On 5 April 2020، the TCN International Coalition was formed by a number of groups that put together around the same procedures and largely broad protocols aimed at minimizing partitioning، and facilitating international cooperation in tracking and notification applications that are a key aspect of achieving widely-used goals.

sourceString: On 9 April 2020, the Singaporean government announced that it had open-sourced the BlueTrace protocol used by its official government app.
targetString: په 9 اپریل 2020، د سنګاپور حکومت اعلان وکړ چې د BlueTrace پروتوکول یې د آزادې سرچینې په توګه آزاد کړی دی چې ددوی د رسمي حکومتي اپلیکیشن لخوا کارول کیږي.
en-mt: On 9 April 2020, the Government of Singapore announced that it had released the BlueTrace Protocol as a free source used by their official government app.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative for contact tracing, which they claimed would preserve privacy, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Energy technology and privacy-preserving cryptography.
targetString: په 10 اپریل 2020 کې، ګوګل او اپل، هغه شرکتونه چې د انډرویډ او iOS مبایل پلیټ فارمونه کنټرولوي، د اړیکې تعقیب لپاره یو نوښت اعلان کړ، چې ددوی د ادعا له مخې د محرمیت ساتنه به کوي او د بلوتوټ کمې انرژۍ ټیکنالوژۍ او د محرمیت ساتلو کریپټوګرافۍ ترکیب پراساس به جوړ شي.
en-mt: On April 10، 2020، Google and Apple، the companies that control the IOS and IOS mobile platforms، announced an initiative to track the connection، which they claim will protect privacy and will be built based on a combination of Bluetooth low-energy technology and privacy protection cryptography.

sourceString: They also published specifications of the core technologies used in the system.
targetString: دوی په دغه سیستم کې د اصلي ټیکنالوژیو کارول شوي مشخصات هم خپاره کړل.
en-mt: They also revealed the characteristics of the original technologies used in the system.

sourceString: According to Apple and Google, the system is intended to be rolled out in three stages:
targetString: د اپل او ګوګل په وینا، په پام کې ده چې دغه سیسټم په دریو مرحلو کې پلی شي:
en-mt: According to Apple and Google، the system is expected to be implemented in three steps:

sourceString: rollout of tools to enable governments to create official privacy-preserving coronavirus tracing apps
targetString: دداسې وسیلو په لاره اچول ترڅو دولتونه وکولی شي د محرمیت ساتنې کوروناویروس د تعقیب رسمي اپلیکیشنونه جوړ کړي
en-mt: To develop such tools so that governments can create official applications for the protection of the coronavirus

sourceString: integration of this functionality directly into iOS and AndroidGoogle and Apple plan to address the take-up and persistent surveillance problems by first distributing the system through operating system updates, and later removing it in the same way once the threat has passed.
targetString: په مستقیم ډول د iOS او انډرویډ گوگل او اپل پلان کې د دې فعالیت ادغام کول ترڅو لومړی د فعالیتي سیسټم تازه کولو له لارې د سیسټم توزیع کولو په واسطه او وروسته په ورته طریقې سره کله چې ګواښ پای ته ورسید د معلوماتو په لرې کولو سره د څارنې د پیل او دوامدارې ستونزې حل کړي.
en-mt: Directly integrating this functionality into iOS and Google's and Apple's plan to start and continue monitoring problems first by updating the operating system and then in the same way when the threat is over.

sourceString: b'Drug repositioning (also known as drug repurposing, re-profiling, re-tasking or therapeutic switching) is the repurposing of an approved drug for the treatment of a different disease or medical condition than that for which it was originally developed.
targetString: د هغې ناروغۍ د درملنې پر ځای د کوم لپاره چې دا په اصل کې جوړ شوی و، د درملو موقف بدلونه (د بل هدف لپاره د درملو کارولو، بیا پروفایل کولو، بیا ګمارلو یا د درملنې بدلولو په نوم هم پیژندل کیږي) د بلې ناروغۍ یا طبي حالت درملنې لپاره د منل شوي درمل بیا ځلې کارولو ته وايي.
en-mt: Instead of treating her disease for which it was originally developed، medication position change (also known as drug use، re-profiling، re-profiling، or conversion therapy for another purpose) refers to the re-use of an approved medication to treat another disease or medical condition.

sourceString: This is one line of scientific research which is currently being pursued to develop safe and effective COVID-19 treatments.
targetString: دا د ساینسي څیړنو یوه کرښه ده چې اوس مهال د کوویډ-19 خوندي او اغیزمنې درملنې رامینځته کولو لپاره تعقبیږي.
en-mt: This is a line of scientific research currently being implemented to develop a safe and effective covid-19 treatment.

sourceString: Other research directions include the development of a COVID-19 vaccine and convalescent plasma transfusion.SARS-CoV-2 has about 66 druggable proteins, each of which has multiple ligand binding sites.
targetString: د څیړنې په نورو لارښوونو کې د کوویډ-19 واکسین جوړول او کانالې ته د پلازما لیږد شامل دي. SARS-CoV-2 شاوخوا 66 د درملو سره د ښه کیدو وړ پروټینونه لري چې هر یو یې د لیګانیډ د تړلو ګڼ شمیر نقطې لري.
en-mt: Other research guidelines included the development of the COVID-19 vaccine and the delivery of plasma to the canal. SARS-CoV-2 contains about 66 drug-resistant proteins، each of which contains many points of ligaid binding.

sourceString: Analyzing those binding sites provide the reasonable project of developing effective antiviral drug against COVID-19 proteins.
targetString: د تړلو دغو نقطو تحلیل د کوویډ-19 پروټینونو پروړاندې د ویروس ضد اغیزمنو درملو رامینځته کولو مناسبې پروژه وړاندې کوي.
en-mt: Analysis of these closing points presents a suitable project to develop antiviral-effective drugs against COVID-19 proteins.

sourceString: Of the most important SARS-CoV-2 target proteins are papain-like protease, RNA dependent RNA polymerase, helicase, S protein, and ADP ribophosphatase.
targetString: د SARS-CoV-2 خورا مهم د هدف پروټینونه عبارت دي له پاپین ډوله پروټیز، د RNA اړوند RNA پولیمریز، هیلیکیس، S پروټین، او ADP ریبو فاسفاټیس څخه.
en-mt: The most important target proteins of SARS-CoV-2 are papin-type proteases، rna-related RNA polymerases، helicases، S proteins، and ADP ribo phosphates.

sourceString: Hussein A A, et al studied several candidate compounds which then optimized and analyzed for their skeleton similarity with the highest similar approved drugs in order to accelerate a potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drug development in his preclinical study to be recommended in a clinical study design.
targetString: حسین A A او ملګرو یې یو شمیر انتخابیدونکي مرکبونه مطالعه کړل، چې بیا یې دوی ترټولو ورته منل شوو درملو سره د اسکلیت ورته والي موندلو لپاره ددوی مطلوبیت او تحلیل ترسره کړ، ترڅو په پریکلینیکل مطالعه کې د SARS-CoV-2 ضد قوي درملو انکشاف ګړندی کړي او د کلینیکي څیړنې طرحې ته یې وړاندیز کړي.
en-mt: Hussein A.A. and his colleagues studied a number of selective compounds، which then they performed their desirability and analysis to find the similarity of osclitis with the most well-accepted drugs، to accelerate the development of a potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drug in the preclinical study and recommended them to a clinical research design.

sourceString: Chloroquine is an anti-malarial medication that is also used against some auto-immune diseases.
targetString: کلوروکین د ملاریا ضد یو ډول درمل دي چې د ځینو اتومات معافیت ناروغیو پروړاندې هم کارول کیږي.
en-mt: Chloroquine is a type of anti-malaria medication that is also used against certain auto-immune diseases.

sourceString: On 18 March, the WHO announced that chloroquine and the related hydroxychloroquine would be among the four drugs studied as part of the Solidarity clinical trial.
targetString: په 18 مارچ، د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان اعلان وکړ چې کلوروکین او اړوند هایډروکسي کلوروکین به د هغه څلور درملو څخه وي چې د پيوستون کلینیکي آزمایښت برخې په توګه به مطالعه شي.
en-mt: On 18 March, the World Health Organization announced that chloroquine and related hydroxychloroquine would be among four drugs to be studied as part of the Clinical Trial of The Association.

sourceString: New York governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York State trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine would begin on 24 March.On 28 March, the FDA authorized the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).
targetString: د نیویارک والي انډریو کوومو اعلان وکړ چې د نیویارک ایالت د کلوروکین او هایډروکسي کلوروکین آزمایښت به په 24 مارچ پیل شي. په 28 مارچ، FDA د اضطراري استعمال اجازې (EUA) له مخې د هایډروکسي کلوروکین سلفیټ او کلوروکین فاسفیت کارولو اجازه ورکړه.
en-mt: New York Governor Andrew Cuomo announced that new York State's Chloroquine and Hydrochloroquine trial will begin on March 24. On March 28، the FDA authorized the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under the Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).

sourceString: The treatment has not been approved by the FDA's clinical trials process and is authorized under the EUA only as an experimental treatment for emergency use in patients who are hospitalized but are not able to receive treatment in a clinical trial.
targetString: ددغو درملو درملنه د FDA د کلینیکي آزمایښت پروسې لخوا نه ده تایید شوې او د EUA له مخې یوازې په هغو ناروغانو باندې د اضطراري کارونې تجربوي درملنې په توګه تایید شوې چې په روغتون کې بستر شوي خو په کلینیکي آزمایښت کې د درملنې وړ ندي.
en-mt: The treatment has not been approved by the FDA's clinical trial process and has been approved as an experimental emergency use treatment only on patients admitted to hospital but not treated in clinical trials.

sourceString: The CDC has said that "the use, dosing, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" are not yet established.
targetString: CDC ویلي چې "د SARS-CoV-2 انتان د درملنې لپاره د هایډروکسي کلوروکین کارول، ډوز، یا موده" لاهم معلومه شوې نه ده.
en-mt: The CDC said that "the use، dosage، or duration of the SARS-CoV-2 infection" has not yet been determined.

sourceString: Doctors have said they are using the drug when "there's no other option".
targetString: ډاکټرانو ویلي چې دوی به تر هغې دغه درمل کاروي تر څو "بل انتخاب ونلري".
en-mt: Doctors said they would use the drug until there was "no other choice."

sourceString: A Turkish research team in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin D.
targetString: په استانبول کې د ترکیې یوه څیړونکې ډله د زینک، ویټامین اۍ، ویټامین سي، او ویټامین ډي په ترکیب کې د کلوروکین کارولو په اړه یوه کوچنۍ څیړنه ترسره کوي.
en-mt: A turkish research team in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination of zinc، vitamin A، vitamin C، and vitamin D.

sourceString: Large studies are underway at Duke University and the University of Oxford.
targetString: په ډیوک او اکسفورډ پوهنتونونو کې لویې څیړنې روانې دي.
en-mt: Major research is underway at duke and oxford universities.

sourceString: NYU Langone Medical School is conducting a trial on the safety and efficacy of preventative use of hydroxychloroquine.
targetString: د NYU لانګون طبي ښوونځی د هایدروکسي کلوروکین مخنیوي کارونې خوندیتوب او اغیزمنتوب په اړه ازموینه ترسره کوي.
en-mt: NYU Langone Medical School conducts tests on the safety and efficacy of hydroxychloroquine inhibitory use.

sourceString: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show favipiravir was "clearly effective".
targetString: په ووهان او شینزوین کې چینایي کلینیکي آزمایښتونو ادعا کړې او ښودلې یې ده چې فاویپیراویر "په څرګنده توګه اغیزناک" درمل دي.
en-mt: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen have claimed that favipiraire is a "clearly effective" drug.

sourceString: 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
targetString: ددغو درملو په ترلاسه کولو سره په شینزوین کې په 35 ناروغانو کې د 4 ورځو په اوسط سره معاینه منفي شوه، پداسط حال کې چې په هغو 45 ناروغانو کې د ناروغۍ اوږدوالی 11 ورځې وو چا چې دغه درمل نه وو ترلاسه کړي.
en-mt: The drug was tested negative for an average of 4 days in 35 patients in Shenzhen، while the duration of the disease was 11 days in 45 patients who did not receive the drug.

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: په یوه څیړنه کې چې په ووهان کې په نمونیا 240 اخته ناروغانو باندې ترسره شوې، نیمایي ناروغانو ته فاویپراپیر او نیمایي نورو ته اومیفینویر ورکړل شول.
en-mt: In a study conducted on 240 patients inFected with Pneumonia in Wuhan، half of the patients were given fviiper and half were given omeifinvir.

sourceString: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminded the public that the existing evidence in support of the drug is scant and preliminary.
targetString: د ایټالیا د درمل جوړولو ادارې خلکو ته یادونه کړې چې د درملو اړوند موجود شواهد کم او لومړني دي.
en-mt: The Italian pharmaceutical agency has noted to the public that the available evidence related to the drug is low and preliminary.

sourceString: On 2 April, Germany announced that it would purchase the drug from Japan for its stockpile, and use the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug will be used to treat COVID-19 patients.
targetString: په 2 اپریل، آلمان اعلان وکړ چې دوی به له جاپان څخه د ذخیره کولو لپاره درمل واخلي، او د پوهنتونونو روغتونونو ته د درملو رسولو لپاره به له اردو څخه کار واخلي، چیرته چې به دغه درمل به د کوویډ-19 ناروغانو درملنې لپاره وکارول شي.
en-mt: On 2 April، Germany announced that they would buy medicines from Japan for storage، and would use the army to deliver medicines to university hospitals، where the drug would be used to treat COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made overtures to the Trump administration about purchasing the drug.The drug may be less effective in severe cases of illness where the virus has already multiplied.
targetString: د سویلي چین مارنینګ پوسټ په وینا، شینزو ابې د درملو پیرودلو په اړه د ټرمپ ادارې ته وړاندیزونه کړي دي. درمل ښايي په هغو ځایونو کې د ناروغۍ په سختو قضیو کې لږ اغیزناک تمام شي چیرته چې ویروس دمخه څو ځله زیات خپور شوی دی.
en-mt: According to the South China Morning Post، Shinzo Abe has made suggestions to the Trump administration about drug purchases. The drug may be less effective in severe cases where the virus has already spread more frequently.

sourceString: It may not be safe for use by pregnant women or those trying to conceive.
targetString: د درملو کارول ممکن د امیندواره میرمنو یا د هغه کسانو لپاره چې د امیندوارۍ پلان لري خوندي نه وي.
en-mt: Drug use may not be safe for pregnant women or those planning to get pregnant.

sourceString: One study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of the antivirals lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was observed".
targetString: د لوپیناویر/ریتوناویر (کالیټرا) یوه مطالعه، چې د ویروس ضد لوپیناویر او ریتوناویر ترکیب دی، دغې پایلې ته رسیدلې چې "هیڅ ګټه نلري".
en-mt: A study of lycopinvir/retonavir (calitera)، a combination of anti-viral lyspinavir and retonavir، concluded that it had "no benefit".

sourceString: The drugs were designed to inhibit HIV from replicating by binding to the protease.
targetString: دغه درمل د HIV مخنیوي لپاره ډیزاین شوي وو چې له پروټیس سره په نښلولو د تکرار مخه ونیسي.
en-mt: The drug was designed to prevent HIV from attaching to the protease.

sourceString: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado are trying to modify the drugs to find a compound that will bind with the protease of SARS-CoV-2.There are criticisms within the scientific community about directing resources to repurposing drugs specifically developed for HIV/AIDS.
targetString: د کولوراډو په پوهنتون کې د څیړونکو یوه ډله هڅه کوي چې دغه درمل اصلاح کړي ترڅو داسې مرکب ومومي چې د SARS-CoV-2 پروټیز سره وابسته شي.په ساینسي ټولنه کې د هغه چا پر وړاندې نیوکې موجودې دي چې سرچینو ته لارښوونه کوي چې د نورو ناروغیو منل شوي درمل ددغې ناروغۍ د درملنې لپاره برابر کړي په ځانګړي توګه د HIV/AIDS لپاره جوړ شوي درمل.
en-mt: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado is trying to refine the drug to find a compound that can be associated with the SARS-CoV-2 protease.

sourceString: The WHO included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international Solidarity trial.
targetString: د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان د نړیوال پیوستون په آزمایښت کې د لوپیناویر/ریتونوویر درمل هم شامل کړل.
en-mt: The World Health Organization has also included luppinavir/rythonvir in the World Solidarity Test.

sourceString: Remdesivir was created and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections . Gilead Sciences subsequently discovered that Remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against multiple filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and corona- viruses .
targetString: ریمډیسویر د ایبولا ویروس ناروغۍ او ماربرګ ویروس انتاناتو درملنې په توګه د ګیلاد علومو لخوا رامینځته شوي او جوړ شوي وو. د ګیلاد علومو وروسته وموندله چې ریمډیسویر د ګڼو فیلو، نیومو-، پارامیکسو-، او کورونا ویروسونو په وړاندې په ویټرو کې د ویروس ضد فعالیت درلود.
en-mt: Remedesvir was developed and developed by Gilad Science as a treatment of Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections. Later gilded science found that Remedisvir had anti-viral activity in vitro against multiple phylogenes، stromo-، paramiso-، and coronaviruses.

sourceString: One issue with antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutations that can lead to more severe disease and transmission.
targetString: د ویروس ضد درملنې یوه مسله د بدلونونو له لارې د مقاومت وده ده چې کولی شي د ډیرې شدیدې ناروغۍ او لیږد لامل شي.
en-mt: One issue of anti-virus treatment is the development of resistance through changes that can lead to more severe disease and transmission.

sourceString: Some early pretrial studies suggest remdesivir may have a high genetic barrier to resistance.There are several clinical trials underway, including two conducted by Cleveland University Hospitals; one for people with moderate illness and another for those with more severe illness.
targetString: د آزمایښت څخه وړاندې ځینې څیړنې وړاندیز کوي چې ریمډیسویر ښايي د مقاومت لپاره لوړ جنیټیکي خنډ وګرځي. ګڼې کلینیکي آزموینې روانې دي، چې دوه یې د کلویلینډ پوهنتون روغتونونو لخوا ترسره شوي دي؛ یوه یې د منځنیو ناروغیو درلودونکو کسانو باندې او بله یې په هغو خلکو باندې ترسره کړې چې ډیره شدیده ناروغي لري.
en-mt: Some research prior to testing suggests that remedesvir may be a high genetic barrier to resistance. Several clinical tests are underway, two of which were conducted by hospitals at the University of Cleveland; one on people with moderate illnesses and the other on people with severe illnesses.

sourceString: There are three ongoing clinical trials of intravenous vitamin C for people who are hospitalized and severely ill with COVID-19; two placebo controlled (China, Canada) and one with no control (Italy).
targetString: په هغو خلکو باندې د رګونو د ویټامین سي درې کلینیکي آزموینې روانې دي چې په روغتون کې بستر شوي او د کوویډ-19 سخت ناروغي لري؛ دوه یې په پلیسبو کنټرول شوي (چین، کاناډا) ، او یوه یې کنټرول نلري (ایټالیا).
en-mt: Three clinical tests of vitamin C are underway on people who have been hospitalized and have severe COVID-19 infections؛ two have been controlled in Plesk (China، Canada)، and one without control (Italy).

sourceString: New York State began trials for the antibiotic azithromycin on 24 March 2020.
targetString: د نیویارک آیالت په 24 مارچ 2020 کې د انټي بیوټیک ایزیتروفیسین لپاره آزمایښتونه پیل کړل.
en-mt: The New York Times began testing for the antibiotic isattrophicin on March 24، 2020.

sourceString: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is planning a clinical trial for Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), an inhaled corticosteroid for asthma, for the treatment of pre-symptomatic patients infected with the novel coronavirus.
targetString: د نړیوالې روغتیا او طب لپاره د جاپان ملي مرکز (NCGM) د تایجین الویسکو (سیکلیسونایډ) لپاره کلینیکي آزموینې په پام کې لري، د نفس تنګۍ لپاره د پوزې له لارې د کشولو یو ډول کورټیکوسټرایډ دي، چې په نوي کوروناویروس باندې د اخته ناروغانو د وړاندې څخه درلودونکو علایمو درملنې لپاره وکارول شي.
en-mt: The Japan National Center for Health and Medicine (NCGM) is considering a clinical trial for tygin alveesco (cyclicoid)، a type of nasal corticosteroid used to treat pre-existing symptoms of new coronavirus patients.

sourceString: A form of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2, a Phase II trial is underway with 200 patients to be recruited from severe, hospitalized cases in Denmark, Germany, and Austria to determine the effectiveness of the treatment.
targetString: د انجیوټینسین بدلولو انزایم 2 یو ډول په اړه په 200 ناروغانو باندې د II پړاو آزموینه روانه ده چې له ډنمارک، جرمني، او اتریش څخه پکې د شدیدې ناروغۍ درلودونکي بستر شوي ناروغان ګمارل کیږي ترڅو د درملنې اغیزمنتوب معلوم کړي.
en-mt: About a type of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is undergoing phase II testing on 200 patients from Denmark، Germany، and Austria to determine the effectiveness of the treatment.

sourceString: Researchers from the Montreal Heart Institute in Canada are currently studying the role of colchicine in reducing inflammation and pulmonary complications in patients suffering from mild symptoms of COVID-19.
targetString: په کاناډا کې د مونټریال زړه انسټیټیوټ څیړونکي اوس مهال د کوویډ-19 خفیفو نښو نښانو درلودونکو ناروغانو کې د التهاب او سږو عوارضو کمولو لپاره د کولشيسین رول په اړه څیړنه کوي.
en-mt: Researchers from the Montreal Heart Institute in Canada are currently investigating the role of colshicin to reduce inflammation and pulmonary complications in patients with mild COVID-19 symptoms.

sourceString: The study, named COLCORONA, is recruiting 6000 adults aged 40 and over who were diagnosed with COVID-19 and experience mild symptoms not requiring hospitalization.
targetString: دغه څیړنه چې د COLCORONA په نوم یادیږي، د 40  څخه زیات عمر لرونکي 6000 لویان ستخدام کوي چې د کوویډ-19 ناروغۍ درلودل یي تشخیص شوي او داسې خفیفې نښې نښانې لري چې په روغتون کې یې بستر کیدو ته اړتیا نشته.
en-mt: THE STUDY، CALLED COLCORONA، RECRUITED 6،000 ADULTS OVER 40 WHO HAD BEEN DIAGNOSED WITH COVID-19 AND HAD MILD SYMPTOMS THAT DIDN'T NEED TO BE HOSPITALIZED.

sourceString: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or who do not have an effective contraceptive method are not eligible.
targetString: هغه میرمنې چې امیندواره وي یا ماشوم ته تی ورکوي یا هغه کسان چې د امیندوارۍ د مخنیوي اغیزمن میتود نلري ددغې څیړنې لپاره په شرایطو برابر نه دي.
en-mt: Women who are pregnant or give birth to a child or who do not have an effective method of preventing pregnancy are not eligible for this study.

sourceString: Several anticoagulants are being tested in Italy.
targetString: په ایټالیا کې د انعقاد ضد ګڼ مواد آزمویل شوي دي.
en-mt: Many anti-drugs have been tested in Italy.

sourceString: Low-molecular-weight heparin is being widely used to treat patients, prompting the Italian Medicines Agency to publish guidelines on its use.
targetString: د ناروغانو درملنې لپاره د ټیټ مالیکولر وزن لرونکی هیپرین په پراخه کچه کارول کیږي، او د ایټالیا د درملو ادارې هڅول کیږي چې د کارولو په اړه یې لارښودنې خپرې کړي.
en-mt: Low molecular weight heparin is widely used to treat patients، and the Italian Drug Administration has been encouraged to publish guidelines on its use.

sourceString: A multicenter study on 300 patients researching the use of enoxaparin sodium at prophylaxis and therapeutic dosages was announced in Italy on April 14.
targetString: د اپریل په 14مه په ایټالیا کې د 300 ناروغانو په اړه د ګڼو مرکزونو څیړنې چې د آنوکساپارین سوډیم د درملنې او درملو کارولو په اړه څیړنې کوي اعلان وشو.
en-mt: On April 14, a number of centers were announced in Italy on 300 patients researching the therapeutic and pharmacological use of anoxaporine sodium.

sourceString: Since SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, considerable scientific attention has been focused on repurposing approved anti-viral drugs that were developed for prior outbreaks such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus.
targetString: له کله راهیسې چې SARS-CoV-2 ویروس رامنځته شوی، د ویروس ضد منل شوو درملو د بیا ځلې کارولو په اړه په پام وړ ساینسي پاملرنې باندې تمرکز شوی چې دMRES ، SARS، او لویدیز نیل ویروس په څیر پخوانیو ناروغیو لپاره جوړ شوي وو.
en-mt: Since the SARS-CoV-2 virus was created، significant scientific attention has been focused on the re-use of approved anti-virus drugs developed for earlier diseases such as MRES، SARS، and West Nile virus.

sourceString: Ribavirin: ribavirin was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: ریباویرین: د چین 7مې نسخې لارښودونو سره سم ریباویرین د کوویډ-19 درملنې لپاره وړاندیز شوی و
en-mt: Reavirin: Ribavirin was recommended to treat COVID-19 in accordance with Chinese version 7 guidelines

sourceString: Umifenovir: umifenovir was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: امیفینوویر: د چین 7مې نسخې لارښودونو سره سم امیفینوویر د کوویډ-19 درملنې لپاره وړاندیز شوی و
en-mt: Amifinovir: According to chinese version 7 guidelines، amifinovir was recommended for the treatment of COVID-19

sourceString: Some antibiotics that have been identified as potentially repurposable as COVID-19 treatments:
targetString: ځینې هغه انټي بیوټیک چې د امکان له مخې د کوویډ-19 درملنې لپاره د بیا کاریدونکې درملو په توګه پیژندل شوي په لاندې ډول دي:
en-mt: Some antibiotics known as re-use drugs to treat COVID-19 are as follows:

sourceString: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Approved by China.
targetString: توسیليزوماب (د IL-6 ضد اخیستونکي درمل): د چین لخوا منل شوي دي.
en-mt: Tosilizumab (anti-IL-6 receptor drug) is approved by China.

sourceString: Also trials in Italy and China. and see Tocilizumab#COVID-19.
targetString: په ایټالیا او چین کې هم آزمایل شوي. او Tocilizumab#COVID-19 وګورئ.
en-mt: It has also been tested in Italy and China. See Tocilizumab #COVID-19.

sourceString: b'A COVID-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: د b'A COVID-19 واکسین د کوروناوېروس ناروغۍ 2019 پر وړاندې یو فرضي واکسین دی.
en-mt: The b'A COVID-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against the coronavirus disease 2019.

sourceString: Although no vaccine has completed clinical trials, there are multiple attempts in progress to develop such a vaccine.
targetString: که څه هم پر هیڅ ډول واکسین کلینیکي ازموینې ندي بشپړې شوي، د داسې یو واکسین د جوړولو لپاره ډېرې هڅې روانې دي.
en-mt: Although no clinical trials have been completed، much effort is underway to develop such a vaccine.

sourceString: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the causative virus, to become available in less than 18 months.
targetString: په فبروري 2020 کې، د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان وویل چې دا سازمان له 18 میاشتو څخه په کم وخت کې د SARS-CoV-2، اړونده یا عامل وېروس، پر وړاندې د واکسین جوړېدو تمه نه لري.
en-mt: In February 2020، the World Health Organization said it does not expect to be vaccinated against SARS-CoV-2، a related or causative virus، in less than 18 months.

sourceString: Five vaccine candidates were in Phase I safety studies in April.
targetString: په اپرېل کې د فاز I د خوندیتوب څېړنو کې د واکسین پنځه نوماندان وو.
